faqs.question: What is the scope of MBA?
faqs.answer:
The scope of MBA course is increasing day by day. MBA is one of the big job oriented professional programme and the most one which has been sought by the students. Once you have completed your degree, you have a great job opportunity in the industrial world. You may the manager or executive in term of designation.
The management term is most suited to the managers and that's why it is the way, where you can reach on the top of the height as soon as possible by using your leadership and working proficiency. An MBA professional always plays a vital role in his/her company and this is why he used to keep in touch with the board of directors. No need to specify the companies who recruit the MBA professionals. All sectors including government and public have various industries, companies, institutions or related organizations, come in the job prospective fields for an MBA professional.
Some job profiles are listed here:
Brand Manager
Account Manager
International Business Manager
Marketing Executive
Business Technical Consultant
All the best.

faqs.question: What are the career opportunities after Commerce courses?
faqs.answer:
After completing the undergraduate level course under Commerce, the candidates can find various jobs at entry or junior level in Accounting, Commerce, Banking and Finance and related fields such as Junior Accountant, Operations Management,  Data Analyst, Research and Development Manager, Information Systems Manager,  Project Manager,  etc..
Also Read: Your Career After Doing a Course in Commerce
You May Also Consider:

placements.overview:
A. LBSIM is known for its professional education, highly experienced faculty, meticulously designed infrastructure, impeccable placements and rich academic experience.

A. Special short-duration management development programmes, seminars, conferences and paper presentations are organised by LBSIM from time to time. The students are also taken to various organisations for the purpose of plant visits and organisational study.

A. To encourage extra-curricular activities and creative spirit of the students, LBSIM conducts several fests and events including Regalia, Ritkriti, Rockers, etc.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2024
reviews_list.review_title: Absolutely dissatisfied with every aspect of the college.

review_content.Placements: Placement in this college is very low; only 10% of students from our batch got placed through the college, and the highest package offered was only 2 LPA. There are no top recruiters visiting the college, only less reputed startups, and no students got internships from our college.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very poor, and there are no facilities provided by the college. They lie about the availability of Wi-Fi, and there is no running canteen. There are labs, but you will only go there for photoshoots. The quality of the library is also very poor, with only 2000 edition books available, which are of no use in 2024. Hostel facilities are also inadequate, lacking medical facilities, sports and games, and the quality of food is also very poor.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Computer Applications (MCA Lateral Entry) - Batch of 2024
reviews_list.review_title: Satisfied with the faculty and placement.

review_content.Placements: Placement in this college is excellent. The highest package was INR 17 lakhs annually and the average package was INR 6-7 Lacs. Top companies are TCS, Infosys etc. Our teachers assure you to get placed in a good company. They use their full efforts to get us placed.
review_content.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is very unique. Many institutes make their infrastructure awesome to attract students but I love my college's simplicity. Hostel is just 1 km away and it is decent. I haven't visited the hostel but I have heard from some seniors that it has good facilities.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: I am satisfied with its placements, teachers, environment, and infrastructure.

review_content.Placements: Campus provides placements nationally and internationally in top companies like HCL, etc. Our college also provides interview sessions at the campus itself, and gave students opportunities to participate in extracurricular activities outside campus that were government officials and certified.
review_content.Infrastructure: The food served was great, and the area was large. The furniture was also provided in this college. The washrooms were cleaned and hygienic. Students were highly disciplined and students can easily communicate with peers, because they were friendly.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) - Batch of 2023
reviews_list.review_title: It is a good college for a 2-years MCA program.

review_content.Placements: Placements in our college are quite good. About 70-80% of the total students get placed every year. The highest salary package offered is 8 LPA, and the average salary package offered ranges from 3-3.5 LPA. Almost 8-10 top companies in the country visit the college to recruit students every year.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is good. The college has all the facilities like smart classrooms, libraries, computer labs, Wi-Fi, canteen, etc. The quality of food served in the canteen and hostel mess is very good.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: Dissatisfied with the placements in 2020 due to Covid, but I got placed with 2021 batch.

review_content.Placements: All the regular students got placed from the college. The roles offered were sales executive, business development, HR and Developer, for MCA students in technical line. The highest package offered is 4.68 LPA, and the lowest package is 1.8 LPA.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. The campus has a library, computer labs, Wi-Fi, smart class, auditorium, canteen, classrooms for both MBA and MCA, hostels and parking facilities. The mess is good, but proper hygiene is not maintained. There are a few clubs under which different sports are played.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Computer Applications (MCA Lateral Entry) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Our college has a good infrastructure, experienced and friendly teachers.

review_content.Placements: More than 70% of the students got placed in MNCs. The salary package offered here varies from 3.0 LPA to 2.4 LPA. TCS, SmartData, Technosys, Genpact, Wipro, etc. Top roles offered in our course are junior software developer, quality assurance manager, cybersecurity manager, UI/UX designer, etc. About 40% of the students from our course are doing internships in different cities like Hyderabad, Noida, Lucknow, Gurgaon, Dehradun, Mohali, etc.
review_content.Infrastructure: Our college infrastructure is eco-friendly, and it has a huge space. More than 100 classrooms are available here. The entire campus has a Wi-Fi facility, and it has 2 huge lab rooms with more than 100 computers. Our college library is also a part of the attraction because it contains more than 20,000 books of different courses as well as some motivational books. Our college canteen takes care of your health by serving hygienic food items and also serves spicy dishes. Different types of clubs are available for many activities, including sports, expression, entrepreneurship, digital and content, which will improve your extra skills or talent.

faqs.question: What is the lowest score to get into St. Francis Institute of Management and Research?
faqs.answer: St. Francis Institute of Management and Research accepts MAH CET scores for admission to MMS course. The overall cutoff score for admission among the General All India category was 97.85. This was much higher than the cutoff scores since the past two years.

review_summary.college_name: St. Francis Institute of Management and Research Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: My first-year journey in SFIMAR.

content.Placements: From what I heard, placements here are decent, not that amazing, around 80 - 90% of students get placement opportunities. The average salary package offered is 4 to 5 LPA. It usually depends on students' performance also. Last year, finance students were having fewer opportunities. Good companies like JP Morgan and BlackRock are coming to the college but with lower packages.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good, with clean classrooms, smartboards, projectors, and podiums in each classroom. Centralized AC is provided. For female hygiene, a bin for pads is provided. Libraries and computer labs are also available. I did not opt for the hostel facility, but my friend stayed there. The fees were Rs. 6000 without food facilities. The canteen was providing decent food.

individual_reviews.course: PGDM (General Management) - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: College is providing the best placement opportunities to its students.

content.Placements: Our college has been providing very good placement opportunities to its students. Around 45-50% of students get placements in our college. The highest placement package offered was 13 LPA. The lowest package offered was 3 LPA. The average package offered was 4 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure in our college was well-maintained and fully developed. College was providing all the facilities to its students. College has high-speed Wi-Fi, hostel, canteen, labs, library, etc. Hostel facility was available in our college. Sports facilities were also available at our college.

individual_reviews.title: Great Infrastructure, can improve with the Academics.

content.Placements: About 70% students were placed. The highest package- 8LPA and the lowest 1.4 LPA. This page contains St. Francis Institute of Management and Research MAH MBA CET cutoff 2025, along with other exam cutoffs for various rounds and categories. More exam-related updates are below:

St. Francis Institute of Management and Research MAH MBA CET cutoff 2025 is announced for the final round in the form of percentiles for admission to a variety of MBA/PGDM specialisations for students belonging to different categories and quotas. For the General AI category, St. Francis Institute of Management and Research MBA/PGDM cutoff 2025 fell at 95.42 in the last round.

reviews.review_heading: My first-year journey in SFIMAR.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good, with clean classrooms, smartboards, projectors, and podiums in each classroom. Centralized AC is provided. For female hygiene, a bin for pads is provided. Libraries and computer labs are also available. I did not opt for the hostel facility, but my friend stayed there. The fees were Rs. 6000 without food facilities. The canteen was providing decent food.

reviews.review_heading: College is providing the best placement opportunities to its students.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure in our college was well-maintained and fully developed. College was providing all the facilities to its students. College has high-speed Wi-Fi, hostel, canteen, labs, library, etc. Hostel facility was available in our college. Sports facilities were also available at our college.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good facilities.
reviews.review_text: Our campus surroundings were very good. There was a garden where we could relax with our friends. Hostels were very good. Canteen was available in this college.

reviews.review_heading: Really good out of the box way of teaching every subject.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi if available thought the campus students and faculty can use them. The computer lab is equipped with high-end computers. Each classroom has a projector, AC and mic system so people can train for there presentation. They also have a video conference room and library. Hostel food is average not that good but still, you can manage. There are 3-4 sports courts available on campus and 3-4 indoor games such as carrom and chess which can be used as stress relief.

reviews.review_heading: Great Infrastructure, can improve with the Academics.
reviews.review_text: The campus is Air conditioned. It has 4 computer rooms, a library and a research center. The classrooms are spacious, easily accommodating 60 students per class. There's a chess area, area for carrom and a ground for football, throwball and badminton. St. Francis is known to be a green campus.

reviews.review_heading: There is good infrastructure with an average uniform placements which is not that great.
reviews.review_text: I would say, it is one of few colleges which have a big campus which is not shared with others. There is this entire campus for the management. Also, the infrastructure here is good. There is everything in the auditorium, assembly hall, digital labs on every floor, great library, garden, dog canal and a Wi-Fi facility across the campus. Although the look-wise, it's not that great. Even the canteen here has good food which is reasonably priced, and it's tasty. Also, it has a hostel inside this ca...

reviews.review_heading: The best Management Institute- SFIMAR.
reviews.review_text: SFIMAR has an integrated internet facilitated computer labs, and all the lectures are taken via ppts, reducing the paper wastage. The canteen food is also pretty good, and the hostel rooms are maintained feasible. We don't have any ragging tradition, and the juniors are treated like the younger siblings in the college.

reviews.review_heading: The college days are not just words it is a feeling you have to live it to feel it.
reviews.review_text: The library, sports, and extracurricular activities you name it is on the frontlist. The free Wi-Fi facility will have its versions of usage and rest everything is in place. The management never left anyone unturned to make their students best.

reviews.review_heading: This is a better place to start your journey.
reviews.review_text: SFIMAR has a really good infrastructure compared to the other colleges in Mumbai. The classrooms are comfortable and are fully air-conditioned. The library is air-conditioned, very peaceful and various types of books are available as well. There is enough space for the students to study. There is a computer lab with access to the internet as well.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfying and useful two-year journey.
reviews.review_text: The facilities of the college were good. There were computer labs, libraries which had various magazines and textbooks. The canteen and its food were also nice. A hostel facility was available and Internet facilities were also provided to the students. There was a gym too and the classrooms were well-furnished.

reviews.review_heading: It was OK. Nothing great when it comes to expectations from MBA course.
reviews.review_text:
Facilities were good and the labs were also good. 
There are enough computer rooms and the staff members are always friendly. Classrooms are big.
Sports are limited and the food available in the canteen is not at all good. Honestly, no one liked the canteen.
I did not stay in the hostel but the ones who stayed gave a bad review.

reviews.review_heading: Good MBA college with good placements, infrastructure and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is certified as A+ from NAAC. There is a proper canteen and various other basic amenities. The chess area, the garden, boys' and girls' playing rooms, big classrooms, library, etc are available. The college is always clean and thus, I can conclude that the infrastructure is good.

reviews.review_heading: I recommend this college for those who want an average college yet a disciplined one.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is average because the campus is too small but the facilities provided are very good. There is a good canteen, AC-equipped classrooms, a chess court, a boys common room/girls common room, a small garden, a parking area, practical rooms, labs, PPTs, a badminton court etc.

The PGDM course structure was very good. The faculty was good. It didn’t provide good summer internship as well as final placement. The profile offered was not so good for Finance student. The package was average. Overall, it was good. The learning was good and it offered industry oriented syllabus. All the external faculty was very good, especially, the finance faculty. The placements could have been much better. The PGDM course structure was very good. The faculty was good. It didn’t provide good summer internship as well as final placement. The profile offered was not so good for Finance student. The package was average. Overall, it was good. The learning was good and it offered industry oriented syllabus. All the external faculty was very good, especially, the finance faculty. The placements could have been much better.

reviews.review_heading: Excellent college experience.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is good. AC rooms with smart TV, board, and projectors are available. Gym is available. Hostel for students who come from other states. Good foods services are available. Each day it has some special foods. Food is cheap and pocket-friendly. 5 labs are available. Library and smart library are available. Teachers are best for both counseling.

reviews_list.review_title: One of the best colleges in Navi Mumbai with decent placements and the best corporate environment.

review_content.Placements: Placements in the college are good, and there is good value for money. Nearly 93% of students from our senior batch got placed last year. The highest package offered last year was 10 lacs per annum in the marketing field, but unfortunately, students were not able to crack it. The average package offered here is 4-5 lacs per annum. Aditya Birla Group, Wipro, ITC, Idea, BOI, HDFC, JIO are some of the companies that visit every year for placements. A large number of students got internships last year with decent stipends. Our college has a placement cell, and it tries its best to be useful and efficient enough to help aspirants get their dream jobs.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Our college has good seniors, and seniors are corporate with their juniors.

review_content.Placements: The placement cell team provides good opportunities. In the previous year, the salary package offered was 6.5 LPA.
review_content.Infrastructure: It has a good arrangement for students for their college status. It has a library that contains more than 60 students at a time. It has a biometric for students for calculating proper attendance.
review_content.Faculty: Faculty members in our college are awesome. They all are good and experienced. They show a good presentation for understanding. They correlate with students. They also help the students to improve their skills. They have excellent vocabulary techniques and give good information about further future.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Our seniors are very good and cooperative, and the faculty are very good.

review_content.Placements: The college provides good placements. There is a placement cell in our college. The packages offered are good, but it is based on the student's performance in the interview. Last year, the highest package offered was 6.5 to 7 LPA. The placement cell brings in good companies.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi, well-stocked library, good and AC classrooms are available. Our college organises sports. There are various indoor and outdoor games.

review_summary.college_name: IIBM Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: The infrastructure of campus is good.

content.Placements: The placement opportunity are good. Icici, Pidilite are some of the companies that came for placement. Minimum 55 % is required for MS admission along with entrance examination score of at leas 50 percentage in any of the entrances. Marketing, hr, finance, are some of the courses offered.
content.Infrastructure: College have good facility like AC classroom. Communication lab, and computer lab. Conference hall is there and it has hostel facilities along with Wi-Fi connections in the room. The canteen facilities are rich in quality, the food is provided in and around the campus .

individual_reviews.course: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: A good campus with excellent and teaching skills which encourage students.

content.Placements: Placements were quite good 98% of people got placed. The highest salary was 12lakh and the lowest was 4lakh. Group, Justdial, Pedilte and ICICI were some of the renowned companies visited the campus. Roles varied from sales, business research, Financial analyst. 100% of people got internships in renowned companies. Yes, our college has placement cell and it is very beneficial.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure is very good and the campus is also spacious. It is well equipped with AC, a big ground, library, canteen etc. Hostel rooms are spacious and well equipped with Wi-Fi speciality. Until now we have not faced any issues related infrastructure. The overall infrastructure is good.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: One of the best colleges in Navi Mumbai with decent placements and the best corporate environment.

content.Placements: Placements in the college are good, and there is good value for money. Nearly 93% of students from our senior batch got placed last year. The highest package offered last year was 10 lacs per annum in the marketing field, but unfortunately, students were not able to crack it. The average package offered here is 4-5 lacs per annum. Aditya Birla Group, Wipro, ITC, Idea, BOI, HDFC, JIO are some of the companies that visit every year for placements. A large number of students got internships last year with decent stipends. Our college has a placement cell, and it tries its best to be useful and efficient enough to help aspirants get their dream jobs.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: Our college has good seniors, and seniors are corporate with their juniors.

content.Placements: The placement cell team provides good opportunities. In the previous year, the salary package offered was 6.5 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: It has a good arrangement for students for their college status. It has a library that contains more than 60 students at a time. It has a biometric for students for calculating proper attendance.
content.Faculty: Faculty members in our college are awesome. They all are good and experienced. They show a good presentation for understanding. They correlate with students. They also help the students to improve their skills. They have excellent vocabulary techniques and give good information about further future.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Management Studies (MMS) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: Our seniors are very good and cooperative, and the faculty are very good.

content.Placements: The college provides good placements. There is a placement cell in our college. The packages offered are good, but it is based on the student's performance in the interview. Last year, the highest package offered was 6.5 to 7 LPA. The placement cell brings in good companies.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is good. Wi-Fi, well-stocked library, good and AC classrooms are available. Our college organises sports. There are various indoor and outdoor games.
content.Faculty: The faculty members are awesome and well-experienced. They are qualified from IIM Jamnalal, Bajaj etc. Their teaching techniques are very good. They also use presentations to teach. We get to visit industries outside of Maharashtra as well.

paragraphs: Indira Institute of Business Management admissionsstart with checking the admission criteria followed by application, selection, and admission confirmation. Students can apply online for the desired course. Interested students can follow the steps below to complete theIIBM admission process:
Application Process

Students can go to the website of IIBM and register for the course of choice by filling the application and uploading required documents. The form has to be submitted with specified application fee amount
Selection Process

Indira Institute of Business Management selectionis based on entrance exam scores. Students need to submit valid scores of any of the following exam - CAT/ XAT/ CMAT/ MAT/ ATMA/ MHTCET. Students may also have to register for Centralised Admission Process (CAP) for seat allotment.
Admission Confirmation
Selected students need to report for document verification and pay theIndira Institute of Business Management feesto complete the admission process.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Asia-Pacific Institute of Management New Delhi offers PG and other courses to students. At the PG level, the college offers PGDM courses to students in various specialisations such as Business Communication, Managerial Communication, Decision Science, Management Accounting, Financial Management, and Marketing Management. The other courses provided by the college are MBA and MSc. Candidates can check the Asia-Pacific Institute of Management New Delhi courses along with the eligibility criteria and the total course fee in the table provided below:

faqs.answer: A:    Candidates need to rating at the least 50% aggregate marks in commencement for wellknown class candidates. Minimum 45% aggregate marks in graduation for reserved category applicants. Applicants performing for the final 12 months of UG are also eligible. Candidates qualifying the minimal CAT reduce-off standards determined by the institute.-The aggregate percentage scored in class 10 & 12.-The aggregate percentage obtained in a three-year/four-year degree course or equivalent.-Each candidate's performance in Personal Interview is assessed and marks are allotted accordingly.-Extra points (from 1-5) are given to candidates having work experience. individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) (General) - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: I'm satisfied with the college.

content.Placements: The percentage of students getting placed is above 60 percent. The highest package offered is between 7 Lacs and 9 Lacs, the lowest package is between 4 Lacs and 5 Lacs, and the average is near 6 Lacs offered by my courses. Companies that come for recruiting for my courses include Axis Bank, JPMorgan, EY, JIO, Vodafone, etc. At least you need to have 60% for an internship. Roles depend on student skills.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is very good. There are many seminar halls, classrooms with AC and Wi-Fi, and teachers have their own personal cabins. There are boardrooms for meetings with teachers and different boardrooms for student meetings, as well as discussion rooms for students. The library is very big with three floors filled with many books and articles. Hostel facilities, food in the canteen, and medical facilities are also available.

individual_reviews.title: Our college placements are below average.

content.Placements: The average salary package ranges between 4 to 6 LPA. The highest salary package is 12 LPA. Students get a vast opportunity for jobs and everyone got placed. The best opportunities are in the marketing field. Companies like Nestle, Airtel, Earnst and Young, India Bulls, HDFC, ICICI, Dabur, Just dial, and Gartner are the recruiters.
content.Infrastructure: Every Wednesday college organises various extracurriculars, sports activities, seminars, industry talks, etc. College has computer labs and a library. They don't have their hostels but are connected with a private hostel. Hostel has a good infrastructure and good security system. They provide hostels separately in different areas. Hostel has a good mess where there are different menus for different days and they change the menu weekly.

Asia Pacific Institute of Management Application Process 2025

Eligible students whoi have a valid score in the entrance exam (for MBA and PGDM) can visit the website of Asia Pacific Institute of Management to fill the application form online. Selection Process

Counselling & Fee Payment

During our college time, the maintenance of the hostel and college was done yearly, like painting and other work. The hostel needs to improve a little bit because we don't like the infrastructure, especially since the rooms are very small in hostels.

reviews.review_heading: Those who are looking for placements after studies should definitely choose this college.
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure is very good, both the hostels and college buildings are very neat and clean. The campus of the college is very big and protected by CCTV and security guards. The college hostel is very near by only, just walkable distance from campus.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best college to take PGDM .
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is good and every class room is enabled with Wi-Fi facility. The classrooms are fully smart class. The college hostel is very near to college, it's just walkable distance only. The college hostel provides both veg and non veg meals to students as per their requirements.

reviews.review_heading: Asia Pacific has been a great college in terms of  faculty, infrastructure and placements.
reviews.review_text: Although the infrastructure of our college is mediocre, it has an astonishing library. The college is digitally competent in providing classrooms and lecture facilities. There are 2 auditoriums and 5-6 seminar halls in the campus. The canteen is on the 8th floor, and it provides all the necessary food and snacks. The college has 2 hostels with shared room facilities and furnished with internet services as well. Both A/C and non-A/C rooms are available in the hostels so that the students can choo...

reviews.review_heading: A good college for management aspirants.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi enabled campus, classrooms, labs, and library are available in the college. The classrooms have laptop and projectors. The canteen is on the rooftop and quality of food available is good. Hostels are around 1 kilometre away from campus, and there are separate hostels for girls and boys. The hostel rooms are good.

reviews.review_heading: A perfect top B-School of India.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is basic which is expected from a B-School. There is no Wi-Fi in the campus, the labs are functional with a good standard of software and hardware, the classrooms are air conditioned, sports facilities are available in the nearby sports complex. Canteen is well stocked and healthy thaali is available. Hostel is available for boys and girls separately and the rooms are big enough for two sharing basis. No issues regarding the infrastructure we're or are being faced by me.

reviews.review_heading: This is my dream college. My career and cherishable life in APIM are good.
reviews.review_text: The whole campus is enabled with the Wi-Fi facility. There is a three-floored fully air-conditioned and enormous library with all the latest books. Both indoor and outdoor games are available for students on the campus. There is a great auditorium for special events. The quality of food is good at the low price.

reviews.review_heading: Really good infrastructure of the college.
reviews.review_text: In terms of infrastructure, the college is very good. All facilities are provided, and cleanliness is taken care of. The library is an add-on to the infrastructure where you can sit with your friends and work on all your assignments. Classrooms are a bit boring in terms of amenities where you don't have mics for presentations. In short space, there is a beautifully structured building with the best part, i.e. Indian flag. Computer labs are good enough.

reviews.review_heading: Overall this is not a college which can help you shape your career and you should try somewhere else
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is good but for 1st year students only, it means that when you get promoted to 2nd year then you will be shifted to 2nd floor and that is worse, like the AC doesn't work and the toilets are very dirty and there are no lights in the corridor even.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with everything. The faculty, college, infrastructure, and placements are good.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the campus is good, and even I think one of the best in Delhi NCR. We have a canteen on the 8th floor. There are a three-story library and three computer labs on the campus. There is a medical room and sports room. The whole campus is well-equipped with the A/C and enabled with the Wi-Fi facility. The classrooms are good.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 88 published reviews , 54 reviews are verified.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Asia-Pacific Institute of Management, New Delhi

likes.text: Almost all the students take their internship projects from college because very good companies like Hitachi, Blue Star, Grant Thorton, ICICI Securities, Motilal Oswal Securities, Amul, Godfrey Philips etc.
The college provides you with a great platform for getting yourself placed, as well as ensures that each and every student gets placed with a good brand and CTC.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
reviews_list.review_title: There is a very good faculty and better placement than other universities and it is very cheap.

review_content.Placements: In my college, approximately 60 to 70% of students are placed every year. The highest package is 50 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA to 4 LPA. Every 3rd year, students get a chance to work as interns from our college. In this college, new courses are also offered, and they prepared us for the interview.
review_content.Infrastructure: There are many classrooms and labs. There is also library in which we study from morning to evening at 8 o'clock. There are very good facilities in our hostel. There are many available sports like volleyball, football, badminton, cricket, chess, kho, kabaddi, and many more. Mess is also very good, and food quality is good.

reviews_list.batch_info: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.) - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: I am disappointed with their placement promises.

review_content.Placements: Placements in this college are very bad. In my batch time, only 2 pharma companies from Gujarat came to my college, and they collected resumes only. They did not provide any placements. At the start of the course, the college talked a lot about their placement partner, but at last, no placement companies came to this college.
review_content.Infrastructure: Actually, the college infrastructure is very good. Hostels are also good, but the food quality is not good. Classrooms are very good. Labs are also good for experiments, and the library is very well-managed. For all departments, a separate library is available.

overview_faqs.question: Does Mewar University refund fees?
overview_faqs.answer: Mewar University's system and management is on the strict side and they are not very lenient about their made up policies and rules and regulations.No, they don't actually refund the fees.The university says-No application for refund of fees will be entertained once the candidate has completed the process of admission. After Pre-R.D.C. No refund will be entertained.

overview_faqs.question: What is the fee structure for B.Tech Mechanical Engineering in Mewar University?
overview_faqs.answer: B.Tech Courses: Chemical, Civil, Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics & Communication, Mechanical, Mining, Electrical and Electronics, Petrochemical. For all the above branches the tuition fee is Rs. 1,70,000 per year. However a college can change the college fees based on current situation Therefore you are contact the college directly to learn more about it. In addition it is best to contact the seniors or admission department to get a proper information.

overview_faqs.question: What is the BCom application fee at Mewar University?
overview_faqs.answer: The application fee for BCom at Mewar University is aroud INR 1,000. Candidates must pay the application fee to register on the official website of Mewar University. Candidates must also pay an provisional admission fee of INR 5,000 along with application fee. Applicants can pay online through Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Net Banking.

review_summary.college_name: MU Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Diploma in Elementary Education (D.EL.ED.) - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: This university helps every middle class student and gives them the right education.

content.Placements: There are many students placed in various institutes. The highest placement package is 5 LPA and the lowest placement package is 1 LPA. There are many institutional visits yearly, etc. Every student can do an internship as they want and apply where they choose.
content.Infrastructure: There are many facilities available on the campus, and for each department, every classroom has Wi-Fi. There are labs for each department. Classrooms are very big and well-furnished. There are certified and digital libraries and every department has a separate library and the sitting area is good. There are good quality facilities in the hostel. The food quality is like home. There is a hospital also available on campus. There are also many sports grounds like cricket, football, volleyball, badminton and indoor games also available like table tennis, chess and many others.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.) - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: Good infrastructure and the highest package is about 2 crores. There is a good placement ratio.

content.Placements: This university has a great placement ratio of 99.99%. Many companies visit and take placements of students. In my course, Cipla, Sunpharma, and many top companies visit the university. All students have 100% done their internship. In the last year, 26 LPA was the highest package, and the lowest was 8 LPA. This is a very good ratio for all of these courses.
content.Infrastructure: There is strong Wi-Fi connectivity. There are new and highly equipped labs. All classrooms are good. There is a smart board in every class. There is a certified library. The hostel is very clean and hygienic. The food quality is very good, with an FSO-certified mess. There is a hospital. There are many playgrounds for different games, and indoor games are also available.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: There is a very good faculty and better placement than other universities and it is very cheap.

content.Placements: In my college, approximately 60 to 70% of students are placed every year. The highest package is 50 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA to 4 LPA. Every 3rd year, students get a chance to work as interns from our college. In this college, new courses are also offered, and they prepared us for the interview.
content.Infrastructure: There are many classrooms and labs. There is also library in which we study from morning to evening at 8 o'clock. There are very good facilities in our hostel. There are many available sports like volleyball, football, badminton, cricket, chess, kho, kabaddi, and many more. Mess is also very good, and food quality is good.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: I am disappointed with their placement promises.

content.Placements: Placements in this college are very bad. In my batch time, only 2 pharma companies from Gujarat came to my college, and they collected resumes only. They did not provide any placements. At the start of the course, the college talked a lot about their placement partner, but at last, no placement companies came to this college.
content.Infrastructure: Actually, the college infrastructure is very good. Hostels are also good, but the food quality is not good. Classrooms are very good. Labs are also good for experiments, and the library is very well-managed. For all departments, a separate library is available.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B.Pharm.) - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: I am always thankful to my college, which gives me a better platform for my future.

content.Placements: Every year, about 70-80% of students get placed in the top companies like Cadila, Zydus, Macleods, Helios, and Claroid Cipla. Students get paced with the salary package that ranges from 4-5 LPA. Almost 100% of students got internships after completing their courses. Sometimes in mid-sessions, students get placed in MNC companies.
content.Infrastructure: Good labs and library facilities are available. Wi-Fi facilities are available in the hostel and library also. Hot water is also available in the hostel during the winter season. The environment of my college is evergreen. Separate boys and girls hostels are available. Mess is well-mannered. The food of the mess is awesome.

admission_overview.college_name: MU Admission 2025: CUET, Process, Eligibility & Dates

admission_process.title: Mewar University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Mewar University admission 2025is currently open.Mewar Universityconducts multiple entrance exams such as CUET and MUEE for admission to its various course levels, like UG,PG, doctoral, certificate and diploma. Hence, it can be considered that Mewar University admission is entrance-based for most of its courses. Students are required to go through the university-conducted and national-level or state-level entrances and then appear for the university-level selection rounds for final admission. Read on to know more about Mewar University admission 2025.

Candidates interested in getting into Mewar University are required to follow the CUET/MUEE exam and Mewar University application process. Check out the below table for details onMewar University course admissionwhich is inclusive of its eligibility & selection:

Mewar University course admissions 2025 for all of its courses are done based on entrance exams. Check below the complete Mewar University admission process:Application:Candidates must register themselves by downloading the registration form and then filling out the application form with the application fee of INR 1,000Selection rounds:Candidate must appear for theCUETorMUEEentrance exam and after selection rounds and then wait for the release of their results.Admission confirmation:Once the selection rounds are done, the candidates can mail the documents to (admission@mewaruniversity.org) for verification. Aspirants need to pay a course fee to confirm their seat in the university.
For more information about Mewar University check out the below video:

faqs.question: Is MAT required for MBA at Mewar University?
faqs.answer: No.MAT is not compulsory for admission to the MBA at Mewar University. CUET PG scores or MUEE scores are accepted for admission in MBA courses. There are a total of 360 seats across all Management streams. A minimum of 60% in graduation is required to be eligible for Mewar University's Master of Business Administration (MBA) program. faqs.answer: Mewar University Chittorgarh is an independent institution that was set up in 2008 by the Rajasthani government under Act No. 4 of 2009, which was approved by the state legislature (Government of Rajasthan), For MBA Admissions, The Mewar University accepts the CUET PG Score also they conduct their own entrance exam MUEE (Mewar University Entrance Exam). The university offers a total of 570 seats which are spread across the thespecializationss such as Safety Management,Business Analytics, Disaster Management, Human Resources (HR), Rural Management, etc. Most of the seats are allocated to the integrated BBA+MBA course, i.e.120 seats.

faqs.question: Is CUET exam date announced?
faqs.answer: National Testing Agency (NTA) will announce the CUET 2025 exam date anytime soon at nta.ac.in. It is expected that CUET UG 2025 exam will be held in May/June. The exam will be conducted in multiple slots each day. The number of CUET exam slots will depend upon the number of candidates registered for the exam.CUET 2025 registrations will commence atcuetug.ntaonline.in. Candidates willing to appear for the CUET for admission to UG courses of Central, State, Private or Deemed universities must fill the online application form to appear for the CUET 2025 exam. Only registered candidates will be able to appear for the exam as per the schedule.

faqs.question: Is Mewar University good for placements?
faqs.answer: The University has had a decent placement record in recent years. During 2024 placements, the overall highest package stood at INR 2.60 crore per annum. Check the complete insights related to Mewar University placements 2024 from the table below: Particulars Placement Statistics (2024) Highest package INR 2.60 crore per annum Average package INR 7 LPA Lowest package INR 4.20 LPA

faqs.question: What is the highest package offered at Mewar University?
faqs.answer: The highest package offered to the 2024 passing out batch was INR 2.60 crore per annum. Earlier, the highest package offered to students during 2023 placements was INR 24 LPA. Looking at the past three years' statistics, an improving trend was recorded in Mewar University highest package, which is depicted below: Particulars Placement Statistics (2022) Placement Statistics (2023) Placement Statistics (2024) Highest package INR 21 LPA INR 24 LPA INR 2.60 crore per annum

faqs.question: How is Mewar University for MBA in terms of placements?
faqs.answer: With a validated track file of a success placements, Mewar University holds excellent promise for MBA placements. At the cease of the university's 2023 placement consultation, 574 out of 985 college students had determined suitable placements. During the 2023 placements, the very best bundle provided was INR 24 LPA, whereas the common bundle became INR 6.60 LPA. During the placement pressure, outstanding corporations including ICICI Prudential, Wipro, TCS, Genpact, Muthoot Group, Ceat Tyre, SBI Life, Lupin, and Max Hospital presented various opportunities for MBA graduates. In addition you can check the official website.

faqs.question: How are LLB placements at MU - Mewar University?
faqs.answer: LLB placements at MU-Mewar University 0.5 LPA is the smallest package and 3 LPA is the biggest. The best companies visit our campus to hire. Each student gets a package. some of packages are 28%in engineering, 19% in eucation, 16% in operations, 13% in business development, and 28% others.

The academic reputation, dedicated faculty, and well-laid infrastructure are some of the reasons of the institute's high ranks among numerous ranking agencies. hostel.description:
No. of rooms are 480 & Room Type is Four student each room and Capacity is: 2300.

The hostels provide several sports facilities for its inmates, which include badminton, basketball, volleyball, cricket and indoor games such as table tennis, and chess. In order to ensure physical as well as spiritual fitness for its future professionals, the hostellers are provided with a gymnasium. Besides, yoga and meditation classes are held on a daily basis.

To improve the learning process, the management has provided extended access to the library and computer centre, with all the essential software loaded as per the curriculum. The University also takes due care to protect the religious, cultural and social beliefs of the students. Each festival is celebrated with full fervour and enthusiasm.

In order to accommodate students coming from far-off places, the University provides separate air-cooled hostel facilities for boys and girls within the campus. The University has its own fleet of transport and ensures safe commuting between the city and campus, with vehicles plying at reasonable intervals. Right now there are 2000 boys in four hostel and 500 girls are in two hostel.

reviews.review_text: Infrastructure here is very good. Modern smart classrooms are present here, and labs are good, but they need a little modification in equipment. reviews.review_heading: Absolutely the worst college.
reviews.review_text: There are more than 1200 staff members in the university. All are well trained and experienced in their field. The infrastructure was very good according to our region. All sorts of labs and libraries are available for each particular subject. The food was normal in taste.

reviews.review_heading: The college had decent infrastructure and average placements.
reviews.review_text: This college had a decent infrastructure for the MCA college. The college has Wi-Fi, labs, a library, canteen, classrooms, sports etc. Facilities were available for the students. The hostel facility was available for the students. Mess and canteen food was good to eat.

reviews.review_heading: This is best for those student who are not regular.
reviews.review_text: The college and hostel infrastructure, along with the department, is commendable. The food at the hostel is also better compared to other hostels, although occasionally the taste can be extremely unpleasant. The meals prepared are not always favored by the students.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, our college is not so good for securing a job, but it is good for obtaining only a degree.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is very good, but the mess food is the worst. Wi-Fi is available everywhere in the college. The library and classrooms are average. Sports activities do not happen according to plan; only a few students have benefited, while the rest have not had chances.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has value for money.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is very good. Our campus is well-maintained.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with this college.
reviews.review_text: The Wi-Fi facility is available in the hostel. The library is a good place to study for exams or any other studies. Medical facilities are available in case of emergency. Our college has a canteen. They provide a variety of food items like tea, samosa, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Overall my experience about Mewar University was excellent.
reviews.review_text: Mewar University having Excellent Infrastructure, Smart Classrooms, Mootcourt facility, Central Library, full Wi-Fi Campus, Medical Facilities, Sports and Games facilities etc. All such things makes Mewar University perfect places for prospective students.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied because of faculty and good placement.
reviews.review_text: All the facilities and infrastructure present in my university is too good. All the classroom has well equipped labs facility with high-speed internet connection. Also all the medical facility are available here with clean and hygienic hostel facility too.

reviews.review_heading: Overall the university is very good. Fee is also very nominal here.
reviews.review_text: If you talk about infrastructure, then I would say that this place is very good to explore, to learn new things. Students from every State in India visit here to study even from african countries. Hostel and mess are good, not so better but I can say food is healthy here and overall situation is good here.

college_info.college_name: MU Scholarship Details

paragraphs: Mewar University awards various scholarship schemes to students. The university provides scholarships to various deserving and meritorious students enrolled in UG programmes. The criteria of entitlement for scholarships is as follows:
Under this scholarship scheme, students securing 90% and above marks in Class 12 are exempted from paying 75% of their tuition fee

The Scholarship Schemes of Central and State governments for ST/ SC/ OBC / Minority/ J&K/ Northeast students are applicable for this type of scholarship as per the criteria fixed by the respective governments. If a student is already receiving an incentive or scholarship from the Government and Other sources of sponsored schemes such as scholarship for SC/ ST/ OBC/ Minority / J&K / AICTE/  and others, he/she shall not be eligible for the Mewar University meritorious scholarship or even incentive.
Under this scholarship scheme, students with 85% and above marks in Class 12 are exempted from paying 25% of their tuition fee

Under this scholarship scheme, General students whose parents are economically weaker and have income less than INR 1 LPA, and have 75% or more marks are eligible for a 50% scholarship in tuition fees.

Under this scholarship scheme, one student from each department is adjudged for excellence in extra-curricular activities such as oratory, sports, presentation, and cultural activity, and others are reimbursed 50% of the tuition fee
Download the Mewar University Scholarships Brochure

The GATE 2026 exam is underway for admission to Phd course , with the next sessions scheduled for Feb 14, 2026 and Feb 15, 2026.

college_info.intro:
Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences popular courses are BTech and MBA. The university offers a BTech programme to students across several specialisations such as Computer Science and Information Technology, Mechatronics Engineering, and Automobile Engineering. Symbiosis Indore BTech students are placed in top companies in various sectors. Further, SUAS Indore BTech students can work as Web Developers, Data Science Engineer, Automotive Developer, Robotics Engineer, and others.
Symbiosis Indore is one of the eminent universities. The university offers an MBA programme to students in specialisations, including Banking, Financial Services & Insurance, and Marketing. Symbiosis Indore MBA students can seek higher education and work as Business Analysts, Finance Managers, Compliance Analysts, Market Research Analysts, Investment Bankers, and others. Candidates can check the popular programmes offered at Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences in the table provided below:

reviews_list.review_title: Poor management and uneventful campus life.

review_content.Placements: Placement services provided are below par both in UG and PG courses. Companies do not prefer to come to this college, and the ones that conduct drives offer very low packages. The best company till date has been Barclays, which ultimately got disappointed because of the quality of the students. review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is better than most colleges. It offers comfortable classrooms, labs, and a central library. review_summary.college_name: Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: BBA in Logistics and Supply Chain Management - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Full college view, auditorium, basketball court, and hostel.

content.Placements: In the logistics and supply chain management course, 100% of students are placed. The highest package offered is 13 LPA after BBA, and the average package is 7 LPA. The top recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, Mahindra, Eicher, Maersk, Wipro, and John Deere.
content.Infrastructure: College infrastructure is very good and we have a digital library, smart classrooms fully air-conditioned, high-speed Wi-Fi, an amphitheatre, a big auditorium, a basketball court, a gaming zone, a cultural centre, a skill center, and a canteen. There is a hostel, gym, mess, and Nescafé in college.

individual_reviews.course: BBA in Digital Media and Marketing - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Review of Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences.

content.Placements: It offers placements but not as to your expectations. You will have to work hard and try to find the job which suits you. This a private college and the more experience you gather on your CV or resume, the more it's going to help you in the future.
content.Infrastructure: Food is good as the canteen offers a variety of food menu and the hostel has a lot of amenities like the gym, the mess, basketball court, volleyball court, etc. Facilities are under surveillance and are safe. It also offers vending machines for students to eat snacks or munchies.

individual_reviews.course: BBA in Banking, Financial Services and Insurance - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Poor management and uneventful campus life.

content.Placements: Placement services provided are below par both in UG and PG courses. Companies do not prefer to come to this college, and the ones that conduct drives offer very low packages. The best company till date has been Barclays, which ultimately got disappointed because of the quality of the students. Internship roles offered are mostly unpaid, irrelevant, and mostly of sales which provides students with very little exposure to their field.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is better than most colleges. It offers comfortable classrooms, labs, and a central library. The location of this college can be a problem at times as it is situated very far from the city, often resulting in issues while booking cabs. Hostel facilities are good as well. However, the food could be better.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Information Technology - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: The right review of the right college.

content.Placements: The placements are good here. The average CTC offered is 11 Lacs and the highest package offered is 46 Lacs. The placements department helps us to crack high packages. If you don't get place in the on-campus drive, you are sent to Pune for other company interviews. Overall, the experience here is good and if you have skills, you can easily get placed.
content.Infrastructure: The college has the best infrastructure in Indore as well as in Madhya Pradesh. They have the biggest auditorium in the city and the biggest building. All the departments have their separate buildings here. The hostel is also very big and spacious. The overall experience is nice here and I recommend you to visit first and then decide about the admission.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: I am satisfied with facilities and earlier placements.

content.Placements: Top recruiting companies like Byju's, Greendeck, Muniversiti, and Walbury Technolabs visit our campus. Since all students must do internships and all students get internships. Placements offered are average. The highest salary package offered is 27 LPA and the average salary package offered is 6 LPA to 8 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences is very good. Although classrooms don't have any air-conditioning, major labs have air-conditioners. There are labs that every mechatronics engineering student should learn about. The workshop is very useful to students.

admission_process.title: SUAS Indore Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences orSUAS Indore admission 2025is both merit and entrance-based.SUAS Indoreaccepts national-level entrance exams like CAT, MAT, XAT, etc. SNAP and SET Test conducted bySymbiosis International (Deemed) Universityis also accepted for admission. The university offers 11 courses through eight schools at UG and PG levels. MBA and BBA are the top courses of SUAS Indore. Candidates seeking to get into the university can read the following article to know more about the courses, eligibility, selection criteria, and admission process of the university.

The university offers a variety of programmes in full-time mode. Students need to make sure that they satisfy the eligibility criteria of the desired programme before applying. Check below the key highlights forSUAS Indore admission:

Class 12 with 50% (45% for reserved category) aggregate from a recognised board
Merit + PI + SOP
Graduation degree in Computer Science Engineering or a related field such as Information Technology, Electronics, or Electrical Engineering etc from a recognised university with 55% aggregate

Symbiosis Indore admissions are both merit and entrance-based. To begin the admission process, candidates have to register for the course of their choice. Before applying, students must ensure that they satisfy the admission requirements of the desired course. Below are the steps to completeSUAS Indore admission process:
Step 1: SUAS Indore Application Process 2025
Candidates can apply for UG and PG courses via online mode. Aspirants applying for MBA or PhD have to pay an application fee of INR 1,500. The registration fee for other courses is INR 1,000.
Step 2: Selection Rounds

SUAS admission to BTech and MBA is based on the entrance exam score. Candidates have to qualify for JEE Main or SET or CUET for BTech and MAT, SNAP, CAT or CMAT for MBA programme. The selection for BSc and BBA programme is based on merit in the last qualifying exam. The shortlisted aspirants are further called for a personal interview round.
Step 3: Merit List

After the selection rounds are completed, Symbiosis Indore prepares a merit list based on the performance of the candidates in all the selection rounds. The university further informs the same to the candidates and will call for the rounds to confirm admission in appropriate rounds.
Step 4: Admission Confirmation
After candidates get selected, they must complete their enrollment by submitting the requiredSUAS Indore feewithin the given deadline to secure admission.

hostel_campus.college_name: Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences Infrastructure Details & Reviews

hostel.description: University has a separate hostels for boys and girls with all advance facilities. The building is G plus designed with 6 stories. Security guards are available round the clock and the hostels are under 24 hour surveillance. A recreation room with TV, cable and newspapers. indoor and outdoor gaming facility are also available.

library.description: SUAS library houses a rich collection of books, magazines, newsletter and journals on different subjects. It has also subscribed to the EBSCO e-journal package for engineering and management faculties. The library is fully automated, providing a friendly, comfortable zone to the readers.

sports.description: Available Facilities: Badminton Court, Basketball Court, Cricket Ground, Football Ground, Table Tennis, Taekwondo, Athletics, Handball, Softball, Baseball, Kho-Kho, Judo

hostel.description: University has a separate hostels for boys and girls with all advance facilities. The building is G plus designed with 6 stories. Security guards are available round the clock and the hostels are under 24 hour surveillance. A recreation room with TV, cable and newspapers. indoor and outdoor gaming facility are also available.

sports.description: Available Facilities: Badminton Court, Basketball Court, Cricket Ground, Football Ground, Table Tennis, Taekwondo, Athletics, Handball, Softball, Baseball, Kho-Kho, Judo

labs.description: Available Facilities: Computer Lab, Language lab, IT Lab

reviews.review_heading: Full college view, auditorium, basketball court, and hostel.
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure is very good and we have a digital library, smart classrooms fully air-conditioned, high-speed Wi-Fi, an amphitheatre, a big auditorium, a basketball court, a gaming zone, a cultural centre, a skill center, and a canteen. There is a hostel, gym, mess, and Nescafé in college.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences.
reviews.review_text: Food is good as the canteen offers a variety of food menu and the hostel has a lot of amenities like the gym, the mess, basketball court, volleyball court, etc. Facilities are under surveillance and are safe. It also offers vending machines for students to eat snacks or munchies.

reviews.review_heading: Poor management and uneventful campus life.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is better than most colleges. It offers comfortable classrooms, labs, and a central library. The location of this college can be a problem at times as it is situated very far from the city, often resulting in issues while booking cabs. Hostel facilities are good as well. However, the food could be better.

reviews.review_heading: The right review of the right college.
reviews.review_text: The college has the best infrastructure in Indore as well as in Madhya Pradesh. They have the biggest auditorium in the city and the biggest building. All the departments have their separate buildings here. The hostel is also very big and spacious. The overall experience is nice here and I recommend you to visit first and then decide about the admission.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with facilities and earlier placements.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of Symbiosis University of Applied Sciences is very good. Although classrooms don't have any air-conditioning, major labs have air-conditioners. There are labs that every mechatronics engineering student should learn about. The workshop is very useful to students.

reviews.review_heading: World class infrastructure with a taste of skills .
reviews.review_text: We have excellent infrastructure which is the best among any of the colleges in Indore or Madhya Pradesh. We have fully air-conditioned smart labs with updated computers. Also, you can find projectors and smart boards in every classroom and a central library with a beautiful interior. Hostel facilities are also very good. However, there you may find an issue with food served in mess and canteen. Medical facilities you can find for a general check-up. You may find some sports as well, such as law...

reviews.review_heading: Not happy with the facilities.
reviews.review_text: The classrooms, labs, hostels are top notch, no complaints regarding that, eye-catching Auditorium (only thing I love about the college). Hostel mess is also amazing. The problem begins from here, College canteen, even a thele waala is better than that, at this point of time canteen is only used for making chai for the faculty and staff members. There's only one shop outside the college where we at least get maggi and bhel apart from that the only saviour is the retail store within the managemen...

reviews.review_heading: This college provides great placements.
reviews.review_text: This college provides departmental libraries, central libraries, and e-books. It also conducts seminars, workshops, and online doubt solving. The canteen is also available. Sports like basketball, cricket, and football are available. It also provides an amphitheater.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with faculty, infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Good infrastructure with elevator and stairs. Different labs for different courses with basic requirements. The hostel facility is good as it provides weekly tours, sports, and washing facilities.

reviews.review_heading: The fee is high compared to the facilities provided.
reviews.review_text: The campus is huge compared to the crowd. There is a central library on campus, where all the study-related material can be found. Besides that, there is a departmental library in both buildings of B.Tech and management.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied because of its helpful faculty members and the curriculum of this college.
reviews.review_text: All the necessary facilities are available are required for this university. The campus has Wi-Fi which is accessible to class and laboratories, and even in a small corner of campus. Laboratories are highly managed, high performance with high configuration PC is set up, and all laboratories are air-conditioned. All classrooms are also well managed, each classroom contains its own projector. The central library of our college has almost all the courses book. The food served in the mess is also sa...

reviews.review_heading: Fully satisfied with this college, very good placement, the infrastructure was fantastic.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure structure of Symbiosis Indore was excellent. Wi-Fi was available 24/7 in hostel and college both.2 computer labs r available in the college.2 central libraries r in college. Quality of food in mess and canteen is good. The medical clinic is available 24/7 in the hostel. And mostly all grounds are available for sports.

reviews.review_heading: Symbiosis, Indore don't come here.
reviews.review_text: Facilities provided are quite good, good IT labs, proper infrastructure of both hostel and college, hostel rooms are spacious, good quality food provided in mess. Only issue is that there is a big auditorium of no use, not even a single event is done.

reviews.review_heading: It has poor placements, management and faculty with more emphasis on management courses than B.Tech.
reviews.review_text: There is a proper infrastructure on the campus with adequate labs and classroom facilities. Labs have proper systems. Wi-Fi is available only if you are in the college hostel. Otherwise, there is no Wi-Fi on the campus. The food served in the hostel is proper and hygienic. Sports facilities are quite poor, and there is no dedicated sports coach or faculty member in the college. There are poor medical facilities as well. The canteen is average and doesn't have a lot of varieties.

reviews.review_heading: There is a good infrastructure, poor placements, faculty members and management.
reviews.review_text: The only advantage of our college is its infrastructure. Our college offers well-equipped labs, classrooms and a library. Wi-Fi is available for hostellers only and not for daily scholars. The food served in the hostel and canteen is proper and hygienic. Our college has basketball, lawn tennis, volleyball and football grounds. These fields are not well maintained. If you are not in the college hostel, then it is quite difficult to access the sports facilities.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology offers a wide range of programmes to students at the UG and PG levels. The college is mainly concerned with streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. At the UG level, the college offers courses such as B.E. / B.Tech. At the PG level, the college offers courses such as M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. Vignan's Institute of Information Technology courses are offered to students in Full Time mode. Further, the fees structure for Vignan's Institute of Information Technology courses stands around INR 70,000 to 2,74,800.

faqs.answer: A:    In Vignan's Institute of Information Technology, the application fee for the MBA programme amounts to INR 1,000. The application form can be filled up online along with the fee payment through debit/credit card or net banking. For an offline application, a demand draft for INR 1,000 must be drawn in favour of the VFSTR application account; this must be sent with the application form duly completed. The MBA programme focuses on various specializations like Finance, Marketing, HR, and Operations. It helps train students with a full-fledged business management education.

reviews_list.review_title: College is the best for the students who got a rank between 6000 and 15000 in the EAMCET.

review_content.Placements: Every year, at least 90 percent of students are placed. Until now, the maximum package is 44 LPA, and the minimum is 3.4 LPA. The top recruiters are Infosys and Amazon. The top roles offered are for software engineers. Internships from top companies like Infosys and Amazon, where they can see the skills of the students.
review_content.Infrastructure: There are 250 acres of land, which are 3 blocks. The first block consists of the first year block of engineering, and 2 block consists of 2nd year to 4th year students. The third block consists of pharma students, and there are three canteens, which are best for meals.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science - Batch of 2029
reviews_list.review_title: The college is where we pursue our dreams.

review_content.Placements: Currently, I am pursuing my first year of my B.Tech, so almost 90 percent of my seniors got placed in my course. The highest package offered ranges from 13-14 LPA, and the lowest package ranges from 5-6 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Wipro, Infosys, Deloitte, WNS and many more. Almost 90-95 percent of students got internships from my course.
review_content.Infrastructure: In my college, labs are very neat and clean. Washrooms are not at all well-maintained. Many food options are available in our mess with affordable prices for students. It also serves good quality of food. It provides first aid when we are injured or in any emergency. We have a very big playground to play different kinds of sports.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2029
reviews_list.review_title: College is overall good.

review_content.Placements: Electronics and communication engineering is a good branch for securing core jobs, either private or government, whether it is the VLSI side or the embedded systems side, and the packages are good at the core side. NVIDIA is one of the top companies that offers core jobs.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is average when it comes to our college. Our college has no certain signal, no Wi-Fi, and the labs are not good because they do not have proper equipment to do experiments. When it comes to the library, it is not enough for us to study the depth of the subject.

individual_reviews.title: Our college is good at everything, good labs, indoor and outdoor activities.

content.Placements: Nearly 60 percent of the students are placed in this year’s campus recruitment. Moreover, maximum people are selected in Infosys. The top package is 50 LPA, and the roles offered in the companies are software engineer, AI developer, etc.
content.Infrastructure: The college infrastructure is very good, and we have good grounds. All kinds of activities are done in our institution, like sports and hackathons. The atmosphere of the canteen is also very cool. One thing that has to change is the timing and the quality of the food.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence ) - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Has well trained professor and well behaviour students.

content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure spans about 250 acres and contains playgrounds like basketball courts, cricket grounds, shuttle courts, etc.,. Mainly three major structures: the main block for 2nd, 3rd, and 4th years, the pharmacy block, and the juniors’ block.

faqs.question: What entrance exams are accepted by Vignans Institute of Information Technology for admission to MBA?
faqs.answer: The primary entrance exam for MBA admissions at Vignan's Institute of Information Technology (VIIT) is the AP ICET (Andhra Pradesh Integrated Common Entrance Test). In addition, depending on certain requirements established by the institute, results from other pertinent national tests like the CAT, MAT, or XAT may also be taken into consideration for admission. It is recommended to visit the official VIIT website for the most recent changes.
