hostel_campus.college_name: Vignan's Institute of Information Technology Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Our college is good at everything, good labs, indoor and outdoor activities.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is very good, and we have good grounds. All kinds of activities are done in our institution, like sports and hackathons. The atmosphere of the canteen is also very cool. One thing that has to change is the timing and the quality of the food.

reviews.review_heading: Has well trained professor and well behaviour students.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure spans about 250 acres and contains playgrounds like basketball courts, cricket grounds, shuttle courts, etc.,. Mainly three major structures: the main block for 2nd, 3rd, and 4th years, the pharmacy block, and the juniors’ block.

reviews.review_heading: College is the best for the students who got a rank between 6000 and 15000 in the EAMCET.
reviews.review_text: There are 250 acres of land, which are 3 blocks. The first block consists of the first year block of engineering, and 2 block consists of 2nd year to 4th year students. The third block consists of pharma students, and there are three canteens, which are best for meals.

reviews.review_heading: The college is where we pursue our dreams.
reviews.review_text: In my college, labs are very neat and clean. Washrooms are not at all well-maintained. Many food options are available in our mess with affordable prices for students. It also serves good quality of food. It provides first aid when we are injured or in any emergency. We have a very big playground to play different kinds of sports.

reviews.review_heading: College is overall good.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is average when it comes to our college. Our college has no certain signal, no Wi-Fi, and the labs are not good because they do not have proper equipment to do experiments. When it comes to the library, it is not enough for us to study the depth of the subject.

reviews.review_heading: School. Faculty are LKG teachers.
reviews.review_text: I don’t know about the hostels and medical facilities, but other than that everything is good. The library is also good. If you are good at any sport, they will encourage you. The mess food is also very good and cheap. There is no Wi-Fi, and classrooms are decent.

reviews.review_heading: According to education and infrastructure, the college is good and fine.
reviews.review_text: College's best part could be the labs and the library as the infrastructure of the labs is very good which gives a very aesthetic view. About library, we can find the books which we want as they are categorized in a systematic manner. We can check the books which we need quickly whenever we want. About the hostel, Wi-Fi and classroom they are above average and are fine. The quality of the food available at the canteen and mess is good. The prices are reasonable too.

reviews.review_heading: Finally, it is a good college.
reviews.review_text: Coming to the infrastructure of my college, it is average; there are some limitations in infrastructure. Wi-Fi is not available for students; they do not give access to Wi-Fi. Coming to classrooms, they are average, the canteen is average, and there are no medical facilities in my college.

reviews.review_heading: Finally, it is a good college. You can join.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is not good at all. There is Wi-Fi in my college, but they do not give access for students to use. Classrooms are good, but there are no smart boards. Library facilities are okay. Students also utilize the library well. The food quality in the hostel is not good. No medical facilities. Sports and games are available.

reviews.review_heading: I think the best choice is this college, and we have a beautiful future after completion of B.Tech.
reviews.review_text: In my college, many facilities are available for all students like good Wi-Fi, well-equipped laboratories, a big and peaceful library, and well-equipped digital classrooms. Hostel facilities are also available. It has good mess in hostels. There is a different menu for day by day items. We have beautiful playgrounds in our college for cricket, basketball, badminton, and kabaddi courts. We also have a beautiful canteen.

reviews.review_heading: Decent college in Vizag. Can choose. Placements are fine. Mess is just okay.
reviews.review_text: Facilities can be given 4 stars. The library is good and large; Wi-Fi is available. Classrooms are okay, not that good. 1st year book is good, and 1st and 5th floor classrooms are good. Labs are good. The hostel is just okay, and the routine menu sometimes has insects. It can be better.

reviews.review_heading: Honest opinion on our college.
reviews.review_text: The college facilities and infrastructure are good. We have laboratories for all the courses offered. Library has a wide range of collections. Hostel facilities are also good. We have a playground in the hostel too. Food in the canteen and mess is worth the money.

reviews.review_heading: I am absolutely satisfied with the infrastructure and facilities provided by the university.
reviews.review_text: In terms of infrastructure, this college is good. They provide Wi-Fi during all working hours. All labs and the library are having air conditioning. Food quality is average, but they offer a variety of items. Medical facilities are available at all times.

reviews.review_heading: Placements are average, but teaching quality is worth it.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is not good at all, and it is average. There are not enough classrooms for students. There is always shuffling. The canteen is okay, but the quality is not good. In the main canteen, there are two canteens in my college, and the hostel food quality is not good.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with the faculty, infrastructure, facilities, and good placement offers.
reviews.review_text: VIIT provides well-equipped laboratories, well-furnished classrooms, a library, and sports facilities. It provides separate hostels for both girls and boys. The infrastructure is good, but it lacks in some aspects in boys' hostels and food quality.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 1023 published reviews , 891 reviews are verified.

faqs.answer: A:    A bachelor's degree in Science (BSc) can be used to apply for different jobs in the government sector in India. Across all scientific disciplines, a BSc degree offers access to research positions at national institutes and laboratories. CSAUK graduates have various BSc career opportunities in several sectors. fees_and_eligibility.overview:
Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology offers 28 courses, including three-year UG courses (BSc, BFSc, BTech, BVSc and AH), two-year PG courses (MSc, MVSc, MTech, and MBA) and a three-year research programme (PhD). These courses are offered across various streams like Agriculture, Horticulture, Forestry etc.

Admission to all the CSAUK courses is done on the basis of marks secured by a candidate in UPCATET. Given below is the eligibility criteria and fee structure for topmost CSAUK courses:

faqs.answer: A:    Eligiblity to take admission in B.Tech there should be 10+2 with 45% aggregate or above and you have to clear the entrance exam to take admission in CSAUK.Accepting Exams: JEE Main, ICAR AIEEA, UPCATETSo YES, you are eligible to take admission in B.Tech at CSAUK.
faqs.question: Can I get into CSAUK B.Tech with 70% in class 12th?

faqs.answer: A:    The Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK) offers admission to its MBA programme based on the UPCATET score and counseling. The university does not accept any national-level entrance exam score for granting admission to its courses other than the MBA. For the MBA program, candidates from other states may also apply, while for other courses, only Uttar Pradesh State Domicile candidates are eligible for appearing. The total fee for the MBA programme is INR 1.35 lakh, and the seat intake is 60.
faqs.question: What entrance exam scores does CSAUK accept for admission to MBA?

faqs.answer: A:    The minimum cutoff for the MBA programme at Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK) for the year 2023 is 25 percentile for general category students. Admission to the MBA course at CSAUK is entrance exam-based, and the university heavily relies on entrance examinations to grant programme admission. The seat intake for the MBA at CSAUK in Kanpur is 60. The total fee for the MBA programme at CSAUK is INR 1.35 lakh.
faqs.question: What is the latest cutoff information for MBA at CSAUK?

faqs.answer: A:    Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK) offers a BSc and BSc (Hons) programme at the UG level. The course duration for the BSc course is three years. However, the course duration of BSc (Hons) is four years. reviews_list.review_title: Overall, the college is good but the infrastructure is very bad.

review_content.Placements: About 90% of students get placed every year in this college, the highest package offered here was 10 LPA and the lowest or average package is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Adani and Birla, the percentage of interns in this college is about 95%. That is it.
review_content.Infrastructure: The hostel facilities are not good at all but the food provided in the hostels is of good quality. In terms of infrastructure, the conditions are very bad. Sometimes electricity is also cut for a long time. There is always a scarcity of water in the hostel.

review_content.Placements: My batch is 2024-2026, which is the 26th batch of MBA Agribusiness Management in Chandra Shekhar Azad University, Kanpur. My course is of 2 years with 4 semesters and 2 months of internship for both the summer internship and winter internship.
review_content.Infrastructure: Food is of nice quality with reference to the price. All things are good, but it needs improvement in all the facilities, with updates in the review of students. This is all about the hostel facility, which is in the process of development.

overview_faqs.question: Is there any one-time fee included for BSc at CSAUK?
overview_faqs.answer: Yes, the CSAUK BSc fee includes a one-time fee payable at the time of admission. The amount of the aforementioned fee is INR 6,000. Apart from this, the candidates must pay the BSc tuition fee at CSAUK ranging between INR 69,000 and INR 92,000. The other components of the fee include hotel fees, security depost, mess fees, etc. Candidates must note that the mentioned amount of fees have been taken from the official website of the university/sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and hence, is indicative.

overview_faqs.question: Is pursuing B.Tech at CSAUK, Kanpur expensive?
overview_faqs.answer: No it's not expensive to pursue BTECH at CSAUK kanpur compared to other BTech colleges in India.We can go into the college by following entrance examICARAIEENUPCATETBy this exams if join you can even get scholarship. The total tution fee is 1.5lakh. At the time admission we need to pay 8k

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: About my college life.

content.Placements: In this college, placements come for only the agriculture or dairy branch, not for all branches like B.Tech, CSE, or ECE. This college does not provide any good placement offers to students and internships also, so this is good for teaching branches and not for non-teaching fields.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure or campus life is quite good for students the hostels are available but there are not clean But this college hostel have many rooms so you can get your personal room for study and this is my personal review for hostel I study in my room.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Dairy Technology - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: This is how a regular-looking college changed my life.

content.Placements: I am still in my second year, but we are still allowed to see the interviews and the questions asked. Placement is 100 percent. Surprisingly, the top recruiters are Amul and Mother Dairy. Top role is Research and Development manager. Highest salary package is around 6 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Classrooms have projectors, whiteboards, and Wi-Fi (though occasionally inconsistent). Labs are well-equipped, with a specialized setup for technical courses. Spacious, air-conditioned library offers books, journals, databases, and study zones. Hostel rooms are clean and basic, with beds, desks, wardrobes, and round-the-clock water and electricity. Some blocks have variable-speed Wi-Fi. Mess food is hygienic with veg/non-veg weekly menu and festive meals. Canteen serves affordable snacks and meals, often a student hangout. Also provides on-campus clinic with doctor visits, hospital tie-ups, and ample sports grounds, courts, and a gym.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Agri Business Management - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Absolutely dissatisfied because of lack of resources and facilities. But value for money.

content.Placements: Last year's placement was 100%. Not all got good packages, but all were placed somewhere. The highest package was 9.5 LPA, and the lowest was 4 LPA. Top recruiters were Adani Wilmar, Dhanuka, Bayer, Savannah Seeds, Parag, Yara Fertilizer, etc. All got internships the previous year in companies like Dhanuka, Bayer, AgroStar, VNR Seeds, UPL, etc. Most of the companies offered the role of sales and marketing.
content.Infrastructure: To be honest, for the MBA course, there are no proper classrooms. Classes are running in the examination hall. Classes are there, but capacity is very less. The infrastructure is also very old, and there are no smart classes. Hostels are also very old but a little better for MBA students in comparison to other hostels. Toilets and bathrooms are not well-maintained. Food in the mess is satisfactory. A hospital is also there on the campus, and a sports club is also running.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Agri Business Management - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Our university is very good for agricultural students.

content.Placements: The placement rate of CSAUK is 100% in our course. All seniors or super seniors got placed in good companies of dairy products, agri inputs, etc. The highest salary package offered in our course is about 10 LPA. The lowest salary package offered is about 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Adani, YARA, Bayer, Amul, etc. Almost 100% of students got internships from our course.
content.Infrastructure: The university provides very good facilities. The infrastructure of our university is not good, so students face many problems. Labs and the library are very good but classrooms and Wi-Fi are not available properly. Facilities in our hostel are very good. The mess is good for healthy a diet. The canteen facility is available but medical, sports and games facilities are not available properly.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Agri Business Management - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Overall, the college is good but the infrastructure is very bad.

content.Placements: About 90% of students get placed every year in this college, the highest package offered here was 10 LPA and the lowest or average package is 4 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Adani and Birla, the percentage of interns in this college is about 95%. That is it.
content.Infrastructure: The hostel facilities are not good at all but the food provided in the hostels is of good quality. In terms of infrastructure, the conditions are very bad. Sometimes electricity is also cut for a long time. There is always a scarcity of water in the hostel.

admission_overview.title: CSAUK Admission Overview 2025
admission_overview.description: Chandra Shekhar Azad University Agriculture and Technology admission 2025 is ongoing through the UPCATET entrance exam. CSAUK offers a range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral courses in Agriculture, Horticulture, and Home Science and others. The university has eight affiliated colleges under its umbrella that collectively offer UGC-approved courses in various streams, including Science, Home Science, Engineering, Technology, Forestry, and many more. The mode of application at Chandra Shekhar Azad University Agriculture and Technology is online. Admission to UG and PG courses is based on the Uttar Pradesh Combined Agriculture and Technology Entrance Test (UPCATET) score obtained by the candidates. Want to know more about Chandra Shekhar Azad University Agriculture and Technology admission, along with course wise-eligibility, selection, seat and fee intake:

admission_process.title: CSAUK Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Chandra Shekhar Azad University Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK) admissionsare entrance-based. To be eligible for a seat, candidates must complete all of the course's selection rounds. The eligible candidates can refer to the below-mentioned steps for theadmission process of CSAUK:

CSAUK Application Process:Visit the official website of CSAUK and register yourself. Fill out the application process, select the desired programme, and proceed with the payment of the application fee to successfully submit the application form.
CSAUK Selection Process

Selections for CSAUK will be done based on valid scores secured by the candidates in entrance exams such as UPCATET or ICAR AIEEA. Post the entrance exam, candidates will have to appear for counselling following which seat will be granted at Chandra Shekhar Azad University Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK).
Fee Payment and Admission Confirmation
The shortlisted candidates will be accepted into the programme once they have paid the course fee and submitted the specified documents.

Chandra Shekhar Azad University feeis a sum of various components such as tuition fee, caution deposit, exam fee, etc. Some of the fee components like caution deposit are one-time paid while tuition fee is paid annually. Check below the total tuition fee for top CSAUK courses:

faqs.question: Can I take direct admission to B.Tech at CSAUK?
faqs.answer: No, Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK) offers entrance-based admission to BTech. Candidates are required to apply and appear for the accepted entrance exams such as UPCATET and ICAR AIEEA, followed by counselling round. After filling out the eligibility criteria candidates are required to apply on the official website of UPCATET. Additionally, candidates are required to pass Class 12 or its equivalent with a minimum aggregate of 45-50% from a recognised board.

faqs.question: What is the latest cutoff information for admission to B.Tech at CSAUK, Kanpur?
faqs.answer: We need to write ICAR, AIEEN, UPCATET entrance exam to get admission to BTech at CSAUK kanpur. We need to get marks within cutoff to get admission. The cutoff varies year to year, branch to branch and students who apply for same course as you . The cutoff varies between 211235-573110. The cutoff change as per caste .

The university offers offline modes of study in MBA. To be eligible for admission applicants must have a graduation degree. faqs.question: What is the seat intake for MBA at CSAUK?
faqs.answer: The seat intake for the MBA at CSAUK in Kanpur is 60. The eligibility criteria for this course is a Bachelor's degree in Agriculture or allied disciplines of Agriculture, Agril. Engg./ Dairy Science/ Dairy Technology/ Fisheries/ Food Science/ Food Technology/ Forestry/ Home Science/ Community Science/Vegetable Science/Horticulture/Veterinary. The total tuition fees for the course is INR 72,000. The course is B+ NAAC accredited and is a public/government university established in 1975.

faqs.question: What entrance exam scores does CSAUK accept for admission to MBA?
faqs.answer: The Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology (CSAUK) offers admission to its MBA programme based on the UPCATET score and counseling. The university does not accept any national-level entrance exam score for granting admission to its courses other than the MBA. For the MBA program, candidates from other states may also apply, while for other courses, only Uttar Pradesh State Domicile candidates are eligible for appearing. The total fee for the MBA programme is INR 1.35 lakh,

placement_report.college_name: CSAUK Placement & Salary Insights

placement_data.title: CSAUK Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: As per CSAUK NIRF report 2024, the median package offered during UG 4-year and PG 2-year placements 2023 stood at INR 4.5 LPA and INR 5.5 LPA , respectively. Further, a total of 44 students were placed and 75 students opted for higher studies out of total 124 students during UG 4-year placements 2023. Apart from this, a total of 78 students were placed and 30 students opted for higher studies out of total 108 students during PG 2-year placements 2023. Earlier, according to the NIRF report 2023, the median package offered to UG (4-year) and PG (2-year) during placements 2022 stood at INR 4.89 LPA and INR 6.5 LPA , respectively. Further, a total of 39 UG (4-year) and 130 PG (2-year) students were placed out of 249 during Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and Technology placements 2022.

The hostel is very good, and the mess also provides medical facilities. The canteen also charges 40 Rs per diet, and every Sunday evening the mess is closed. We have a common hall in the hostel.

reviews.review_heading: College with good infrastructure and the history with fascinating story and campus.

In my hostel a good and clean environment is present and the food quality is also great. Mess and canteen are also available with the good dispensary with qualified doctors. In every hostel indoor games are present and...

reviews.batch: Batch of 2024Offered by Baba Saheb Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar College of Agricultural Engineering & Technology - Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and TechnologyReviewed on 9 May 2024)
reviews.review_heading: Good in terms of money, but the teachers are biased towards certain students.
reviews.review_text: Hostel condition is good, but the condition of the college infrastructure is too low, even in the classrooms there are no proper seats. All the seats are broken while some are good. Bathrooms of the hostel are not clean, they are dirty, but on Sunday, they do regular cleaning. There are no doors in some of the bathrooms.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2024Offered by Baba Saheb Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar College of Agricultural Engineering & Technology - Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and TechnologyReviewed on 25 Jan 2024)
reviews.review_heading: The college is very dissatisfactory due to various aspects present.
reviews.review_text: College is good, but due to a lack of maintenance, it is becoming worse every day. There is dust in all the rooms. Even the hostel is not in good condition; the glass of all the windows is broken, and dogs wander here and there. The mess food is not good. There was a canteen that was shut down because no one would go there. There is an annual sports meet held in college, which is good.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2024Offered by Baba Saheb Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar College of Agricultural Engineering & Technology - Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and TechnologyReviewed on 25 Jan 2024)
reviews.review_heading: Absolutely dissatisfied by the faculty and placements. Campus life is not good either.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is average to good. Basically, this is a college for B.Tech agricultural students. This college is not for CS or technical branches. In the computer lab, only 3-4 computers are in working condition. And all computers are of an older generation.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2024Offered by Baba Saheb Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar College of Agricultural Engineering & Technology - Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and TechnologyReviewed on 5 Apr 2023)
reviews.review_heading: This is an excellent college, so I am satisfied with its facilities and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: It provides free Wi-Fi 24X7, a hostel, and a library. Classrooms have the best seating arrangements. It has smart classes for presentations. The hostel is good. The food quality is also good. The hostel has a separate room for each student.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by Baba Saheb Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar College of Agricultural Engineering & Technology - Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and TechnologyReviewed on 2 Dec 2022)
reviews.review_heading: Unbiased review of my college.
reviews.review_text: Yes we have Wi-Fi but it have the limit of 1gb per mobile in one day like the railway used to have. And we have labs but half of the computers does not work. Classrooms conditions is good for study atmosphere and library is excellent and most of the course books are available there. Quality of hostel is good.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by Baba Saheb Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar College of Agricultural Engineering & Technology - Chandra Shekhar Azad University of Agriculture and TechnologyReviewed on 2 Dec 2022)
reviews.review_heading: Literally, good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: There are no on-campus placements, but the student of the Computer Science branch gets off placements easily in some top MNCs like TCS, WIPRO, IBM, INFOSYS, and many other top startups that offer off-campus placements. Students get a chance to do an internship in the 6th & 7th semesters from the college.

reviews.review_heading: CSA is full of adventure. Teachers are knowledgeable.
reviews.review_text: Everything is well facilitated and our infrastructure is awesome. The classes are fully ventilated. Proper transport system is there. Sports and games are enough and education is of high quality. Placements are with highly reputed companies with good packages.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women gives a wide range of programmes at both UG and PG levels. With option for offline learning, students can choose from several streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. At the UG stage, SCETW courses given include Bachelor of Engineering (BE), which is a popular choice among Engineering students. For the PG level, ME, MTech and MBA are prominent choices for students studying higher education.

faqs.answer: A:    The eligibility criteria of the B.E. course at Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women requires the candidates to pass Class 12 from a recognised board and a minimum required aggregate set by the college. Admissions to the course are entrance-based and scores of the EAMCET exams are accepted.
faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria of B.E. at Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women?

reviews_list.review_title: It's a great place for women to learn and grow in technology.

review_content.Placements: My college is Stanley College of Engineering. Year of joining 2025, so passing out in 2029. In academic year 2023-24, the UG program recorded 459 graduation students, of which 347 were placed. The highest package offered was around 17.5 LPA in the recent placement drive. The median package reported was 4.5 - 5 LPA. Amazon, Accenture, Wipro, Infosys, HCL, IBM, Flipkart, Mindtree, SAP, Tech Mahindra recruit from our college. About 60% of students got internships.
review_content.Infrastructure: The college is spread over a campus of about 5 acres in the heart of Hyderabad (aids)and has five blocks (A-E). There are around 44 well-furnished classrooms and 33 well-equipped laboratories. We also have a central library plus a digital library. The library reported 17000+ volumes of national and international journals. The campus is Wi-Fi enabled and has computers /laptops, internet connectivity in staff and student areas. Common rooms, canteen, food court, gym, sports facilities (indoor/outdoor) are available. The college offers a campus hostel. Hostel building features centrally located aids rooms available AC and non AC options.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: I'm very satisfied with the college, placement, and infrastructure.

review_content.Placements: Above 70% of students got placed on campus. We have to go to placement interviews and internships are also provided by our college. College offers the best course.
review_content.Infrastructure: We have a very good faculty and labs, with technical lab sessions held every two days. The hostel and food is very good. There is a nice canteen, and we also enjoy the food offered in the canteen. We also have a sports week and have various prizes in inter-college sports.
review_content.Faculty: We have great teachers. We also have Ph.D. qualified teachers to teach students. Some are in the process of completing their Ph.D. Semester exams are good and passing marks are 30 and we can easily pass the semester and teachers are good.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: Placements are okay, but not every student is fully satisfied.

review_content.Placements: Approximately 40% of students are placed. The highest salary offered is 17 LPA, the lowest is 3 LPA, and the average is 8 LPA in our course. HP is the top recruiter for our course. About 50% of students get internships in various companies. I do not have information about the roles offered.
review_content.Infrastructure: The library is very useful to refer subject books and other materials like novels. We have plenty of space to study, and it is maintained in silence. The labs are good, but sometimes issues may occur, although they are generally comfortable. Room availability depends on our preference for the number of occupants. The food is not bad, but sports are not encouraged much.

admission_overview.title: Stanley College Admission Overview 2025
admission_overview.description: Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women admissions are entrance-based. The college offers three courses at the UG and PG levels. These are- B.E., M.E., MTech, and MBA. The college accepts scores of certain entrance exams such as- EAMCET. Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women is affiliated to Osmania University and approved by AICTE.

admission_process.title: Stanley College Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Womenoffers entrance-based admissions to candidates. The admission process consists of certain steps such as- application, selection and fee payment. Candidates must understand and follow all the steps to successfully take admission in the college. Below is a detailed breakdown ofStanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women admission process:-

Stanley College of Engineering and Technology for Womenregistration process is online. Application forms are available online on the official website of the college. Candidates must check and fill out the forms before the last date.

Candidates are selected for admissions based on their scores in certain entrance exams. They must achieve the minimum required aggregate set by the college in the same. The EAMCET exam scores are accepted for the B.E. course admission and GATE/ TS PGECET for M.E./ MTech. While for the MBA course, TSICET scores are accepted.
Selected candidates must pay theStanley College of Engineering and Technology for Women feesto confirm admission and secure their seat at the college.

reviews.review_heading: College is good, and the faculty is good.
reviews.review_text: College labs are good with Wi-Fi and everything. Neat and clean. Facilities are good. The lab in charge is good and supportive, and helps students without any hesitation, and the canteen is good and clean, and sports are encouraged in our college. Helps with physical activities to build physical strength.

reviews.review_heading: I am glad to join this college, as we have great placements, infrastructure, and facilities.
reviews.review_text: College is very big and has great infrastructure. Labs are very good. The equipment we use is in very good condition. We have a peaceful environment that helps us concentrate on our studies. I do not have much information about the hostel as I am a day scholar.

reviews.review_heading: It's a great place for women to learn and grow in technology.
reviews.review_text: The college is spread over a campus of about 5 acres in the heart of Hyderabad (aids)and has five blocks (A-E). There are around 44 well-furnished classrooms and 33 well-equipped laboratories. We also have a central library plus a digital library. The library reported 17000+ volumes of national and international journals. The campus is Wi-Fi enabled and has computers /laptops, internet connectivity in staff and student areas. Common rooms, canteen, food court, gym, sports facilities (indoor/outd...

reviews.review_heading: I'm very satisfied with the college, placement, and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: We have a very good faculty and labs, with technical lab sessions held every two days. The hostel and food is very good. There is a nice canteen, and we also enjoy the food offered in the canteen. We also have a sports week and have various prizes in inter-college sports.

reviews.review_heading: Placements are okay, but not every student is fully satisfied.
reviews.review_text: The library is very useful to refer subject books and other materials like novels. We have plenty of space to study, and it is maintained in silence. The labs are good, but sometimes issues may occur, although they are generally comfortable. Room availability depends on our preference for the number of occupants. The food is not bad, but sports are not encouraged much.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the infrastructure and faculty in the ADCE department.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi, classrooms, labs, seminar halls, trips, games and encouragement for games at the national level, fests and events, hostel facilities, and food quality are nice. The campus is spacious, near the college, with good safety and security. Our college is close to GATE and has good infrastructure.

reviews.review_heading: Faculty is nice. College is good. Only disappointment is no ground.
reviews.review_text: We have Control Systems lab, Electrical Simulation lab, Selection Machines lab, MPMS lab, etc. Overall, the labs are good. Teaching is good. Lab assistants are good. There is a problem with a few kits, but mostly all the equipment is really fine.

reviews.review_heading: Stanley College of Engineering and Technology
reviews.review_text: As of the labs and classrooms that are well furnished, there are dustbins in each room. Also, the janitors of our college keep it clean, and the infrastructure is well defined. The labs do have certain devices and CROs working while others don’t,but overall, the students are made to do practicals for practice purposes.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the college.
reviews.review_text: Really good infrastructure and facilities are there. Yes, teachers are very helpful. Absolutely satisfied because of faculty. Yes, good hostel rooms, quality food will be provided for students, medical facilities are also available, and sports and games are encouraged.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied because of faculty, good placements in 2024, and really good infrastructure .
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are well organized, and the quality of facilities in the hostel are also well organized. Medical facilities are also well organized, and the canteen provides multiple dishes every day to eat, and alternatively, sports and games will be conducted in our college.

reviews.review_heading: Getting to know more about Stanley.
reviews.review_text: The college is well-equipped with the necessary resources. The college area is compact but well organized and efficiently laid out in labs, classrooms, sports, and other aspects. The canteen food is good, although hostel facilities have room for improvement and offer potential for growth.

reviews.review_heading: Almost 80% of the students get placed.
reviews.review_text: A decent infrastructure is provided through out the campus. The labs are well-equipped and each class does have a projector. The library covers almost one complete floor and provides book bank facilities where the students can get all the book required for the semester at the beginning of the semester itself. But for this student need to pay $5,000 only once for all 4 years. college also has a digital library section. Other than book bank, books will be given for 15 days. The college hostel is j...

reviews.review_heading: My life in college in 2025.
reviews.review_text: The lab has great Wi-Fi, and the hostel food is also nice. There is a sports hour every week, and the library has a good number of books. The labs have AC and good graphics, and the canteen also has good food. The only issue is that there is less seating; other than that, everything is okay.

reviews.review_heading: My College Life till 2021.
reviews.review_text: No Wi-Fi, the labs were up to mark; we usually used to spend a lot time their and experiment with many things, which were encouraged by my teachers, and the library needs to be exposed to other things, like more magazines, more novels, etc. The canteen food was a bit costly and the hostel is really good.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with this college.
reviews.review_text: Our college has many blocks. They provide separate blocks for every branch. They provide a huge place for parking vehicles. The bus facility is available in our college. The hostel facility is not available in our college. The hostel is available near our college.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 76 published reviews , 64 reviews are verified.

Roles like a software developer, software engineer, trainee, graduate trainee, etc., are offered here.

faqs.answer: A:    Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila accepts scores from the following list of entrance exam DAVV CET (Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila Entrance Test) This is the university personal entrance exam, which questions mainly about an individual's aptitude and required knowledge in computer applications.CUET(Common University Entrance Test): This is a national-level entrance exam that evaluates candidates' eligibility for different UG and PG programs, including MCA (Master in Computer Application)Hope this helps.
faqs.question: What entrance exam scores are accepted by Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila for admission MCA?

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila has opted CUET (Common University Entrance Test) as its primary exam for getting admission into required courses including BCA (Bachelor's of Computer Application).Here are the key points to remember:Applicants have to give CUET for getting admission into the universityEligibility:  students have to pass 10+2 exam with the required minimum percentage Admission process: Admission process will be done on the basis of the merit score of CUETHOPE THIS HELPS

review_content.Placements: The percentage of students placed is 8 CGPA or more. No backlogs. The highest package is 28 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA-4 LPA, and the average package is 7 LPA- 8 LPA. Companies are Wipro, Infosys, and TCS. The percentage of students is about 8 CGPA, and the company is Accenture.
review_content.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi of the hostel network is good. Labs are also outstanding, but the lectures are minimal. My suggestion is that the food in the hostel and the water are not good, so I do not eat there. Medical facilities are not available in the college. These are outside the college. I have no idea about sports.

reviews_list.review_title: It is a good government college. I got decent marks in JEE Main.

review_content.Placements: This course is new, and in this college, this is the first year of this course. Overall, across all CS branches, the highest package offered is 57 LPA. The average package ranges from 10-12 LPA. Microsoft, Google India, Infosys, Wipro, Amazon, Adobe, etc., are the main companies that came for placements. 70 percent of students got internships from this course in small tech companies. Senior and junior software engineer roles are offered in this course.
review_content.Infrastructure: The college campus area is good and huge. The college campus is covered with many trees and plants, and it seems like college is in the jungle. Wi-Fi, labs, library, and all good facilities are available in the college for students. Mason canteen food is acceptable. College is directly connected with Indore Icchapur Highway. Sports and games happen in college.

faqs.answer: No, Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya does not give direct admission to the students. Admission to various courses is based on merit and scores of entrance exams. Candidates need to write the CUET entrance exam which is conducted by the NTA. After clearing the CUET entrance exam, students may get a provisional allotment of seats in the college. Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya admission to most of the undergraduate and postgraduate programmes is offered on the basis of marks scored in the Common University Entrance Test.Candidates can choose the type of admission they are seeking, which can be through one of the following:Type 1 - Through CUETType 2 - Through Department level TestType 3 - Through merit in the qualifying examination.The application fee for all types of admissions is INR 1,550.
faqs.question: Q: Can I get direct admission at Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila?

faqs.answer: In India, Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya (DAVV) Takshashila is recognised as a respectable university. The college is renowned for offering high-quality academic programs, especially in subjects like humanities, management, and commerce. It provides a supportive learning atmosphere with knowledgeable instructors committed to the growth and research of its students. Libraries, labs, and extracurricular activities are among the contemporary amenities on campus that support a well-rounded educational experience. Students are drawn to DAVV Takshashila because of its excellent placement record and the numerous organisations that visit for recruitment. All things considered, DAVV Takshashila is a wonderful option for students looking for high-quality education and job possibilities because of its academic rigour, teaching knowledge, and placement opportunities.

content.Placements: Many companies come for placements. Top companies from Indore also come for placements. The DAVV Placement Cell conducts exams for particular companies. Around 70 to 80 percent of students get placed with good packages. In 2026, the average package at Infosys is 3.5 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Boys’ and girls’ hostels are available with proper hygiene. The boys’ hostel closes at 11 PM, and the girls’ hostel closes at 9 PM. Two students share one room. Each room has an almirah, table, chair, and internet connection.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. + M. Tech. in IT - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: My life at the IET DAVV Indore (Madhya Pradesh).

content.Placements: I am currently in the 1st semester, so I don't know too much about placements, but I can say that placements are not too good in our college as compared to NITs and IIITs. The highest package offered is 39 LPA, which was offered in the year 2023. The average package offered is around 6 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, a library, etc., are available.
content.Faculty: Faculty members are extraordinary. They have a good sense of humour, so they can make us laugh. They do not insult anyone to make us laugh. They are just good human beings. There are 4 exams per semester, 3 MSTs, and one end-semester exam. The best of 2 out of 3 will be taken as a result of MST. I am currently in the first semester of the Information Technology course. My course is about the IT sector, and I know the value of that. Our faculty members are good at teaching and friendly with students like us who didn't get the lecture the first time.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with the food in the hostel.

content.Placements: The percentage of students placed is 8 CGPA or more. No backlogs. The highest package is 28 LPA, the lowest package is 3 LPA-4 LPA, and the average package is 7 LPA- 8 LPA. Companies are Wipro, Infosys, and TCS. The percentage of students is about 8 CGPA, and the company is Accenture.
content.Infrastructure: The Wi-Fi of the hostel network is good. Labs are also outstanding, but the lectures are minimal. My suggestion is that the food in the hostel and the water are not good, so I do not eat there. Medical facilities are not available in the college. These are outside the college. I have no idea about sports.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: It is a good government college. I got decent marks in JEE Main.

content.Placements: This course is new, and in this college, this is the first year of this course. Overall, across all CS branches, the highest package offered is 57 LPA. The average package ranges from 10-12 LPA. Microsoft, Google India, Infosys, Wipro, Amazon, Adobe, etc., are the main companies that came for placements. 70 percent of students got internships from this course in small tech companies. Senior and junior software engineer roles are offered in this course.
content.Infrastructure: The college campus area is good and huge. The college campus is covered with many trees and plants, and it seems like college is in the jungle. Wi-Fi, labs, library, and all good facilities are available in the college for students. Mason canteen food is acceptable. College is directly connected with Indore Icchapur Highway. Sports and games happen in college.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Ground-level information of DAVV.

content.Placements: Above 60 percent of students got placed from every batch every year, and the remaining 40 percent are trying to find off-campus placement, but they don't get any support from the college. 1.5 LPA to 20 LPA is the package offered, and the average is 5 LPA to 8 LPA. TCS and Infosys are recruiting companies. 25 percent of students got internships in mostly TCS and Infosys. Web developer is the role offered.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is too good, but cleanliness is average, and all are available. The hostel is pretty nice, but the food quality is, as expected, average and sometimes below average. Medical facilities are available, and a canteen too, but the sports are rarely played.

paragraphs: Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campusadmits students based on their merit. The college offers programmes at UG in the streams of Engineering, Medicine and Health Sciences, Business and Management Studies, IT and Software, Accounting and Commerce, Arts ( Fine / Visual / Performing ), Design, Mass Communication and Media, Law, Humanities and Social Sciences, Science, Teaching and Education, Beauty and Fitness, Banking and Finance and Insurance. Candidates should meet the eligibility qualification set by theDevi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campus. Candidates need to visit the official website to apply for Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campus admission. For the offline availability of the application form, students must check with the college admission department.
Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campus fee for UG isINR 15,000 - 3,53,280. Candidates selected for admission have to pay the course fee to confirm their seat.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila?
faqs.answer: No, Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya does not give direct admission to the students. Admission to various courses is based on merit and scores of entrance exams. Candidates need to write the CUET entrance exam which is conducted by the NTA. After clearing the CUET entrance exam, students may get a provisional allotment of seats in the college. Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya admission to most of the undergraduate and postgraduate programmes is offered on the basis of marks scored in the Common University Entrance Test.Candidates can choose the type of admission they are seeking, which can be through one of the following:Type 1 - Through CUETType 2 - Through Department level TestType 3 - Through merit in the qualifying examination.The application fee for all types of admissions is INR 1,550.

faqs.question: What is the last date to apply for Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila admission?
faqs.answer: The ultimate date to use for admission to Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya Takshashila for the present day year is usually around mid to late July, but precise dates can change. Please test the college's legitimate internet site for the most updated information. But for proper schedule you can contact the admission department. Addmission date may changes every year. If you are interested you can contact university directly

cut_off.college_name: Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campus Cutoff 2025: Check JEE Main Round Wise Ranks

description: Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campus cutoff 2025 was released via MPBE entrance exam for admission to the B.E. / B.Tech course. For the General AI category students, the last round cutoff range was between 33433 and 82527 for B.E. / B.Tech admission. Considering the lowest cutoff rank of 33433, B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering turned out to be the most competitive branch for admission. In the first round, the cutoff rank for the same branch was 42100.
Considering the JEE Main last round cutoff 2025 for the General AI category students, the top most competitive course for admission was B.E. / B.Tech, with a cutoff rank closing at 33433.
For more categories, rounds and quotas, candidates must use the provided filters.
Some of the important dates related to JEE Main 2026 for admission are provided below. Candidates can keep track of the upcoming dates to be eligible for admission.
The cutoff PDFs below can be downloaded to view the cutoff details of the last three years for multiple rounds. This will help students understand the past years' cutoff trends.

To make an informed decision students must compare different colleges accepting JEE Main for admission. The given below comparison data is based on the JEE Main last round cutoff data. The cutoff is for the General AI category.

Considering the Devi Ahilya Vishwavidyalaya, Takshashila Campus B.E. / B.Tech cutoff 2025, the top three most competitive specialisations for General AI category students were B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering, B.E. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering and B.E. in Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering, with last-round closing ranks of 33433, 64865, and 68734, respectively.

reviews.review_heading: DAVV Indore is a good college.
reviews.review_text: Boys’ and girls’ hostels are available with proper hygiene. The boys’ hostel closes at 11 PM, and the girls’ hostel closes at 9 PM. Two students share one room. Each room has an almirah, table, chair, and internet connection.

reviews.review_heading: My life at the IET DAVV Indore (Madhya Pradesh).
reviews.review_text: Facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, a library, etc., are available.

reviews.review_heading: Dissatisfied with the food in the hostel.
reviews.review_text: The Wi-Fi of the hostel network is good. Labs are also outstanding, but the lectures are minimal. My suggestion is that the food in the hostel and the water are not good, so I do not eat there. Medical facilities are not available in the college. These are outside the college.  I have no idea about sports.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good government college. I got decent marks in JEE Main.
reviews.review_text: The college campus area is good and huge. The college campus is covered with many trees and plants, and it seems like college is in the jungle. Wi-Fi, labs, library, and all good facilities are available in the college for students. Mason canteen food is acceptable. College is directly connected with Indore Icchapur Highway. Sports and games happen in college.

reviews.review_heading: Ground-level information of DAVV.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is too good, but cleanliness is average, and all are available. The hostel is pretty nice, but the food quality is, as expected, average and sometimes below average. Medical facilities are available, and a canteen too, but the sports are rarely played.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, college is good, especially for the core. Mechanical is best for core.
reviews.review_text: Hostels are good in terms of infrastructure. All students live like a family. A single room is allotted for the final year. Wi-Fi facility is available on campus. VLSI lab for Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering. Mess is also available. Medical facilities are also good. For sports, you have to go to the main campus.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied because of high ROI.
reviews.review_text: Faculty isn't good as we expected. Rather than Wi-Fi, labs and library are more than good. Food quality is the worst I have seen, no sports and medical facilities, and no games have been played yet. The hostel warden is also very rude towards students regarding mess food and health issues.

reviews.review_heading: Rude faculty, no proper water coolers, and no digital screens.
reviews.review_text: Ragging cases are reported. There are not sufficient rooms for students, so some students live in rented PG flats. Food is not included in the hostel fee. There is no proper equipment and playground facilities on the IET DAVV campus. Wi-Fi passwords are provided at the end of the semester. There is no proper mobile network or Wi-Fi connectivity in the college. There are no smart classrooms, projectors, or LED screens in classrooms. Computer labs are available, but faculty does not take students ...

reviews.review_heading: It has decent infrastructure. It offers quality education with a good placement rate.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available on the campus. A decent library is provided with the availability of books in all courses. The quality of food provided is also decent in the mess and canteen. Medical facilities are available, and basic medicines are available in each department block.

reviews.review_heading: It is really good in all respects except for the low infrastructure and hostels.
reviews.review_text: Hostels are not good. The mess is also not good. Wi-Fi is okay in many rooms. The library is good with a big reading area and a lot of books. There are no medical facilities in the hostel because the college is in the centre of the city. There are no sports facilities.

reviews.review_heading: It is good government college strong placement in CSE, IT, ECE ROI is very good.
reviews.review_text: Above average infrastructure, decent classroom, lab, library, good Wi-Fi facility, big campus full of greenery hostels are basic. Mess food is very poor, campus life is simple not very luxuries not more comfort are there. Every month mst are held I did say it is solid and reliable.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, second best college in Madhya Pradesh.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of CSE department at my college is decent. We have Wi-Fi facility in every department of our college and its library, we have updated computer labs and access to a large central library. Hostel facilities are average, rooms are simple but livable, and the mess food is okay, though great. The campus has basic medical facilities, a sports ground, and areas for games.

reviews.review_heading: Best in Indore for the IT branch. Its most famous in Indore for its huge campus.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available for you in the IET department on the bypass are available in libraries. Classroom is very neat and clean. The facilities are available in the hostel, just like a water cooler, a mess canteen, Wi-Fi, and a very clean environment.

reviews.review_heading: School of computer science and information technology, DAVV, Indore.
reviews.review_text: I would say the infrastructure is good because it contains big grounds, an athletics ground, a basketball court, a volleyball court, a tennis court, and cricket grounds. And whole sports are just like a dream university, and for a sports person, it's the best place for this amount.

reviews.review_heading: Short review about SCSIT.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is good. The college provides a good campus with greenery all around. The labs are okay, not the best, they are average. The Wi-Fi of the college is good for basic tasks, and the library has all the essential books you need during your academic period.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 603 published reviews , 476 reviews are verified.

college_info.intro: NIST Berhampur popular programmes are BTech and BSc. The aim of NIST Berhampur is to transfer knowledge through its state-of-the-art professionalised training and quality education, which is based on a well-defined curriculum. This curriculum aligns with the growing demands of the industry. NIST Berhampur BTech students are placed in top organisations, namely Axis Bank, TCS, PwC, Flipkart, Infosys, and others. BTech and BSc students can also join non-technical fields such as Marketing, Sales, and others. Below mentioned are some of the courses offered by the National Institute of Science and Technology Berhampur, and their respective eligibility and NIST Berhampur fee structure:

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
reviews_list.review_title: Supportive faculty, good events, and the best placements for CSE students.

review_content.Placements: At NIST University, Berhampur, the placement infrastructure and prospects are above average among many private engineering colleges in the region. With effort, you can secure a decent job. However, if your ambition is for top-tier tech companies with very high salary packages, you should not rely solely on the placement cell. You will need to proactively build your skills and perhaps be ready for off-campus efforts too.
review_content.Infrastructure: You will find a good, comfortable campus with solid infrastructure and decent hostel life. It provides you with new blocks/rooms and doesn't expect ultra-luxury. With moderate expectations, it delivers well. Hostel facilities are fairly decent. It provides rooms for 4-5 students, sometimes AC/non-AC options, Wi-Fi in hostels, and reliable water/electricity.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: The college provides good infrastructure and facilities for students.

review_content.Placements: Up to 80% of the students from our senior batch were placed in the year 2024. Top recruiting companies are Tech Mahindra and TCS (Tata Consultancy Services). The highest package was 23 lakhs in the year 2019, and the lowest was 6.3 lakhs per annum.
review_content.Infrastructure: The hostel environment is so good. You can look out for a clear and clean view from the courtyard outside the room. It looks like a green field. The Wi-Fi system is moderate to average. Classrooms and labs also have good infrastructure. Mess food is also good, with no remnants from previous days. For sports and games, you can choose the indoor stadium as the best place, even if it is raining or during a thunderstorm, because it has good facilities for games like volleyball, table tennis, badminton, and kabaddi.

review_summary.college_name: NIST Berhampur Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: We get to experience a campus designed to support innovation, learning, and holistic growth.

content.Placements: We have a good number of students in our batch. More than 60 percent of batch students got placed through campus, and the other 40 percent of students signed up to not opt for campus placements. The average package offered is 5 LPA, and the highest package offered is 12 LPA. The lowest package offered is 3 LPA. TCS is the top recruiter in our batch, followed by Tech Mahindra and Infosys, too. From our batch, a lot of students opted for medium-sized IT firms in Bhubaneswar and Hyderabad for internship opportunities. Roles like business development executive and SDE are offered.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: This is good for everything a student wants to do.

content.Placements: I don't know about the placements because as I am in 1st year, I only know the things which are above. The highest package is 23 LPA, and I saw many of recruiters are coming here for the selection, and students are selecting. There are many companies which are recruiting here.
content.Infrastructure: It is not bad like the other colleges and the best for Odisha. The course infrastructure is so manually stabilized for easy access of the students for study. The campus is surrounded by its own Wi-Fi network. A separate indoor stadium is there where students get their passion.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: Supportive faculty, good events, and the best placements for CSE students.

content.Placements: At NIST University, Berhampur, the placement infrastructure and prospects are above average among many private engineering colleges in the region. With effort, you can secure a decent job. However, if your ambition is for top-tier tech companies with very high salary packages, you should not rely solely on the placement cell. You will need to proactively build your skills and perhaps be ready for off-campus efforts too.
content.Infrastructure: You will find a good, comfortable campus with solid infrastructure and decent hostel life. It provides you with new blocks/rooms and doesn't expect ultra-luxury. With moderate expectations, it delivers well. Hostel facilities are fairly decent. It provides rooms for 4-5 students, sometimes AC/non-AC options, Wi-Fi in hostels, and reliable water/electricity.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: The college provides good infrastructure and facilities for students.

content.Placements: Up to 80% of the students from our senior batch were placed in the year 2024. Top recruiting companies are Tech Mahindra and TCS (Tata Consultancy Services). The highest package was 23 lakhs in the year 2019, and the lowest was 6.3 lakhs per annum.
content.Infrastructure: The hostel environment is so good. You can look out for a clear and clean view from the courtyard outside the room. It looks like a green field. The Wi-Fi system is moderate to average. Classrooms and labs also have good infrastructure. Mess food is also good, with no remnants from previous days. For sports and games, you can choose the indoor stadium as the best place, even if it is raining or during a thunderstorm, because it has good facilities for games like volleyball, table tennis, badminton, and kabaddi.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Take admission only if you have money constraints, unless you avoid it.

content.Placements: About 35%-40% of 2021-2025 batch got placed, with the highest package of 23 LPA, the lowest of 1.8 LPA, and an average of 3 LPA-3.5 LPA. Top recruiters include TCS, Tech Mahindra, Mysa, Texas Instruments, HP, Infosys, and other small services-based companies. Our college is not known for internship opportunities, so there are probably 10%-20% internships. The hiring is mainly for development and data analytics.
content.Infrastructure: For computer systems that are outdated with a lower than 3rd-generation Intel. Infrastructure is below average compared to other colleges. Wi-Fi is the only thing that is faster than other colleges. For hostel, the infrastructure is below average and has worse toilets. Mess is average as compared to other private colleges, canteen is only available during the day. There is a medical facility on campus and one in the hostel with an ambulance facility. For sports, we have an indoor stadium which has probably all the games, and with an occasional opening, a swimming pool.

admission_overview.college_name: NIST Berhampur Course Admission 2025 (Open): Eligibility, Selection, Application Process

admission_process.title: NIST Berhampur Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: NIST Berhampur admission 2025 is open for the academic year 2025-26. The institute offers various UG and PG courses. The admission to NIST Berhampur courses is merit as well as entrance-based. Candidates can apply for admission to their course of choice through the official website ofNIST Berhampur. Check out the table below for admission highlights of the NIST Berhampur:
Particulars
NIST Berhampur Admission Highlights 2025
Mode of study
https://nist.edu/
Level of programmes offered
Popular programmes

Admission to NIST Berhampur courses is based on a valid score obtained by the candidates in the qualifying exams along with other selection rounds for the respective course. Admission to all the courses offered by NIST Berhampur is subject to merit in the entrance exam, personal interview, group discussion, and past academics. The following table mentions eligibility and selection criteria for all programmes
Know more aboutNIST Berhampur courses

The admission process for NIST Berhampur is a multi-step process is inclusive of application, appearance in the selection rounds, offline admission process, and document verification. A step-by-step process that students need to follow is as follows:
1. NIST Berhampur Online Registration

For registration, candidates need to submit the entrance exam score for the respective test they have appeared for admission to different courses. The entrance exam scorecards have to be submitted at the time of registration.2. NIST Berhampur Application Form
Interested candidates have to fill out the NIST Berhampur application form 2025 online. After checking the eligibility, candidates can fill out the form on the official website of NIST Berhampur.
3. NIST Berhampur Shortlisting

The selection process of NIST Berhampur includes an examination of candidates based on their aspirations, and experiences. The admission panel will also evaluate the candidates based on their academic accomplishments during the interview stages of the selection process.
4. NIST Berhampur Document Verification & Payment of Admission Fee

Candidates shortlisted as per the course eligibility & selection rounds will have to submit the prescribed admission fee. Following this, candidates are required to go through the document verification and are intimated about the date of commencement of the classes.

faqs.question: Do I need OJEE score to get into NIST for MBA?
faqs.answer: NIST accepts MBA admissions through OJEE counselling. But OJEE is not the only entrance exam accepted for MBA admissions at the institute. 75% of the total MBA seats are filled through the OJEE counselling. 15% of the total seats are filled through other accepted exams, namely CAT, MAT and XAT. Hence, candidates without an OJEE score can still get admission to the institute's MBA programme, provided they have a valid exam score of any other accepted entrance exam.

faqs.question: What is the total number of MBA seats available at NIST?
faqs.answer: The total number ofMBA seats at NISTis 120. These seats are filled based on the applicants' performance in the accepted entrance exams. These exams are OJEE (followed by OJEE counselling), CAT, MAT and XAT. It must be noted that the mentioned number of seats has been sourced from the official website of the institute/sanctioning body. It is still subject to change and hence, is indicative.

placement_data.title: NIST Berhampur Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: NIST University conducts rigorous Pre-Placement Training Programs for the B.Tech , MCA, M.Tech , MBA students throughout the academic year to make them Industry-ready. The Training and Placement Cell assists the faculty members to provide certification courses during summer vacation at NIST campus on industry oriented courses such as VLSI, Oracle, J2EE, Industrial Automation, SAP, Embedded Systems, Foreign Language (e.g., Japanese).

During NIST University placements 2025 over 280 offers were extended to students.According to the data collected as of March 28, 2025, over 82 recruiters participated in the placement season. The highest package offered at NIST University placements reached INR 23 LPA.

reviews.review_heading: We get to experience a campus designed to support innovation, learning, and holistic growth.
reviews.review_text: The hostel and mess are good. Both boys' and girls' hostels are there, but not co-ed. Wi-Fi is there, and its usage is good. For the mess and hostel, we have to pay an additional deposit, which is refundable at the end of the semester. The quality of food is average but manageable. We have a basketball court too.

reviews.review_heading: This is good for everything a student wants to do.
reviews.review_text: It is not bad like the other colleges and the best for Odisha. The course infrastructure is so manually stabilized for easy access of the students for study. The campus is surrounded by its own Wi-Fi network. A separate indoor stadium is there where students get their passion.

Wi-Fi is the only thing that is faster than other colleges. For hostel, the infrastructure is below average and has worse toilets. Mess is average as compared to other private colleges, canteen is only available during the day. There is a medical facility on campus and one in the hostel with an ambulance facility. For sports, we have an indoor stadium which h...

reviews.review_heading: My advice is to do admission anywhere else but not here.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi connections are good on campus. Labs are air-conditioned. Classrooms are not that much good. Library is good. In hostel, the rooms are good. But the food is the worst. Medical facilities are good. Sports are very good, and you also get opportunities. The mess and canteen food are not healthy.

reviews.review_heading: NIST University - The place for leaders.
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure is fabulous. Hostel facilities are also good but there is a little compromise in food. Wi-Fi facility and AC rooms are available. We can see average rooms and also moderate food. Best in quantity but lacks in quality. Good for localities.

reviews.review_heading: I love this college. It is better than my expectations.
reviews.review_text: I am a CSE Student and I love the infrastructure of NIST. The Wi-Fi system is good. Labs are good. We have a huge library on our campus. Mess food is more than expected. We also have a canteen, and we can get quality food at a low price. We have also an indoor stadium on our campus, A big cricket ground is available outside the campus.

reviews.review_heading: It's all about my college, which has good nature and surroundings.
reviews.review_text: Labs and classes are very good. Labs have AC and very good equipment that is required for the particular subject. The lab teachers are also good and very friendly. Talking about the hostel facility, it is also good. You will get both AC and non-AC rooms.

reviews.review_heading: Placements are good, and the campus is also good.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi, labs, and library facilities are available in our college. The library system is good. Sometimes, Wi-Fi doesn't work good. Classrooms are also good. The mess is also good. There are two types of hostels A/C and non-A/C. Sports facilities are not that type. There is an indoor stadium on our campus.

reviews.review_heading: There is good placement in 2025.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure available in my college include Wi-Fi, a café, a ground, a swimming pool, a gym, a stadium, labs, libraries, etc. The food quality provided in my college is very good and affordable, just like a home-cooked meal. I love it.

reviews.review_heading: NIST University: A place to make your dreams come true.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is great. It is well-equipped with all the required and market trends as well as basic technology. The quality of food is great, with all need diets. The hostel provides a great meal for students. Medical facilities are basic, but they are enough for a college.

reviews.review_heading: This is the best college.
reviews.review_text: The college Wi-Fi facility is available. Many high-facility labs are available,  with a large library. The hostel food is good. Students from other colleges come here to play. The hostel is very good and clean, and the mess is also good. The mess food is tasty, and there are also some hotels within the campus.

reviews.review_heading: Nist University is perfect.
reviews.review_text: The college provides a good campus, labs, classrooms, and free Wi-Fi. The classrooms are smart classrooms and the labs are good. They provide good practical work for understanding things. In nist there medical facilities are good. On the NIST campus, there is Indore Stadium outer stadium cricket ground sankalp ground, and many gardens.

reviews.review_heading: A good return on investment.
reviews.review_text: Lecture halls are well-ventilated. AC is not required but some new lecture halls have AC. There is a central mess (The Octagon) which also has a library on top. reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: Good infrastructure and average placements.

review_content.Placements: 90% of students got placed in good companies. The average package is 5 LPA, and the highest package is 11 LPA. The top Recruiting companies are Toyota, SolarEdge, Tata, etc. The roles offered in this branch are automotive, CAD/CAM designing, 3D printing, automotive engineering, etc. The placements are very good in the college.
review_content.Infrastructure: The college offers solid infrastructure like a modern and green campus, smart classes well-equipped with an auditorium, library, sports court, and Wi-Fi. Canteen food is very good, tasty, healthy, and affordable. They provide a college bus for day scholars, a very big campus.

reviews_list.review_title: Cool in studies, but it doesn't mean you're industry-ready

review_content.Placements: About 60% of students, including myself, secured placements from our college, with an average package offered between 3 LPA and 3.5 LPA, and key recruiters included Evess Recruitech, TCS, and 1M1B, additionally, 100% of students completed internships as it was a mandatory subject, leading to common roles like marketing manager and HR.
review_content.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure in our department were okay. Hostel facilities were also just okay, mainly due to the food's taste. While we have good sports competitions every semester, and the sports teacher is friendly, they are not always available.

Group of Institutions has below criteria for taking admissions to it's various courses: CoursesEligibilityB.E. / B.TechCandidate must have passed any Diploma examination or equivalent examination and scored a minimum of 45% (40% of marks in Q.E. in case of SC, ST and Backward Classes of Karnataka candidates.) marks taken together in all the compulsory subjects of the final year (Fifth and sixth semester) Diploma Examination (Q.E) will be eligible for admission to the BE courses. In addition, Candidate after qualifying the diploma, must also possess a minimum of Two Years Full Time Work experience as on the due date, of the year of admission, in a registered firm / Company / Industry / Educational and / Government Autonomous Organizations in the branch of Engineering / Technology, in which the candidates possess a Diploma and in which admission is sought by the candidates.B.ArchCandidate who have passed 10+3 Diploma Examination with Mathematics as compulsory subject with at least 50% marks in aggregate from a recognised Institute/ University can also apply. Candidates appearing for 10+3 Diploma with Mathematics in the current year may also provisionally appear for NATA-2023.M.E./M.TechCandidates must have passed qualifying examination or equivalent examination as prescribed by the Competent Authority and obtained an aggregate minimum of 50% marks (45% of marks in case of SC, ST and Category-I candidates) taken together in all the subjects of all the years/ semesters of the Degree Examination from any recognised institute/university. Final year students can also apply on provisional basis. Candidates must have valid GATE score.After 10th DiplomaCandidate must have passed Grade 10, SSLC or its equivalent with a minimum of 35% marks from a recognised board/institute.
