review_summary.college_name: K.S. Group of Institutions Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Satisfied college, but good friends with the worst placements.

content.Placements: Placements there were a joke. Hardly any companies came, and the few that did just gave useless offers. There are fewer than 30% of placements for CS branches, and for the mechanical branch, we have min 70% of the placements. We have many companies like automotives, manufacturing and design also. We get some trainees at the start, and we can promote them to higher positions. All the students in mechanical get an internship.
content.Infrastructure: The classes and labs are not too advanced, but have been well-maintained. There is Wi-Fi available only for students, and the library is very big, with a vast number of books to refer to and read. The hostel is average, but we have good food facilities, there is a gym and first aid on every floor, and there is also a ground so that we can play whenever required.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: Poor, not up to the mark.

content.Placements: Placement is okay. They bring all the companies here, but it's all about how the market is outside. In our batch, we got two to three good companies which are software, and one or two good companies for electrical and mechanical. The rest are all sales-based and marketing roles.
content.Infrastructure: Library staff here are the maddest and most egoistic people on the campus, can't use such words here. One incident to share: during the no-due sign, we needed to renew the card (laminated xerox sheet). To renew, we needed to show the xerox of the fee bill; we can't use mobile for that, so we had to bring the xerox of the bill. But we can use it in front of the teachers for sharing reports, in classrooms for activities, and for payments. But we get all the books there.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Good infrastructure and average placements.

content.Placements: 90% of students got placed in good companies. The average package is 5 LPA, and the highest package is 11 LPA. The top Recruiting companies are Toyota, SolarEdge, Tata, etc. The roles offered in this branch are automotive, CAD/CAM designing, 3D printing, automotive engineering, etc. The placements are very good in the college.
content.Infrastructure: The college offers solid infrastructure like a modern and green campus, smart classes well-equipped with an auditorium, library, sports court, and Wi-Fi. Canteen food is very good, tasty, healthy, and affordable. They provide a college bus for day scholars, a very big campus.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: Cool in studies, but it doesn't mean you're industry-ready

content.Placements: About 60% of students, including myself, secured placements from our college, with an average package offered between 3 LPA and 3.5 LPA, and key recruiters included Evess Recruitech, TCS, and 1M1B, additionally, 100% of students completed internships as it was a mandatory subject, leading to common roles like marketing manager and HR.
content.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure in our department were okay. Hostel facilities were also just okay, mainly due to the food's taste. While we have good sports competitions every semester, and the sports teacher is friendly, they are not always available.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechanical Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: The campus is huge and the resting area is available.

content.Placements: 70% of students got placed while they were in the internship. The highest is 7 LPA, the average is 4 LPA, and the lowest is 3 LPA. The main companies are Honda and Kia and some manufacturing companies and even some production companies visited for interviews. 100% of students got internships. Roles offered is design head.
content.Infrastructure: Labs, Wi-Fi, projectors, classrooms, machines, department library, etc., are available. Food is average and the sports and games are the main attraction. There is only a first-aid box in the department office and there are no specialized aids. There is a basketball, badminton, and a cricket ground.

Those applying via the management quota need to provide scores secured in national-level exams, such as NATA, GATE, JEE Mains, etc., as per the course chosen. For those seeking to get in via the governement quota, scores obtained in the state-level tests, such as COMEDK UGET, PGCET, KMAT, KCET, etc. are considered. admission_process.title: K.S. Group of Institutions Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Admission toK.S. Group of Institutionsis based on entrance. The Institute offers these courses at the UG, PG, and Diploma levels. The Institute offers respective courses based on valid scores of accepted entrance exams such as JEE Main, GATE, and KCET etc. K.S. Group of Institutions application process commences online through the official website of the institute or the government body, such as COMEDK. Listed below is a step-by-stepK.S. Group of Institutions admission processexplained below:
1: Application & Registration

Students must visit the official website of theK.S. Group of Institutionsto fill out the application form. Candidates must fill the necessary details to confirm candidature and submit the form along with application fees.
2: Entrance Exams

Admission to several UG level courses is based on valid scores obtained in UGCET exam. Whereas, for courses such as BTech, candidates must secure valid score in accepted national or state level entrance exams such as JEE Main, UGET, GATE, NATA, etc.
3: Selection Criteria

Students are selected on the basis of either the national or state-level entrance exam scores, followed by counselling (if required). The institute also offers seats via management quota. At the time of application, students need to provide scores obtained in the above-mentioned entrance exams, based on which selection will be made.
4: Admission Confirmation
Selected students need to pay theK.S. Group of Institutions' feesto secure their spots at the institute.

Students may connect with the admission desk of the institute to learn about theKSGI admission chances.

hostel_campus.college_name: K.S. Group of Institutions Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 3 Nov 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Satisfied college, but good friends with the worst placements.
reviews.review_text: The classes and labs are not too advanced, but have been well-maintained. There is Wi-Fi available only for students, and the library is very big, with a vast number of books to refer to and read. The hostel is average, but we have good food facilities, there is a gym and first aid on every floor, and there is also a ground so that we can play whenever required.

reviews.review_heading: Poor, not up to the mark.
reviews.review_text: Library staff here are the maddest and most egoistic people on the campus, can't use such words here. One incident to share: during the no-due sign, we needed to renew the card (laminated xerox sheet). To renew, we needed to show the xerox of the fee bill; we can't use mobile for that, so we had to bring the xerox of the bill. But we can use it in front of the teachers for sharing reports, in classrooms for activities, and for payments. But we get all the books there.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2028Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 8 Jul 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and average placements.
reviews.review_text: The college offers solid infrastructure like a modern and green campus, smart classes well-equipped with an auditorium, library, sports court, and Wi-Fi. Canteen food is very good, tasty, healthy, and affordable. They provide a college bus for day scholars, a very big campus.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 25 Jun 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Cool in studies, but it doesn't mean you're industry-ready
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure in our department were okay. Hostel facilities were also just okay, mainly due to the food's taste. While we have good sports competitions every semester, and the sports teacher is friendly, they are not always available.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 18 Jun 2025)
reviews.review_heading: The campus is huge and the resting area is available.
reviews.review_text: Labs, Wi-Fi, projectors, classrooms, machines, department library, etc., are available. Food is average and the sports and games are the main attraction. There is only a first-aid box in the department office and there are no specialized aids. There is a basketball, badminton, and a cricket ground.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2026Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 7 Jun 2025)
reviews.review_heading: The college is good and campus life everything except placements.
reviews.review_text: Hostel is good but food might be a problem as they don't change their menu and they don't provide laundry which might be a problem. The rooms are cleaned daily but sometimes you are the rules so it might be a problem if they don't clean it. If you are like very highly make I don't I think you have to make like tell them to every day.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 21 May 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Good that's all. Great with infrastructure not with that quality.
reviews.review_text: KSSEM has no compromises with its infrastructure, it's really great, spacious, and neat. Wi-Fi works well, but no network. Classrooms are great, very spacious, and neat. CSE is good, and I feel jealous of our juniors. They are getting trained well for placements.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 15 Mar 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Good college for engineering.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is very beautiful with big classrooms, labs, and seminar halls. Wi-Fi is available and we have a library with updated books and system. Hostel rooms are clean and the mess food is good and we have big canteen and ground.

reviews.review_heading: The infrastructure is really good and better than many other colleges. Teaching is also okay.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is really good and the department is good. Labs are big and good. Classrooms are nice, big, and well-structured. Every class has a smart board for easy learning. Library is very big and pleasant. Staff is also nice and polite. Hostel is located on the campus. Food is okay. For sports, we have a big ground on the campus only. All games are there to participate.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 27 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is very good with a beautiful canopy. Facilities are very good and college has a vast room with accommodation of 60 to 70 people in a single class with projectors installed and a library with systems along with books. Hostel food is good and we have a big canteen.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 22 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Summarising about our college's peaceful, neat, and big campus.
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure has code. Every floor has installed Wi-Fi and paint. College offers Wi-Fi for every student but there are separate user names and separate rooms are available in the hostel. They provide three times food and during the lunch hours, other students can avail the food in the canteen. Every hostel room is neat and clean for every student. Separate wardrobes have been allotted and there is a guardian for hostel. There are medical facilities and for every hour this shuttle bus r...

reviews.batch: Batch of 2028Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 18 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Review of K.S. School of Engineering and Management.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good as compared to KSIT College. KSSEM has more space and boy's hostel is in KSSEM college itself. The canteen is not so satisfying. We complained regarding this, and they said they will change the canteen. Xerox shop is available, and there is no need to worry about it.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2028Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 17 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: The infrastructure is excellent, faculty members are friendly, and placements are average.
reviews.review_text: There are fully equipped labs and seminar halls for this course and other courses too. Classrooms are highly ventilated and spacious. There is a huge library with thousands of books and access to e-resources. There are separate hostels for both boys and girls. The canteen food is average. There is a mud ground, four badminton courts, and a basketball court for various sports activities.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2028Offered by K.S. School of Engineering and ManagementReviewed on 10 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: I am very happy with the faculty members and the beautiful infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is really good. Wi-Fi is provided, and labs are average. Facilities in the hostel are average but the food is really good. It gives us good quality and quantity of food which is really appreciative. The campus is also good, hygienic, and lush green.

reviews.review_heading: Very Good College provides quality education and overall wellbeing of student.
reviews.review_text: We have a good infrastructure including labs, classrooms, library, study tables, each department staffrooms and Hod cabins and office. Hostel facilities were good. Quality food and cleanliness. Extra curricular activities will be held including college fests.

reviews_list.review_title: Review of Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences.

review_content.Placements: Companies visiting our campus is a common thing, as the college guarantees 100% placement. During my final year of placement, quiet high companies like Coca-Cola, Byju's, and Nestled hired many classmates with a high package of 5 to 10 lacs. Students who register for placement college send them for internships, in which they provide training and hands-on experience with a good stipend, which is very useful in interviews. Most questions are asked about internships.
review_content.Infrastructure: The college is away from the city; there are no cultural programs on campus. The climate on campus is warm, giving off a chill vibe. We have a big central library on campus where books, newspapers, magazines, and novels are available. Labs can do better if there are problems with computers. Yes, the hostel is there but the food is very low quality. The canteen is good; it has a good seating arrangement and good-quality food. In college, many students are state-level sports players.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: I am satisfied with the supportive faculty members.

review_content.Placements: Some of our seniors got placed in good companies. The highest salary package offered is 14 LPA. We have to get an internship on our own. Our college is connected with IASTE, which offers international internships. The college offers specialisation in marketing, finance, HR and logistics.

There are plenty of sports options. A gym facility is also available here. The canteen is not available in the hostel.

review_summary.college_name: Karunya School of Management, Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: In my college, a scholarship is provided in accordance with government rules.

content.Placements: Our college has a very good placement record. Every year, a number of students get jobs in some renowned companies through interviews from universities, TCS, Wipro, Google, Amazon, etc., which stand out among them. Each year, about 82% of the students get good-paying jobs from the university. The maximum package here is 18 LPA, and the starting package is around 5.5 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Good infrastructure, but there are some downsides, like Wi-Fi with poor internet service. There are also classrooms, but it is not furnished. But they provide a library, where we can get books on the subject. Hotel facilities are not very good. The mess has been cleaned up, but the quality of the food is so bad that we can't eat it. Sports and cultural events are held.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: It is the best university for the MBA course.

content.Placements: Roughly 85% of students are given assignments. The highest package is 8 LPA, and the lowest package is 2.5 LPA. Companies including Oyo, GSK, Colgate, and others visit the campus to apply for positions in business analysis, international business, marketing, finance, logistics, and human resources management. Only 20% of students are given internships by the institution because many students want to complete their internships in places that suit them.
content.Infrastructure: The college boasts a top-notch campus with all the amenities, including digital textbooks, a library, and high-speed internet in classes. We have numerous sports fields and a hospital for medical services. Both the hostels and the canteen food are excellent and delicious. Additionally, hostel rooms are completely secured.

Our college is connected with IASTE, which offers international internships. The college offers specialisation in marketing, finance, HR and logistics.
content.Infrastructure: Our college provides a great infrastructure and a good hostel facility. Quality of the food served is somewhat average. Medical facilities, sports and games are good. There are plenty of sports options. A gym facility is also available here. The canteen is not available in the hostel.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: I am completely dissatisfied because lecturers have very poor knowledge and bad placements sessions.

content.Placements: About 90% of the students from our course were placed, but the chances of getting core companies are very low. The highest salary package so far was offered by Byju's, and it was 10 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Colgate, IBM, Byju's, Jaro, etc. All these companies hire marketing students as their sales executives. The lowest salary package so far was offered by IBM, and it was 2.32 LPA, and the role offered is a voice processing unit. One student got selected in Colgate, while 2 students got selected in Byju's and 2 students in NewAge Solutions, 3 students in Coco-Cola and 3 students in IBM.

admission_overview.title: KSM Coimbatore Admission Overview 2026
admission_overview.description: KSM Coimbatore admissions are entrance-based. The school accepts scores in CAT, MAT, XAT, etc. for MBA. Karunya University also conducts Karunya Management Aptitude Test or KMAT for admission. KSM Coimbatore offers courses at PG and doctoral levels in the Management stream. Candidates can apply online for the preferred course.

eligibility_selection.title: KSM Coimbatore Eligibility & Selection 2026
eligibility_selection.description: Karunya School of Management offers MBA, Online MBA and PhD courses. Candidates must meet the eligibility for the preferred course. The basic eligibility for PG courses is graduation. Find below Karunya School of Management courses along with their eligibility and selection criteria:

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for MBA at Karunya School of Management?

faqs.answer: Karunya School of Management accepts KMAT scores for admission to MBA programme. Karunya University conducts KMAT in five phases. The sections in KMAT paper includes:Verbal Ability & Reading ComprehensionData Interpretation & Logical ReasoningQuantitative AbilityIndian & Global Business Environment
faqs.question: What is the syllabus for KMAT accepted at Karunya School of Management?

faqs.question: What is the name of accepted entrance exam for admissions into MBA course at Karunya School of Management?

admission_process.title: KSM Coimbatore Admission Process 2026

paragraphs: KSM Coimbatore admissionsare open for 2026. The school offers admission to the offered courses based on entrance exam or qualifying exam scores. Currently, admissions are open for all the KSM courses. Below are the steps to get a seat in Karunya School of Management:
Step 1: KSM Coimbatore Application Process 2026

Candidates can fill out the application form online. Aspirants need to first register to generate login credentials for filling out the form. Candidates need to pay an application fee of INR 1,000 to apply for a course.
Step 2: Selection
The school selects candidates for admission to the MBA programme based on CAT, MAT or KMAT scores. For the Online MBA, the school considers the merit of the aspirants in the last qualifying exam.
Step 3: Admission Confirmation

The school informs the aspirants about their selection. Aspirants need to report at the campus for document verification. Shortlisted candidates need to pay theKSM Coimbatore feesto confirm their seat.

courses_data.name: KSM Coimbatore MBA Admission 2026
courses_data.description: Karunya School of Management offers a two-year full-time MBA course at the PG level. The school also offers a two-year Online MBA course approved by UGC. Candidates must complete graduation to apply for the MBA programme. Admission to MBA programme is based on CAT, XAT, MAT or KMAT scores of the candidates.

faqs.question: Does Karunya School of Management offer Online MBA?
faqs.answer: Yes, Karunya School of Management offers two-year full-time Online MBA programme. The course is divided into four semesters. The programme is equivalent to regular MBA degree. Aspirants who have completed a UG degree from any recognised institution can apply for the Online MBA programme.

faqs.question: Which are the MBA specialisations offered at Karunya School of Management?
faqs.answer: Karunya School of Management offers MBA for two-years at the PG level. The course is spread across four semesters. During the second year of the course, students need to choose a specialisation. Below are the MBA specialisations available at KSM Coimbatore:BusinessInternational BusinessFinanceMarketingHuman ResourceInternational BusinessSupply Chain & Logistics ManagementEntrepreneurshipGeneral Management

faqs.question: Is MBA worth from Karunya School of Management?
faqs.answer: MBA is the flagship programme of Karunya School of Management. Students pursuing MBA from KSM are open to placement opportunities. The highest salary package offered in KSM placement drive was INR 17 LPA. The average salary of top 30% was INR 7.5 LPA. Some of the top companies such as Deloitte, Amazon, Wildcraft, PwC, EY, etc. participated in the placement drive.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility requirements for admissions into MBA course at Karunya School of Management?
faqs.answer: The institute offers MBA courses at the PG level. Candidate must meet the eligibility criteria to enrol for MBA course admission set by the college. Aspirants must pass graduation with a decent aggregate. Also, admission process is entrance-based, either the school accepts Karunya MAT or National Level Eligibility Test.

faqs.question: Can I join Karunya School of Management directly?
faqs.answer: Candidates applying for the Online MBA programme can get direct admission in Karunya School of Management based on their merit in the last qualifying exam. Aspirants must fulfil the eligibility requirements to get a seat in the school. Students need to pass any of the accepted entrance exams for admission to other programmes.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for admission at Karunya School of Management?
faqs.answer: Yes, Karunya School of Management considers entrance exam scores for admission to the MBA programme. The school accepts CAT, MAT or XAT scores for admission. Aspirants without any of the accepted national-level entrance exam scores can appear for Karunya Management Aptitude Test or KMAT for admission. The selection for Online MBA is based on merit of the aspirants in the last qualifying exam.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at Karunya School of Management?
faqs.answer: Karunya School of Management selects candidates for admission to the MBA programme based on CAT, MAT or KMAT scores. For the Online MBA, the school considers the merit of the aspirants in the last qualifying exam. Candidates must also fulfil the eligibility requirements for the applied programme to get admission in the school.

faqs.question: Is KMAT compulsory for admissions into MBA course at Karunya School of Management?
faqs.answer: No, KMAT scores are not compulsory for admissions into the MBA course at KSM, Karunya University. There are other scores too, on which school looks upon for selecting the students. Those entrance exams are XAT/CAT/MAT. Thus, students with good scores in any of the following can enroll in the MBA course at KSM.

reviews.review_heading: In my college, a scholarship is provided in accordance with government rules.
reviews.review_text: Good infrastructure, but there are some downsides, like Wi-Fi with poor internet service. There are also classrooms, but it is not furnished. But they provide a library, where we can get books on the subject. Hotel facilities are not very good. The mess has been cleaned up, but the quality of the food is so bad that we can't eat it. Sports and cultural events are held.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best university for the MBA course.
reviews.review_text: The college boasts a top-notch campus with all the amenities, including digital textbooks, a library, and high-speed internet in classes. We have numerous sports fields and a hospital for medical services. Both the hostels and the canteen food are excellent and delicious. Additionally, hostel rooms are completely secured.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Karunya Institute of Technology and Sciences.
reviews.review_text: The college is away from the city; there are no cultural programs on campus. The climate on campus is warm, giving off a chill vibe. We have a big central library on campus where books, newspapers, magazines, and novels are available. Labs can do better if there are problems with computers. Yes, the hostel is there but the food is very low quality. The canteen is good; it has a good seating arrangement and good-quality food. In college, many students are state-level sports players.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with the supportive faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides a great infrastructure and a good hostel facility. Quality of the food served is somewhat average. Medical facilities, sports and games are good. There are plenty of sports options. A gym facility is also available here. The canteen is not available in the hostel.

reviews.review_heading: I am completely dissatisfied because lecturers have very poor knowledge and bad placements sessions.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of this college is excellent, and it is very pleasant to stay in this kind of hilly areas. There is no pollution as it has a good and safe environment. You can also grow up in your spiritual life. There is a separate library for management students, but the availability of books is very low. Students will get Wi-Fi facilities both in hostel and classrooms. The food served in the hostel is very bad and can't expect more in those areas.

reviews.review_heading: The college provides an excellent environment for students.
reviews.review_text: Facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, classroom, restroom, washroom, library, game room, etc., are available in college. The quality of the food is very good, and it was awesome. Canteen is nice, and the hospital is available near the hostel. All sports and games facilities are also available on the campus.

reviews.review_heading: It's a good place to gain knowledge and learn, but there are no placements.
reviews.review_text: The college has a world-class campus with all facilities like high-speed internet in classrooms, digital textbooks, library, etc. We have Seesha for health care, and there are many grounds to play. The food in the canteen, as well as the hostel, is very good and tasty. Also, we have fully secured rooms in the hostels.

reviews.review_heading: Extraordinary placement cell.
reviews.review_text: The Infrastructure is decent with amazingly fast Wi-Fi enabled campus. ( should be paid in annual). The University has a hospital close by and all sports and games facilities are available. If applying under sports quota then depending on the skills fee concession is available. Some students have qualified for 100% scholarships in the previous years. The classrooms and lab are decent. The food in the canteen is good. And there are food courts and cafe coffee day shops on the university campus ne...

reviews.review_heading: A college with great industrial exposure and values.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is really good. The high-speed Wi-Fi is there. There is a new library with more than 3000 references books. The college itself centralised air-conditioned and the college is located in the centre of the  Coimbatore city so that we won't be having any difficulties to go anywhere.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure, with well-equipped facilities and resources.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the university is quite up to the mark. You have good Wi-Fi connectivity for the entire course duration. Also, the library is well-equipped with available books for academic as well as research purposes. Almost all games and sports facilities are available in the campus. They have their own hospital for emergencies. Food quality is also good in comparison to various other colleges or Institutions. Hostel rooms are of 4 seaters,  2 seaters and a single seater. Also, there ar...

college_info.intro:
Sankara College of Science and Commerce has been dedicated to offering quality education to the students in the region. There is a huge variety of programmes of different streams and levels. The College is popular for its MBA programme, which is a 2 year programme offered in approval with AICTE. The programme offers extensive knowledge of the fields of HR, Finance, Marketing, Shipping & Logistics, Health Care Management, Production, and Systems.
Sankara College of Science and Commerce offers courses with an annual intake of 120 students (2 sections). The eligibility criteria include UG qualification from any stream. As per the previously recorded placement stats, Sankara College of Science and Commerce graduates received INR 7.25 LPA as the highest package. For more details around Sankara College of Science and Commerce popular programmes, check out the table below:

placements.overview: Sankara College of Science and Commerce is committed to supporting the academic pursuits of its students through a variety of scholarships and financial assistance programs. The college offers merit-based scholarships, sports scholarships, alumni concessions, and sibling scholarships to deserving students. Additionally, the institution guides students in accessing state and central government scholarships, based on eligibility criteria and norms. These initiatives aim to empower students to pursue their higher education goals without financial burden. Following are some scholarships students can avail:

fees_and_eligibility.overview:
Sankara College of Science and Commerce offers 8 UG, 3 PG, and 5 Research level programmes across various streams. After the successful completion of the programme, students get awarded a degree from Bharathiar University. Students can also pursue a Diploma programme available in the stream of Hotel Management.

Sankara College of Science and Commerce offers courses such as MBA, BSc, BCom, PhD, UG Diploma and others in . Admission to these courses is provided based on . reviews_list.batch_info: B.Com. in Computer Applications - Batch of 2019
reviews_list.review_title: Good placements and better infrastructure and facilities.

review_content.Placements: Nearly 90% of senior students found positions during the previous academic year. The top package was 10 LPA while the average or the lowest lived between 2 LPA and 5 LPA. Companies like Google, Flipkart, Deloitte, Amazon, and Myntra were among the major recruiters. Additionally, about 60% of students were given the chance to work as interns. Common job functions included data code, analyst, and similar roles.
review_content.Infrastructure: Classrooms were air-conditioned, well-equipped labs were there, smart classrooms too. The library offered a vast number of books for students to research. Although there was an internet connection, students who had not completed the necessary procedures might not be able to use Wi-Fi. The structure on the whole promotes a nice literacy atmosphere.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: Overall, good college for MBA course.

review_content.Placements: Approximately 75% of our batch's students got hired by different companies. The salary packages are competitive. Employers like TCS and Infosys prioritize student training and provide placements. Students benefit greatly from the roles that are provided.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is mediocre. The hostel is good, but the weekend meals are terrible. There is an extremely slow Wi-Fi connection. On the weekends, students can play football and cricket. Within the college, we also have a temple and a gym. The campus is full of trees and vegetation.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: Best placement is given in this college.

content.Placements: The placement of this college is very good. Around 75 percent of students get placed every year. Salaries vary each year. Axis Bank, HDFC Bank, Dell, and Forbes give job offers to students. The median salary goes to 3.9 LPA–4 LPA. Students need to be prepared during the interview and placement time.
content.Infrastructure: The college is located at a very beautiful place. The environment of this college always makes you feel fresh. Classrooms are properly clean and well maintained. A library is located with many different books. Each lab has modern and advanced equipment. Separate hostels are available for girls and boys, where students live peacefully.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: My review about my college.

content.Placements: I really appreciate the internship and placement efforts our college makes. All of the time in our final year we used to increase our efficiency and moreover the jobs given to each of the students were good. Most of the time reputed and popular companies come for the interview like Aegis Axis Bank Dell Eureka Forbes HDFC Bank etc.
content.Infrastructure: The best part is that the college library is a boon for all of us to prepare our notes and study for the exams. Separate from UG and PG degree students and a good nature surrounds the College. Hostel there is a hostel separate for boys and girls. Environment is so good in nature and you can spend a lot of time doing good things in college.

individual_reviews.course: B.Com. in Computer Applications - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: Good placements and better infrastructure and facilities.

content.Placements: Nearly 90% of senior students found positions during the previous academic year. The top package was 10 LPA while the average or the lowest lived between 2 LPA and 5 LPA. Companies like Google, Flipkart, Deloitte, Amazon, and Myntra were among the major recruiters. Additionally, about 60% of students were given the chance to work as interns. Common job functions included data code, analyst, and similar roles.
content.Infrastructure: Classrooms were air-conditioned, well-equipped labs were there, smart classrooms too. The library offered a vast number of books for students to research. Although there was an internet connection, students who had not completed the necessary procedures might not be able to use Wi-Fi. The structure on the whole promotes a nice literacy atmosphere.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: Overall, good college for MBA course.

content.Placements: Approximately 75% of our batch's students got hired by different companies. The salary packages are competitive. Employers like TCS and Infosys prioritize student training and provide placements. Students benefit greatly from the roles that are provided.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is mediocre. The hostel is good, but the weekend meals are terrible. There is an extremely slow Wi-Fi connection. On the weekends, students can play football and cricket. Within the college, we also have a temple and a gym. The campus is full of trees and vegetation.

individual_reviews.course: M.Sc. in Computer Science - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Overall, it is the best college for the M.Sc. in Computer Science course.

content.Placements: Our course has about 62% of the students. The highest package offered is 22 LPA. The typical compensation sum granted falls between 9-17 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Accenture, HCL, Apple, and other companies. 57% of students are able to secure internships. Cybersecurity manager, software engineer, and more positions are offered to students.
content.Infrastructure: All facilities and amenities are available in our college. Hostels are satisfactory and adequate. Our hostel campus has free Wi-Fi and a restaurant that is open from 7 AM to 6 PM. The hotel management and police handle everything professionally, and they are polite to all of us.

faqs.question: Does Sankara College of Science and Commerce offer MBA?
faqs.answer: The MBA programme at Sankara spans over two years and consists of a well-designed curriculum. In the first semester, students will be exposed to fundamental courses, followed by functional courses in the second semester. Specialization courses will be covered in the third and fourth semesters, along with a summer internship programme between the first and second year of their study. The programme requires a total course credit of 90 points, and the minimum eligibility for MBA is an undergraduate degree. The programme admits 120 students, and classes commence in August.

placement_data.title: Sankara College of Science and Commerce Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: The placement process at Sankara College of Science and Commerce includes a comprehensive pre-placement training and skill development program for the students. The Placement Cell organizes career counseling sessions for all students beginning their first year. The cell provides skill development programmes in association with Infosys BPM, TCS, Barclays Premier, Mahindra Pride Classroom, Cognizant Outreach, etc.

The Training and Placement Cell of Sankara College of Science and Commerce is collaborated with EIDOS Pvt. Limited, Training and Skill Development company for continuous and extensive placement preparatory programmes right from the first year with various skill modules like Language Enhancement Programme (LEP), Aptitude Programme (AP) and Career Craft Programme (CCP). Additionally, a special internship opportunity is also provided to the students in association with Internshala. The Ministry of Labour and Employment has made it mandatory for all students to register with the National Career Service (NCS), a platform that facilitates job applications.

Recently, Sankara College of Science and Commerce concluded the placements for the Class of 2024. As per the latest report, the highest package offered during Sankara College of Science and Commerce placements in 2024 stood at INR 4.5 LPA. A total of 27 recruiters visited the campus for placements, and presented 639 job offers to the students of the batch 2024. The top recruiters of Sankara College of Science and Commerce in 2024 included TCS, Den, Oppo, Integra Global Solutions, Demart, RND, Soft Tech, The Residency Tower, Infosys, etc.

Accommodation costs were very affordable in this college. The accommodation and mess were neat and clean.

reviews.review_heading: One of the best institutions to pursue a master's degree in business.
reviews.review_text: This college is located in a good environment where students can study with a fresh mind. The entire campus was Wi-Fi enabled and the labs were equipped with many advanced technological equipment. The library had a lot of books and there were medical facilities as well. The cost of living in this college was very low. The hostel and mess were clean and tidy.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is the best for pursuing a master's degree in business.
reviews.review_text: The dorms were spacecraft and pleasant. The best part was that we did not need to worry about participating in our couple because the hostels were on the college campus. The quality of mess was better than other colleges. They provided food at breakfast and lunch every day. Wi-Fi access for students' research was provided.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, it is a good college for the M.Sc course in India.
reviews.review_text: This college is situated in a pleasant setting where students can learn with an open mind. The entire campus is equipped with Wi-Fi. Labs are stocked with a variety of cutting-edge technological tools. It has medical facilities and a library with books. The cost of lodging is extremely low at this college. The mess and the hostel are clean and orderly.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, it is a good college for the MBA course in India.
reviews.review_text: Our college offers excellent facilities to its students. Additionally, our entire college campus has Wi-Fi. Our college canteen serves delicious and clean meals. Our college campus has a large playground as well.

reviews.review_heading: Good college for M.Com.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of this college is very good. The classrooms are very big and clean a suitable environment for studying. There is a free internet facility on the college campus. There is a central library where all kinds of books are available. The sports facilities here are also very good. There is a large playground on the campus where all kinds of games are played, such as cricket, football, hockey etc. There is a college canteen where you can get good and tasty food at low prices.

reviews.review_heading: Sankara College of Science and Commerce - A college of excellence.
reviews.review_text: The facilities for my course are very nice at this college. Beautiful classrooms with Wi-Fi and air-conditioning. The food in our college mess is also very good, and it is served very clean. Our college places emphasis not only on studies but also on sports and various cultural activities.

reviews.review_heading: A college for better future of students.
reviews.review_text: Our college campus was very beautiful and well-maintained. The entire college campus was covered by Wi-Fi. In addition to studies, our college also pays close attention to sports and various cultural activities. Our college also had well-equipped laboratory and a well-maintained library. There were a large ground, presentation hall, music room, and many more.

faqs.answer: A:    JIIT Noida MSc in Microbiology programme is offered by the Department of Biotechnology established in 2002, remains committed to provide research-informed teaching and learning, and vibrant R & D environment. Candidates can find below the eligibility criteria for JIIT Noida MSc Microbiology:  Candidates must have passed BSc (Hons) / BSc General /BTech in any branch of Life Sciences such as Biotechnology/ Biochemical Engineering/ Industrial Biotechnology/ Industrial Microbiology/ Bioengineering/ Food Technology etc. Undergraduate Degree in any branch of Life Sciences/ Medical Sciences/ any branch of Biology under 10+2+3 pattern securing minimum of 55% marks (50% for SC/ST) or equivalent grade point on a 10 point scale in the aggregate in Science subjects (considering all the three years of B.Sc. course).

review_summary.college_name: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Electronics and Communication Engineering - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: Dissatisfied about the curriculum, but placements are kind of okay.

content.Placements: Nearly 70 percent of students are placed. Top roles are business analyst and associate consultant. Top companies include startups and mass hirers like Infosys, Cognizant. Companies like Oracle and Amazon also do on-campus visits, and the overall hiring scene is okay.
content.Infrastructure: Classrooms depend on buildings; for B. Tech, they are not up to the mark and are in bad shape. Labs are clean and have facilities, but the experiments are bookish and some are not worth it. Food quality is normal, not too bad, but it gets boring after some time.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: JIIT: The ultimate college for placements.

content.Placements: More than 90% of students from the CSE department are placed, and the highest package offered so far is 90 LPA, as reported by LinkedIn. Top recruiters are Google, Microsoft, and Atlassian. Many students got an internship, with some even getting one in the first semester of their first year. Top roles offered are in SWE and SDE.
content.Infrastructure: Hostels are excellent in terms of price, but availability is based on CGPA. Food quality is excellent, and the campus features 24/7 medical facilities, including an ambulance and fire brigade. Wi-Fi speeds are also good. You can get around 50-60 Mbps, and you can access the library and cafe till 10:30 at night.

content.Placements: Placement season is still going on, and maximum students got internships from the college itself. Top roles offered are business development, executive, financial analyst, business analyst, executive for corporate sales, etc. Top recruiting companies that recruit students from this college are Swiggy, MakeMyTrip, and Naukri.com.
content.Infrastructure: The department has well-maintained classrooms with smart boards and audiovisual teaching aids. There is Wi-Fi connectivity across the department. The computer lab is equipped with an updated system. The library has a good collection of textbooks, reference books, and general books. Seminar halls are also available for presentations and guest lectures.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: Very Satisfied, good studies, good environment, good location, and decent crowd.

content.Placements: Placements are excellent, and overall, the training and companies visited are good. The coding culture is, I guess, less active otherwise. If you join the clubs, then it'll be sorted out. Placement and internship opportunities depend more on your efforts if done properly. 12 LPA is very easy to get if you're from CSE in 62.
content.Infrastructure: The campus is not so big, like three buildings in which 1 is a hostel, but properly maintained with all facilities, with smart classrooms, and good food by Annapurna. The sports facilities are okay, and they have three entry gates and a parking area, 1 auditorium in JBS.

admission_process.title: JIIT Noida Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: JIIT Noida admission process 2025is based on bothentrance examandmeritfor UG & PG courses.

Jaypee Institute of Information Technology (JIIT), Noida, offersBTech, MTechand five-yearintegrated B Tech-M Techprogrammes as their  flagship. Candidates are offered various UG and PG courses to choose from. The institute is rankedbest in NCR and third best in North Indiaamong private engineering institutes in the NIRF (MHRD) 2016 ranking. Among all government and private engineering institutes across India,JIIT Noidais placed 60th.

JIIT Noida offers courses at the UG and PG course levels. The courses are offered in a full-time mode, and candidates must follow the admission process to secure a seat at their desired course. Learn more aboutJIIT Noida coursesand the institute through the highlights table given below:

The admission process for courses at JIIT Noida is both entrance-based and merit-based, depending on the course. There are various UG and PG courses to choose from, candidates can find out the selection criteria given on the above section. Candidates are required to find out the selection criteria and appear for the entrance exams that are required.
Step 1: JIIT Noida Application Process 2025

Minimum eligibility to apply for B Tech programmes is Class 12 pass in science stream or equivalent from a recognised university and minimum eligibility to apply for M Tech programmes is a Graduation /B Tech or equivalent from a recognised university. Candidates who meet these criteria can apply to the courses through the application form on the official website.
Step 2: Application Submission

Candidates must apply on the official website of JIT @jiit.ac.in.The application form requires candidates to fill in their personal and academic details. Candidates are required to upload their academic details
Step 3: Selection and Final Shortlist
Step 4: Admission

Candidates are required to submit the necessary documents at the time of admission to JIIT for the document verification round. Candidates must pay the fees for the course they have been shortlisted for through the admission process.

headings.text: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology Courses

lists: Admission toJIIT’s B Techand 5-year Integrated B Tech + M Tech courses is granted on the basis of JEE rank/score.

ForBiology-based B Techprogrammes (Biotechnology, Bioinformatics only), 50% of seats shall be allotted through JEE rank merit, and rest of the remaining 50% of seats shall be allotted on the basis of merit in Class XII examination for students having Biology/Biotechnology with Physics in Class XII.Candidates with Biology/Biotechnology, Physics and Maths can apply for both options (i.e JEE JEE-based admissions or Bio-based admissions) by filling out different application forms.

Admission toM Tech coursesis granted on the basis of a written test, PGCET conducted by the university itself. However, those who have validGATEscores can seek direct admission. Such candidates are exempted from taking the entrance test.
JIIT offersMBAthrough it's management institute, Jaypee Business School. Admission to the MBA programme is done on the basis ofCAT/MAT/CMAT/XAT/ATMA/GMATscores.

faqs.question: Can I join JIIT Noida BTech directly?
faqs.answer: Candidates cannot get direct admission to the BTech course at JIIT Noida as the admission process is entrance based. Candidates who meet the eligibility criteria can apply for the course through the application form on the official website. Candidates seeking admission to the talked about course are required to have a minimum aggregate of 60% in Class 12.

faqs.question: How can I get admission in BTech course at JIIT Noida?
faqs.answer: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology (JIIT), Noida, BTech admissionis conducted in three different modes. To get admission in the BTech course, candidates can choose any one admission procedure as per their qualification. There are three admission modes:Direct mode:Candidates are offered direct admission based on their score in the Class 12 exam. faqs.question: Can I do M.Tech at JIIT Noida without GATE?
faqs.answer: JIIT Noida M.Tech admission is completely entrance-based. Candidates seeking admission to the JIIT Noida M.Tech course must appear for the Graduate Aptitude Test in Engineering (GATE) or other entrance exam such as the JIIT PGCET or CUET PG. Apart from this, candidates are also requested to fulfil the minimum eligibility criteria to be eligible for JIIT Noida M.Tech admissions. Candidates must have a minimum of 60% aggregate in their graduation.

faqs.question: Does JIIT offer direct admission for any course?
faqs.answer: Yes, admission to the JIIT Noida courses is entrance-based as well as merit based for certain courses such as BBA. There is no provision for direct admission, but candidates can get admission to the merit based admission process courses just by filling out the application form. However, for JIIT Noida M.Tech admission, the institute offers direct admission to candidates with an overall CGPA of 7.50 out of 10. Those students are exempted from GATE or other entrance exams and are eligible for direct admissions.

placement_data.title: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology Noida Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: JIIT Noida has released the placement stats for its BTech batch that passed out in 2025 . The highest package offered during JIIT placements 2025 stood at INR 62 LPA , which was offered by Atlassian . The second-highest package offered by Microsoft, which stood at INR 55.38 LPA . Further, the average and median package offered to BTech students during JIIT placement 2025 stood at INR 11.13 LPA and INR 7.93 LPA , respectively.

A total of 666 offers were provided to 461 BTech CSE participating students , 142 offers to 121 ECE students, 71 offers to 50 IT students, and 25 offers to 26 students. The total percentage of offers during Jaypee Noida placements 2025 stood at 137% .

Jaypee Institute of Information Technology, Noida has a dedicated Placement and Training cell that organizes a campus recruitment training process to train the students through various in-house and out-of-the-house training sessions, including aptitude test, technical test, Group Discussions (GD), mock interviews, workshops, etc. It helps the students to prepare for placement interviews in technical and HR aspects by arranging meetings with professional trainers.

description: JIIT Noida cutoff 2025 is finally out for aspirants seeking admission to the BTech and Integrated BTech courses. The JoSAA Round 1 seat allotment result 2025 has been released as opening and closing ranks across different categories belonging to the AI and HS quotas. Candidates can scroll down to this page to view the JIIT Noida JEE Main cutoff 2025 for various specialisations and categories. A few more updates are below:

JIIT Noida JEE Main cutoff 2025 for Round 1 has been released for BTech and BTech Integrated admission across multiple specialisations. The cutoff was released as opening and closing ranks for different categories of students. For BTech, the Round 1 closing ranks varied between 70921 and 197144, with Computer Science and Engineering being the most competitive for admission. In contrast, B.Tech. in Electronics Engineering (VLSI Design and Technology) with a lenient first-round closing rank of 197

hostel_campus.college_name: Jaypee Institute of Information Technology Infrastructure Details & Reviews

hostel.description: JIIT has a total number of 5 hostels, 2 for boys and 3 for girls. The overall charge of student’s discipline and hostel administration vests in the chief warden. All hostel rooms are provided with LAN/Wi-Fi connectivity with 24 hours internet through the main server of the academic block. The hostel is also connected with outdoor sports centers for lawn tennis, basketball, volleyball, and badminton. Other facilities include are 24 hour’s electricity supply, water heaters, water freezer etc.

library.description: JIIT's Learning Resource Centre is an excellent repository of learning resources. It can accommodate about 700 users at a time. It is fully integrated with the latest barcode technology and international standard library management software - Liberty. The LRC consists of the latest collection of textbooks as well as reference books (approx. 61500), national as well as international peer-reviewed journals, magazines and electronic resources on subject areas covered by the academic curricula of the Institute and other universal knowledge (approx. 357800).

sports.description: Available Facilities: Badminton Court, Basketball Court, Cricket Ground, Football Ground, Swimming Pool, Tennis Court, Volleyball Court, Hockey Field

reviews.review_heading: Dissatisfied about the curriculum, but placements are kind of okay.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms depend on buildings; for B. Tech, they are not up to the mark and are in bad shape. Labs are clean and have facilities, but the experiments are bookish and some are not worth it. Food quality is normal, not too bad, but it gets boring after some time.

reviews.review_heading: JIIT: The ultimate college for placements.
reviews.review_text: Hostels are excellent in terms of price, but availability is based on CGPA. Food quality is excellent, and the campus features 24/7 medical facilities, including an ambulance and fire brigade. Wi-Fi speeds are also good. You can get around 50-60 Mbps, and you can access the library and cafe till 10:30 at night.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college, and I am satisfied with it.
reviews.review_text: It consists of good infrastructure. The facilities are good and the faculty is understanding. They listen to our problems sometimes. Labs are good, and the food in the mess and canteen is of good quality, which can be eaten frequently at minimal cost.

reviews.review_heading: It has a supportive environment and experienced faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The department has well-maintained classrooms with smart boards and audiovisual teaching aids. There is Wi-Fi connectivity across the department. The computer lab is equipped with an updated system. The library has a good collection of textbooks, reference books, and general books. Seminar halls are also available for presentations and guest lectures.

reviews.review_heading: Very Satisfied, good studies, good environment, good location, and decent crowd.
reviews.review_text: The campus is not so big, like three buildings in which 1 is a hostel, but properly maintained with all facilities, with smart classrooms, and good food by Annapurna. The sports facilities are okay, and they have three entry gates and a parking area, 1 auditorium in JBS.

reviews.review_heading: Good Infrastructure and Placements
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure and connectivity are pretty good. It is directly located at Noida Electronic City metro station; thus, it is very easy to travel to. Hostels are also very good. Every single hostel has 2 rooms and AC as well. Classrooms are good, Wi-Fi is good, and I love the library.

reviews.review_heading: Jaypee could be a better option than other private colleges.
reviews.review_text: There are clean classrooms, well-equipped labs, huge library, overall campus Wi-Fi and hostel Wi-Fi (with limit), medical facility, psychological counselling, cafe, and huge common mess. The college lacks in sports facilities, but as a technology college I will say that it is fine.

reviews.review_heading: Jaypee Noida review by CSE under graduate.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure here is very good. All the classrooms, labs, washrooms, and canteen are available. Every place is very clean and hygienic. You will not face any difficulties with cleanliness and hygiene. The whole campus is Wi-Fi enabled. The labs have the latest technology.

reviews.review_heading: A very good college in terms of private colleges.
reviews.review_text: The mess food is average and hygienic but repetitive, and many students prefer outside food or canteen options. Overall, JIIT is a good option for serious CSE students but less ideal for other branches or those seeking a relaxed college experience. It's okay.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements but boring college life.
reviews.review_text: Medical facilities are good, and the mess is better compared to most colleges. The cafe is nice at first, but you get bored easily because it doesn't offer many good options. The classrooms and the library are also really nice. The Wi-Fi restricts apps like WhatsApp and Amazon. The network in hostels is very limited. First-year hostels are nice, but from the second year onwards, the quality starts to degrade little by little. Wi-Fi connectivity isn't very nice. It can be very frustrating, especi...

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with the college, except for the campus area, which is hardly 16 acres.
reviews.review_text: Our course includes all the subjects required. But there are some subjects that lack practical knowledge, just like the other colleges. Hostels here have common washrooms. Rooms contain 2 beds and 2 almirahs. But the most important thing is the friends you make. Talking about sports, there aren't many facilities; no cricket or football ground, while you have a GYM along with a badminton court and a separate Squash Room. Table tennis is present inside the Hostel.

reviews.review_heading: I'm not satisfied with the mess food at all; it's horrible.
reviews.review_text: The college has well-equipped labs, air-conditioned classrooms, good Wi-Fi in academic areas, and a central library with a large collection of books and e-resources. The hostel rooms are clean and maintained regularly, with 24/7 water and electricity backup. The mess food is average, better than some other hostels, but repetitive sometimes. There are multiple canteens and food stalls inside the campus offering a decent variety.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with best experience.
reviews.review_text: The building is great with a very nice and comfortable infrastructure. Free Wi-Fi is there on whole campus, labs are equipped with all the necessary materials that too in a sufficient amount to meet all students' needs, and classrooms have centralized AC and also projectors which almost every teacher uses to teach. Library is the best with no noise and a great amount of books. The food in the cafeteria is so nice with 100% hygiene.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Jaypee 128 sector.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi and labs are satisfactory while classrooms are average. The library is good. Hostels are nice but the mess food is bland. Sports facilities exist but are poorly maintained. Medical assistance is available and efficient. Classrooms could use some renovation. The college infrastructure isn't exceptional; it's a single building college. The surrounding area needs improvement.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements but bad college life.
reviews.review_text: I am in the 128 sector branch where the infra is very below par. There was some construction going on, and also the size of the cafe was so small that it became congested during heavy hours. On top of that, MPH, the multipurpose hall is always occupied with some cultural activities, so there is no place to hang out in the college

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 863 published reviews , 803 reviews are verified.

likes.text: Many companies visit our campus like Adobe, Amazon, Amazon web services, Samsung, Infosys, Airtel, Wipro, Deloitte, Morgan Stanley, EY.
In our college, placement is done mainly by IT companies, like Amazon, SAP Labs, Infosys, Wipro, and government institutes, I think this is the best place for placement.

individual_reviews.course: B.Sc. in Nursing - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: Not bad faculty members. Placement is 100% and placement record is 100%.

content.Placements: In Maharashtra nursing CET, above 70 percentile, if vacancy is available, then below 70 percentile is allowed. B.Sc nursing is really good degree. In our college, we learn German language and are placed in Germany. Our college placement record is very good. 100% of students get placements here.
content.Infrastructure: College hostel is not big. There is no mess in hostel but mess is available in college campus. Hostel girl eats college canteen food. Food is not bad, but good. If you don't like this food, then you have to use other mess options. You can also choose rented PG.

individual_reviews.title: Good college life. Academics need more practical focus.

content.Placements: Bachelor of Computer Application (BCA). The placement rate depends heavily on individual performance, communication skills, and internship experience. Around 60-70% of students get placed. At TMV, the highest package is around 7.5 LPA (lakhs per annum). The top recruiting companies are Wipro, Infosys, TCS, and others.
content.Infrastructure: The services are very good. Our college provides good infrastructure for our course. The classrooms are clean and have projectors for presentations. We have computer labs with internet. The systems are updated for practical learning. Free Wi-Fi is available on campus. The library has a good collection of books and study materials for our subjects.

faqs.question: How can candidates join TMV - Tilak Maharashtra Vidyapeeth?
faqs.answer: The following steps are involved in the admission process in TMV:-The Candidate should collect the admission form either from the TMV or from other Vidyapeeth Campuses / Administrative offices of the Vidyapeeth by paying the fees.The application form must be filled and must be submitted either at the Tilak Maharashtra Vidyapeeth or from the Vidyapeeth Premises of the Vidyapeeth along with essential documents.Now, for the courses such as MCA, MBA, MMM, MSW, BFA, BEd, BPT, BSc Nursing, the college conducts a common entrance examination through which further admission process is conducted. The admission process is purely based on the eligibility criteria set for the common entrance examination.If a candidate clears the examination, he should provide the required documents assed by the institute in order to complete the admission process.

hostel_campus.college_name: TMV - Tilak Maharashtra Vidyapeeth Infrastructure Details & Reviews

hostel.description: University hostel rooms are provided with amenities like bed, cupboard, table, chair, fans and ample lighting. Running hot and cold water is provided in the bathrooms. TV room and indoor recreations are provided separately for boys and girls. 24 hours doctor on call is available. Security in the premises is assured by guards on duty for 24 hours.Apart from the regular Canteen, Indoor Games like Chess, Table Tennis and Carom are enjoyed by a large number of students.
facilities: The faculty is skilled and qualified
The placements is good here. 200+ recruiters provide placement.

library.description: The Tilak Maharashtra Vidyapeeth library was established in 1965. The Library is considered as an integral part in the academic activities of the Vidyapeeth. It has a collection of more than 1,00,000 books 171 periodicals (national & international) in subjects like Social Sciences, Sanskrit Literature, Philosophy, Religion, Indology, Ayurveda, Management, Biotechnology, Education, Law, Library Science, Engineering etc. The Library provides services to all the students, research scholars, teaching, non-teaching staff of this Vidyapeeth. It also has a rich collection of 2270 manuscripts. The scanning & digitization of manuscripts has been completed. The library is equipped with INFLIBNET facilities. The Library operations are fully automated with SLIM21 software.

sports.description: Available Facilities: Kabaddi Court, Table Tennis, Boxing

reviews.review_heading: Not bad faculty members. Placement is 100% and placement record is 100%.
reviews.review_text: College hostel is not big. There is no mess in hostel but mess is available in college campus. Hostel girl eats college canteen food. Food is not bad, but good. If you don't like this food, then you have to use other mess options. You can also choose rented PG.

reviews.review_heading: Good college life. Academics need more practical focus.
reviews.review_text: The services are very good. Our college provides good infrastructure for our course. The classrooms are clean and have projectors for presentations. We have computer labs with internet. The systems are updated for practical learning. Free Wi-Fi is available on campus. The library has a good collection of books and study materials for our subjects.

reviews.review_heading: This is one of the best colleges where you can learn a lot about technology and other stuff.
reviews.review_text: Our college has good infrastructure and good labs with good computer systems and Wi-Fi. Our teaching staff is also one of the best, overall one of the best colleges. We have some internal activities like sports and all the stuff that every college provides.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college to take admission.
reviews.review_text: The departments are well-equipped classrooms with projector, good Wi-Fi connections, and accessibility to reach classroom, library, and computer labs. Hostel facilities are well maintained with 24X7 water and electricity supply. The mess food is average.

reviews.review_heading: I'm honestly quite satisfied with my college's faculty and community.
reviews.review_text: Labs in my college are well-equipped with all the necessary equipment and accessories. We have a total of six Wi-Fi networks just for labs, so all of us can have fast internet access. Everything is cleaned after each class. Libraries are filled with amazing books full of knowledge.

reviews.review_heading: If students want to take admission, then they have to just study and not much other activities.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available in the labs. There are 3 labs in the Kharghar campus in Navi Mumbai. Classrooms are neat and clean. Other facilities like mess and canteen are available. Sports and games are just done during event days other than that only studies and examinations are done.

reviews.review_heading: Honest review for college.
reviews.review_text: There is no Wi-Fi for students. Labs are small, and computers take a lot of time to open, but the lab instructors are good. Classrooms are very small; we feel like we are in a jail. There is a library and reading hall for students to study well. Parking is also small, and there are some problems with parking.

reviews.review_heading: It's easy to take admission, and the curriculum is always updated - 7/10.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms are good, but they are small, and big classrooms are not often used on a daily basis. Labs are well and good as per the course needs, just not that spacious. Wi-Fi—I didn't use it, I don't even know if it is there. I'm a day scholar, so I don't have any idea about hostels.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with the college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of TMV is good, with some modern amenities available. The hostel has limited capacity, with some basic facilities provided by the college. The sizes of the classrooms are good; they are properly ventilated and well-lit, even without tube lights.

reviews.review_heading: Good ahead. College is good for BCA, and the faculty is excellent in teaching.
reviews.review_text: We do have labs, a library, classrooms, a gym, a yoga hall, a place for sports activities, an auditorium, Wi-Fi, etc. Canteen food is good; it’s healthy. The college does have sports activities. I’m not sure about the hostel facilities because I’m not using them, so yes, they do have decent things.

reviews.review_heading: Little Disappointed by the course curriculum.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is good, not too bad, not too good. They have well-maintained computer labs for practical sessions. Every class is equipped with a projector for visual representation. They don't have Wi-Fi in classrooms. They have a gym, but they charge around 400 Rs per month, this is a sad part. I don't stay in the hostel. The canteen area is peaceful and has delicious food. The food is delicious, really.

reviews.review_heading: Good college as a last option if you don't get admission to other better colleges.
reviews.review_text: There are computer labs for students, a reading hall so they can sit at a peaceful, silent place and study, and a library for students with more than a thousand books. The canteen is available for students, and there is a medical room if any emergency happens. Classrooms have projectors. They provide their own books to study, etc.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by Institute of Business Studies and Research, Navi MumbaiReviewed on 10 Nov 2024)
reviews.review_heading: I am not dissatisfied with my college.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure for the course are quite comprehensive, including high-speed Wi-Fi, well-equipped labs, modern classrooms, and a resource-rich library to support learning and research. Hostel facilities are comfortable, with rooms that are maintained regularly, though the quality can vary. The mess and canteen provide a variety of food options, and while nutritious, the quality may not always be consistent. Medical facilities are accessible, with basic healthcare services avail...

reviews.review_heading: The great TMV has the best people on campus. College life is the best .
reviews.review_text:
Best hostel facilities. 
The security is excellent. 
The water frequency is good.
Food quality in the canteen is nice. 
It has some leakage issues.
Girls hostel is nice. 
The boys' hostel is going to be demolished, and a new building is being built there that will have good facilities.

reviews.review_heading: TMV review 2024 for the upcoming students admission.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available for the course/department were Wi-Fi canteen, computer labs, library and good faculty to discuss with and for the quality of the hostel facilities, the quality of food available in the mess and canteen we're well and good.

college_info.intro:
The flagship programme offered at Firebird Institute of Research in Management is PGDM. The institute offers this programme to students at the PG level. It is offered in full-time mode and across several specialisations such as Human Resurces, Marketing, Buisness Analytics, and Logistics etc. The institute offers this programme for a duration of 2 years with a comprehensive curriculum.
FIRM Coimbatore courses are approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is fully linked with the industry. From the first day of the programme, all Firebird Institute of Research in Management students engage in internships under a 70/30 model with industry partners. The institute focuses on bridging the gap between theoretical learning and practical application. Candidates can check the popular programmes offered at the Firebird Institute of Research in Management, Tamil Nadu, in the table below:

reviews_list.batch_info: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Highly qualified and top-notch faculty having industrial experience are present.

review_content.Placements: Placements are guaranteed. More than 5 students from the first batch had international placements in ASPA & BBG with a package of 9.8 LPA in on job training period. Home First Finance Company offered a package of 6.2 LPA. CavinKare offered a salary package of 5.5 LPA, the lowest salary offered was 3.8 LPA. Various companies such as TVS, Britannia, Unibic, etc., visit the campus to conduct placements. They offer various profiles like marketing analysts, business development and many other roles.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of the college is world class. The campus is fully air-conditioned. The architecture of the college stands in 7th place, all over India. Hostels are like 3-star suit rooms and many executive quarters are available with a fully air-conditioning facility. The library is world class. High-quality air-conditioner facility is provided in classrooms and auditorium. A beautiful amphitheater is available for fun and activity based learning.

reviews_list.batch_info: Post Graduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Faculty members, course curriculum, and infrastructure of the college are good.

review_content.Placements: I am a first-year student of PGDM. As of now in the first semester, we had an internship for 15 days. Each semester, we have internships for 15 days. Every student is placed in decent companies in and around Coimbatore such as L&T, REL, TTK, CRI, Roots, IndoShell etc. Good companies offered summer internships to our seniors batch students, is at the end of the 2nd semester.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is one of the important features of Firebird. The whole campus is enabled with a high-speed Wi-Fi facility, but the network is very poor in the hostel. The hostel accommodation is good and pleasant. Food offered in the hostel is okay, and sometimes, it is good. The college has smart classrooms. The library has good books such as subject-oriented, fiction, non-fiction, management books etc.

overview_faqs.question: What is the application fee at Firebird Institute for PGDM programme?
overview_faqs.answer: For admission to the Firebird Institute of Research in Management, the application process is available in both online & offline modes. The application for both the mode applicants is same i.e. INR 1,000 per applicant. To submit the fee online, candidates can use debit card/ UPI/ or any other online mode. For offline mode payments Cheque or DD issued in Favouring ‘FIREBIRD INSTITUTE OF RESEARCH IN MANAGEMENT’ payable at Coimbatore. Provided, the offline candidates can also submit the application fee at the counter of campus.

admission_overview.title: Firebird Institute of Research in Management Admission Overview 2026
admission_overview.description: Firebird Institute of Research in Management offers PGDM programme course across multiple specialisations. Admission to Firebird Institute of Research in Management courses is entrance-based. Firebird offers a two-year PGDM at the PG level in the Management stream. Additionally, the school also offers Global MBA from Multimedia University, Malaysia and PGP from academic partners for Industry Integrated specialisations. Candidates can fill out the application form online on the official website of the institute. The institute offers various facilities as:
