admission_process.title: Firebird Institute of Research in Management Admission Process 2026

paragraphs: Admission to the flagship course PGDM programme is based on a valid score obtained by the candidates in theCAT/MAT /XAT /TANCET /CMAT /ATMA, or similar score exams. Admission to MBA course offered by Firebird Institute of Research in Management is subject to the entrance exam, selection rounds, and past academic records. The following table mentions the eligibility and selection criteria for all programmes:
Firebird Institute of Research in Management Application Process

The application process for all programmes at Firebird Institute of Research in Management is done online. Candidates can fill out the Firebird Institute of Research in Management application form on the official website for the respective course accepting exam as given above. The registration fee for all programmes varies as per the counselling bodies & official website of Firebird Institute of Research in Management.
Firebird Institute of Research in Management Selection Process

Candidates who've applied for any course at Firebird Institute of Research in Management must appear for the entrance exam or qualifying exam for PGDM. After qualifying the minimum eligibility criteria, candidates have to appear for the Firebird Aptitude test, Group Discussion, and Personal Interview (PI). The shortlisted candidates will be selected for the course.
Firebird Institute of Research in Management Document Verification & Payment of Admission Fee

Selected candidates need to attend the selection process on the designated date and time along with the original copies of all their relevant documents. Shortlisted aspirants will receive an admission letter through email as well as by post. They will have to pay the specified fee before the deadline to confirm their seat in the institute.

hostel.description: In-house residential facility is available. The infrastructure provided in the residential blocks ensures an all-round and balanced development of student’s personality.  Our hostel is equipped with wellness and facilities like television sets, indoor games, Wi-Fi access and recreation facilities.  There are separate hostels for boys and girls.

library.description: The library of Firebird Institute is very spacious and has numerous books. The library has a collection of scholarly books in various functional areas of management and offline and online subscription to more than 500 international journals in Management. The library has access to the National Digital Library, Multimedia Computers and digital learning materials.

reviews.review_heading: The college is good with amazing infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of college and classrooms are excellent and state-of-the-art. The campus is well-equipped with Wi-Fi. The library is well arranged and equipped with thousands of books and also E-books. Hostel and mess facilities are good and hygienic. Moreover, weekly once non-veg food is served in the mess.

reviews.review_heading: Blessed year in FIRM by infrastructure, placements, and learning experience.
reviews.review_text: Our college has the best infrastructure. All our classrooms are smart class. The college will providing high-speed Wi-Fi connectivity. We are blessed with a library having a huge collection of books the library is always updated with the new collection of books. Vehicles and necessary medicines are readily available. The canteen is so neat and clean always menu mainly consists of veg items. Hostel rooms are three sharing and it's worth in hostel fee.

reviews.review_heading: Highly qualified and top-notch faculty having industrial experience are present.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is world class. The campus is fully air-conditioned. The architecture of the college stands in 7th place, all over India. Hostels are like 3-star suit rooms and many executive quarters are available with a fully air-conditioning facility. The library is world class. High-quality air-conditioner facility is provided in classrooms and auditorium. A beautiful amphitheater is available for fun and activity based learning.

reviews.review_heading: Faculty members, course curriculum, and infrastructure of the college are good.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is one of the important features of Firebird. The whole campus is enabled with a high-speed Wi-Fi facility, but the network is very poor in the hostel. The hostel accommodation is good and pleasant. Food offered in the hostel is okay, and sometimes, it is good. The college has smart classrooms. The library has good books such as subject-oriented, fiction, non-fiction, management books etc.

reviews.review_heading: FIRM has good infrastructure, facilities and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Firebird has one of the best infrastructures in India. Infrastructure is the biggest strength of FBIRM. Our college has a library which has more than 1,000 books. Classrooms are equipped with centralised AC and smart boards. It also has hostel facility where one room contains three beds, three cupboards, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Really good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Firebird has a good infrastructure. It has got the institute with the best infrastructure award in 2016. Classrooms are equipped with the smart board, and Wi-Fi, etc. They are providing healthy food. In the hostel, one room will be shared by three students, so there is a quiet and peaceful environment over there.

reviews.review_heading: The college creates good leaders.
reviews.review_text: The college has wonderful infrastructure and facilities. The college provides good residential facilities. The infrastructure helps the students to focus on our studies. The library helps us in updating our knowledge. This college has got an award for standing in the list of top 10 colleges regarding the infrastructure.

reviews.review_heading: The best platform for students who aspire to become skilled managers.
reviews.review_text: The college has smart classrooms and international learning environment with well-designed infrastructure. The library and labs are well-equipped. Well-planned infrastructure is provided and that supports progressive learning. The environment-friendly atmosphere will help students to remain stress-free and be productive in learning.

reviews.review_heading: The college has good infrastructure and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: Being a residential course, the college is well-planned and constructed on the outskirts of the city to make the place much peaceful, lively and pollution free. Well-equipped professional level library with books of all domains is provided to influence students to read and improve their knowledge.

reviews.review_heading: The college provides industry-oriented learning.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is good. The college provides various facilities like well-furnished classrooms, library, hostels, auditorium, lab, plastic-free zone, and pollution free and good environment. There is an amphitheatre in the college which is a relaxed and open place, where everyone can share their knowledge and experiences.

reviews.review_heading: Being innovative which brings out your full potential.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is so prominent, all classrooms are well furnished with smart class amenities. Library is strong and are up to international standards, the ambience is peaceful and the course is structured as residential programme the surrounding is bound of natural elegance.

reviews.review_heading: Firebird Institute of Research in Management has state-of-the-art infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is excellent. The library is well-furnished with updated books and journals. Wi-Fi connectivity is also good. Classrooms are spacious and very well-equipped with smartboards. Lab facility is good, and the quality of food is good here. The hostel is neat, clean and spacious.

reviews.review_heading: The infrastructure and faculty members of the college are amazing.
reviews.review_text: A proper learning environment is created away from the city to make it peaceful and pollution free for the students to study. Being a residential course, all the facilities are provided to students. An open amphitheatre is available to organise various cultural activities and competitions. It gives a lively feeling and promotes interaction among students.

reviews.review_heading: Good internships, infrastructure and amenities.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is excellent and is the biggest advantage. It attracts all the students and faculty members to join this college. Hostels are well furnished and good to stay in, and the food served in the campus is good. Classrooms are well maintained and have smart boards and AC facilities.

reviews.review_heading: The atmosphere is good, and the faculty members are excellent.
reviews.review_text: The college has wonderful infrastructure and facilities. You would be provided with good residential facilities. It boosts your concentration on academics. The library helps you a lot in academics. It is one of the modern libraries, and you could get many books related to management and other concepts.

college_info.intro:
The famous programmes given at DYPDPU SMR include MBA programme. Master of Business Administration programme given at the School of Management and Research (SMR), Dr. D. Y. Patil Dnyan Prasad University is a exact crafted pedagogical initiative designed to help students with the requisite knowledge, skills and competencies necessary to excel in the rapidly evolving business landscape of the 21st century.
The Programme’s curriculum is aligned with the needs of the industry, emphasising experiential learning and offering dual specializations to provide students with a distinctive competitive advantage. Students can check the popular programmes offered at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research in the table provided below:

Candidates have to pay INR 3.99 Lacs in first year and INR 2 Lacs in the second year. Besides, aspirants have to pay INR 45,000 as registration fee on selection. Aspirants have to pay the first year fee in three installments.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: My review of this college.

review_content.Placements: Placements were pretty good as well. A few companies came to the college. They also conducted pool campus placements. About 70-80% of students got placed in well-known companies. Internships were not in this college, but placements were very good. The average package was 3.5 LPA. Good companies like Amazon, TCS, Infosys, Flipkart, BookMyShow, HDFC Bank, Jio, etc., visited every year and had good interactions with students. Students got placed according to their skills and qualifications. The roles offered were mostly Sales Manager, Financial Analyst, Finance Management, Field Management, and Cashier.

reviews_list.batch_info: MBA in Digital Marketing - Batch of 2024
reviews_list.review_title: Good college but not best.

review_content.Placements: 70% students placed. Highest 13.75 LPA and lowest 2.4 Lpa. LTIMindtree and TCS are some top companies. All student get internship in small companies. Digital Marketing is the top role offered. Many of the packages are very low and it is not good for students.
review_content.Infrastructure: Best structure and facilities are good. These facilities help us to grow and have a good easy life for students. Wifi is very fast and very difficult to access. It only connect to the laptops with anti virus, no mobile can connect to the wifi available in college.

Check below table for eligibility and course fees at Dr D Y Patil Institute of Management & Research:

faqs.answer: Yes, DYPDPU SMR offers a full-time Masters of Buisness Administration (MBA) programme. The course spans two years, divided into four semesters. The university provides a general MBA as well as a specialisation in Digital Marketing. Admission is done online through the official website. The selection criteria is based on CAT, MAT, CMAT, MAH-CET, XAT, or ATMA, scorecards. The eligibility criteria is a minimum of 50% aggregate marks in graduation.
faqs.question: Q: Is there MBA available at DYPDPU SMR?

faqs.answer: Dr. D. Y. Patil Institute of Management and Research (DYPIMR) is considered one of the most elite management institutes in Pune. Some say it's one of the best colleges in Pune for the MBA program. According to a review on Shiksha, DYPIMR's MBA programme has relatively good placements. The review states that almost 50% of the students were placed, with the highest salary package offered being INR 12 LPA and the average salary package offered being INR 5 LPA. According to the websearch results, DY Patil is one of the best B schools for online MBA programs. They are known for their quality education as well as placements for students.
faqs.question: Q: Is Dr. D. Y. Patil Institute of Management and Research good for MBA ?

faqs.answer: Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research offers admission to UG and PG courses based on entrance exam scores of the candidates. The selection for diploma programme is based on performance of the aspirants in personal interview round. The school considers scores in CAT, MAT, XAT, PERA CET, MAH CET, etc. for admission to specific programmes. The university conducts DPAT for admission to MBA, BBA, BCA and MCA programmes. Those who are selected have to report at the campus for document verification and fee payment.

individual_reviews.title: Satisfied with the events of the college.

individual_reviews.title: My review of this college.

content.Placements: Placements were pretty good as well. A few companies came to the college. They also conducted pool campus placements. About 70-80% of students got placed in well-known companies. Internships were not in this college, but placements were very good. The average package was 3.5 LPA. Good companies like Amazon, TCS, Infosys, Flipkart, BookMyShow, HDFC Bank, Jio, etc., visited every year and had good interactions with students. Students got placed according to their skills and qualifications. The roles offered were mostly Sales Manager, Financial Analyst, Finance Management, Field Management, and Cashier.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Digital Marketing - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: Good college but not best.

content.Placements: 70% students placed. Highest 13.75 LPA and lowest 2.4 Lpa. LTIMindtree and TCS are some top companies. All student get internship in small companies. Digital Marketing is the top role offered. Many of the packages are very low and it is not good for students.
content.Infrastructure: Best structure and facilities are good. These facilities help us to grow and have a good easy life for students. Wifi is very fast and very difficult to access. It only connect to the laptops with anti virus, no mobile can connect to the wifi available in college.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: Amazing Days of DY Patil University.

content.Placements: About placement: Students' opinions differ, but more than placement, knowledge is important; with knowledge, you can easily secure a job. Our college provides many placement opportunities, including BNY Mellon, HCL Services, TCL, Barclays, etc. Some students secure two offer letters, mostly for analyst roles: senior analyst and finance analyst.
content.Infrastructure: There are many good facilities and subscriptions provided by the college. The Coursera Data Analyst Data Visualization course was offered free of charge. In the college lab, we have computers and a large collection of books in the library, including academic ones. I am living in a flat that is in front of the college, with three people sharing a room. The rent is 3,500 rs for each person, and the mess rent is 4,000 rs. The food quality and taste are good.

admission_overview.title: DYPDPU SMR Admission Overview 2025
admission_overview.description: DYPDPU SMR admissions 2025 are completely entrance-based. The college offers admission to UG and PG programmes based on scores of state/ national-level entrance exams. The top accepting entrance exam scores for admission by DYPDPU SMR are MAH MBA CET, MAH MCA CET, CMAT, CAT, etc. The university also conducts its own entrance exam DPAT for admission to UG and PG courses. DYPDPU SMR admissions are regulated as per DTE norms. Candidates must apply on the official website of DYPDPU. The final seat allotment to courses at the college is done through a Counselling process. The school offers courses at UG, PG, diploma and doctoral levels in the Management stream.

eligibility_selection.title: DYPDPU SMR Eligibility & Selection 2025

Candidates must meet the eligibility criteria for the courses they wish to apply for. The university also conducts an entrance-test - DPAT for admission to UG and PG courses. Besides, the school also accepts scores in MAH CET, CAT, MAT, PERA CET, etc. Check below the eligibility and selection criteria for popular DYPDPU SMR courses:

admission_process.title: DYPDPU SMR Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research admissionsbegin with the announcement of eligibility criteria, application dates, and procedure through an advertisement. Candidates seeking admission in any of the offered programmes can apply online or offline. Admissions usually start in July every year and closes by September. Below is the step-wiseDYPDPU SMR admission process:

Candidates can apply online as well as offline. Aspirants can obtain the form and prospectus from the campus. Candidates can also fill up the form online by paying an application fee. Aspirants can register for the university-level exam or apply with a valid score in any of the accepted entrance tests.
All the aspirants, regardless of entrance exam type need to submit the following documents:

Aspirants valid score in any of the entrance exams can appear for DPAT. Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research conducts this entrance test for admission to UG and PG courses.
The university announces the result for DPAT on the official website. Candidates with a valid score in any of the accepted entrance exam can also participate in further rounds.
Step 5: Counselling & PI
Selected aspirants have to further pass a personal interview round for admission. Candidates also need to attend a counselling session.
Step 6: Final Merit List & Seat Allocation (Rounds)

The university prepares a final merit list based on entrance test/ external scores, PI performance and academic qualifications of the candidates. The seat are allocated to aspirants based on their merit, availability and applicable reservation criteria.
Step 7: Fee Payment & Document Verification

Candidates who confirm their admission need to pay the DYPDPU SMR fee and submit all the required documents for verification. Admitted aspirants need to report at the school and adhere to its joining norms and regulations.
For more information about Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research check out the below videos:

courses_data.name: DYPDPU SMR MCA Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research offers a two-yearMCAprogramme at the PG level. The first specialisation of MCA includes Data Science, Cyber Security and Cloud Computing. The second specialisations include Full Stack and Blockchain. Admission to MCA programme is based on the scores of the candidates in PERA CET, MAH MCA CET or DPAT. Candidates who have completed graduation are eligible to apply for this course.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for MCA at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research?
faqs.answer: Aspirants who have completed graduation from a recognised university/ institution of national importance with at least 45% aggregate or equivalent grade are eligible to apply for the MCA programme at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research. There is a relaxation of 5% in the aggregate for SC/ ST candidates.

faqs.question: How much is the fee for MCA at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research?
faqs.answer: The total annual fee for MCA at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research isINR 5 lakh. Candidates who are selected for admission in the MCA programme have to pay a registration fee of INR 45,000 on selection followed by the second installment of the tuition fee within one month of confirmation.

faqs.question: How can I get a seat in MCA at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research?
faqs.answer: Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research offers seats in MCA programme based on MAH MCA CET or PERA CET scores of the candidates. The university also conducts DPAT to shortlist aspirants for admission to MCA programme. Selected candidates are further called for a personal interview round. The school releases a final merit list based on the performance of the aspirants in all the selection rounds. Those who are selected have to pay a registration fee to confirm their

courses_data.name: DYPDPU SMR MBA Admission 2025
eligibility: Accepting Exams:XAT, MAT, ATMA, MAH CET, CMAT, CAT
courses_data.description: Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research offers a two-year full-timeMBAprogramme at the PG level. The school offers MBA in various specialisations such asGeneral, Pharmaceutical Management, Agribusiness Management, FinTech, Psychology and Hospitality Management. The selection for MBA programme is based on CAT,MAT, XAT,CMAT, ATMA, MAH MBA CET, DPAT scores of the candidates, followed by a PI round. Candidates who have completed a bachelor's degree in relevant subjects can apply for the MBA programme.

faqs.question: Can I join an MBA programme at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research without MAH MBA CET score?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates can join MBA programme without qualifying for MAH MBA CET exam. The college also accepts scores of national-level CAT, XAT, ATMA, MAH MBA CET and CMAT for admission to MBA programme. Students can appear and qualify for any one  of the specified entrance exam to participate in the Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research MBA admission process.

faqs.question: What is the fee for MBA at Dnyaan Prasad Global University - Dr. D.Y. Patil Unitech Society?
faqs.answer: The total annual fee for MBA at Dnyaan Prasad Global University - Dr. DY Patil Unitech Society isINR 5.99 lakh. Candidates have to pay INR 3.99 Lacs in first year and INR 2 Lacs in the second year. Besides, aspirants have to pay INR 45,000 as registration fee on selection. Aspirants have to pay the first year fee in three installments.

faqs.question: Who can apply for MBA at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research?
faqs.answer: Aspirants who have completed graduation in relevant subjects from a recognised university/ institution of national importance with at least 45% aggregate or equivalent grade (40% aggregate for SC/ ST) can apply for MBA programme at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research. Candidates should have relevant documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in MBA at DYPDPU SMR without CAT?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates can get admissions to MBA courses at  DYPDPU SMR without CAT scores because the college accepts several entrance examinations for admissions to MBA courses, such asMAT/ CMAT/ MAH-CET/ XAT/ ATMA.Therefore, candidates can get admissions to MBA courses at DYPDPU SMR with CAT. However, it is not compulsory to get admissions and achieve valid scores in CAT only.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research?
faqs.answer: Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research offers admission to UG and PG courses based on entrance exam scores of the candidates. The selection for diploma programme is based on performance of the aspirants in personal interview round. The school considers scores in CAT, MAT, XAT, PERA CET, MAH CET, etc. for admission to specific programmes. The university conducts DPAT for admission to MBA, BBA, BCA and MCA programmes. Those who are selected have to report at the campus for document verification and fee payment.

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research?
faqs.answer: Dr. DY Patil Institute of Management and Research does not offer direct admission to UG and PG courses. Candidates are first required to apply for the course and then appear for the university-conducted entrance exam. Aspirants with a valid score in any of the accepted entrance tests need to pass a personal interview round for admission. Once selected, aspirants have to confirm their seat by paying the course fee. For Diploma programme, aspirants are directly called for the PI round.

faqs.question: Can I get admission at Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research without entrance exam score?
faqs.answer: Getting admission in Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management and Research without entrance test scores depends on the course applied by the aspirant. For UG and PG programmes, aspirants do require passing a national or university-level entrance test. The university also conducts DPAT to shortlist aspirants for admission. Candidates do not require passing an entrance exam for Diploma course. They are selected based on their performance in the personal interview round.

faqs.question: How much did the cut-off increase/decrease for MBA at DYPDPU SMR  in 2025?
faqs.answer: The 2025 cutoff for MBA courses at DYPIMR has not been released yet. However, as per the previous academic years, the cutoff on the basis of MAH MBA CET percentile for the general MBA course and the MBA in Digital Marketing course was different. Moreover, the cutoff for general MBA courses was higher than for MBA in Digital Marketing. As per the latest report, the highest and average package offered during Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research placements 2025 stood at INR 17 LPA and INR 8 LPA, respectively. Further, the minimum package offered in 2025 stood at INR 5 LPA . The top recruiters of Dr. DY Patil Dnyan Prasad University School of Management & Research include Amazon, Accenture, ITC, IBM, Genpact, Airtel, ICICI Bank, PhonePe, MRF, Bosch, EY, MRF, Deloitte , etc.

faqs.question: How successful is the placement cell in securing jobs for MBA/PGDM students at DYPDPU SMR?
faqs.answer: Based on the feedback provided by students and alumni on Shiksha, the placement cell offers multiple placement opportunities. The college provides many placement opportunities, including firms such as BNY Mellon, HCL Services, TCL, and Barclays. The reviews also mention that many students receive multiple job offers, particularly for analyst roles such as Senior Analyst and Finance Analyst. However, it is essential to note that while the placement cell seems to be effective in securing jobs for some students, individual outcomes may vary. Some students emphasize that "knowledge is important" and that securing a job requires more than just reliance on the placement cell. Therefore, Shiksha student reviews give a balanced review of the placement cell of the university.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with the events of the college.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is best in digital classrooms and the reading hall. The college Wi-Fi is also good the labs and library are easily accessible. Canteen food quality is also good. The medical room is also available. Sports equipment is also available, like table tennis, carrom, etc.

reviews.review_heading: The college has a true value for money.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure of the college were really good. We had world-class amenities and facilities available to us in our course. The facilities provided to us in the hotel were also great. The food served in the canteen and mess was amazing.

reviews.review_heading: My review of this college.
reviews.review_text: The hostel of this college was very good. The hostel infrastructure was very beautiful and impressive. Various facilities were provided in the hostel, such as a bed, fan, hot water for bathing, purified drinking water, and Wi-Fi for internet surfing. The food in the mess was also very good and hygienic.

reviews.review_heading: Good college but not best.
reviews.review_text: Best structure and facilities are good. These facilities help us to grow and have a good easy life for students. Wifi is very fast and very difficult to access. It only connect to the laptops with anti virus, no mobile can connect to the wifi available in college.

reviews.review_heading: Amazing Days of DY Patil University.
reviews.review_text: There are many good facilities and subscriptions provided by the college. The Coursera Data Analyst Data Visualization course was offered free of charge. In the college lab, we have computers and a large collection of books in the library, including academic ones. I am living in a flat that is in front of the college, with three people sharing a room. The rent is 3,500 rs for each person, and the mess rent is 4,000 rs. The food quality and taste are good.

reviews.review_heading: Good faculty build a better future.
reviews.review_text: Campus life is good. Our college is in front of DY Patil Arts and Commerce. In college, 200 computers are connected through center serves. The latest licensed software, like SAP, and 24-hour internet access are some of the silent features of well-equipped labs. The institute library does have more than 20,000 books, journals, and magazines for students; there is a special reading hall. The hostel is in front of the college, separate for boys and girls. Many private and college mess facilities ar...

reviews.review_heading: I really miss my college.
reviews.review_text: The college is near PCMC, so all modes of transportation (bus, metro, and local) are available. Our campus is very big, and the ground is always clean. Cleaning and washing are done from time to time. Wi-Fi is also available in libraries equipped with digital equipment like iPads and thumbs. Registration is required before entering the library. The hostel is very clean, food is like home-cooked, and there is good water availability. Canteens and tea shops are excellent, offering a variety of pro...

reviews.review_heading: Best college of Pune University.
reviews.review_text: It is one of the best infrastructures you can get in any college at Pune University. It has well-equipped facilities for students, whether they are studying or hanging out. The main cultural event is for a week and at a great time it will be like a carnival. The hostel is available for boys and girls. It has a big room, a bed, hot water, drinking water and mess food. Food quality and quantity are both good.

reviews.review_heading: Fall in love with Dy Patil Institute of management & research.
reviews.review_text: In DYU Pimpri, various colleges come. We have separate buildings. Non-stop Wi-Fi is provided. Classrooms are big, having projectors. Hostels have TV, AC, washing machines, and good quality mess food, but hostel prices are high. They do not provide a loan service. The canteen has good tea only; no medical assistance is given by the college. Sports are negligible.

reviews.review_heading: MCA at DY Patio Pimpri Pune.
reviews.review_text: Our college is situated opposite the engineering college, providing convenient access to Wi-Fi in all campus classrooms. The classrooms are spacious and well-maintained, fostering an ideal learning environment. Additionally, our library offers a wide range of books that can be borrowed by students. We take pride in our combined sports ground, which is utilized by both engineering and non-engineering students for various sports events and gatherings. Moreover, our hostel is equipped with modern a...

reviews.review_heading: Review of DY Patil Management & Research, Pimpri.
reviews.review_text: Our college is in front of an engineering college and it is near to PCMC so all modes of transportation are available. Wi-Fi is available throughout the year. Hostel rooms are good but I prefer to take food from the outside room; they have delicious food in just 40 minutes. In sports, coaches train some interested students in sports.

reviews.review_heading: DY Patil Institute Of Management & Research.
reviews.review_text: The college boasts a prestigious reputation, with a stunning campus and impressive infrastructure. The campus exudes a captivating natural ambiance, and Wi-Fi connectivity is accessible throughout. The library is renowned for its conducive study environment, while the hostel offers high-quality and delicious meals, unlike other budget accommodations. Additionally, there are numerous canteens both within and outside the campus. However, it is worth noting that our college does not have a medical ...

reviews.review_heading: Good college for doing MBA.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is good on campus; special areas are made for student sitting, classrooms have projectors, and free internet is only available in the library. Hostels are good but mess food is the worst. Try to use the outside Sai mess; they have good food. No medical facility was given to us. In sports events, various indoor and outdoor sports competitions are held.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, I had a good experience in the college.
reviews.review_text: Our college has amazing infrastructure. The facilities offered by the college were really good. The labs of the college were well equipped. The library of the college was big and stocked. The college has a hostel for the students. Hostel rooms were big and clean. The food in the hostel mess was good to eat in our college.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure, the best faculty, and the nature of teachers are also good.
reviews.review_text: There's a library in our college, many classrooms, restrooms, restrooms for the physically disabled, an auditorium, a canteen, and many more. Hostels are well equipped and food facilities and medical facilities are available. Good staircases and lifts are available.

review_summary.college_name: MITS Colleges Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering (Artificial Intelligence ) - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: Strong academics with supportive faculty, good infrastructure, and improving placement opportunities

content.Placements: In my college, 80 percentage of students are placed and I think the highest package is 24 LPA and the lowest is based on the course and branch last year (3 LPA) and average is about 6-8 LPA. For our campus, the top recruiting companies are Infosys, Accenture, L&T, Mindtree, Cognizant, IBM, and our college has high quality faculty. The internships are doing by everyone; most students did internship in Accenture and Infosys from 2nd year onwards. The top roles offered are SDE roles. Most students placed from the branch of CSE-AI, CSE-AIML.
content.Infrastructure: In the MITS College there is facility of hostel. We want to take separate hostel outside of college. The college infrastructure is good, having good equipment's in labs and Wi-Fi facility, and having central library and big block for the Computer Science lab. The classrooms are also very neat and having projector in each class with good infrastructure.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: It provides good teaching and good facilities.

content.Placements: 53 percent of students get placed. The lowest package offered is 2.5 LPA, and the highest package offered is 12 LPA. Accenture is the top recruiting company for our course. Company-specific training is also given. The placement and training cell is also present, which is very useful to train students for interviews.
content.Infrastructure: Good Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and libraries are available. All facilities are good. Food is also good in the canteen. Sports and games opportunities are also given to interested students. The college is also very big. Wi-Fi is available anytime and anywhere in the college. Systems in the labs are also good.

individual_reviews.title: Good campus life with decent placements and supportive faculty.

content.Placements: I am from B. Tech batch of Madanapalle Institute of Technology & Science, Madanapalle. Around 70–75 percent students got placed. The highest package was about 12 LPA, the lowest around 3 LPA, average nearly 4–4.5 LPA. Companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro came. Nearly 60 percent students got internships as software roles.

MITS Colleges has received strong ranks by the NIRF under the 'Engineering' category. Provided parameters including, Teaching, Graduation Outcome, Inclusivity and Research, the institute is ranked in a good position as compared to other institutes by the NIRF 2025. In the 'Engineering' category, the institute's ranks have shown stability when evaluated against previous year's ranking. In 2025, MITS Colleges's rank is #201, the same as last year's rank in the 'Engineering' category by the NIRF ranking.
Find below the latest rankings and category breakdowns from several ranking bodies.

outlook.description:
MITS Colleges has been recognised for its excellence in various fields by Outlook-ICARE 2025, outperforming other institutes in parameters such as Teaching, Graduation Outcome, Inclusivity & Research, as well as fostering an exceptional learning environment.
Explore the MITS Colleges latest rankings by other ranking bodies and their categories below:

reviews.review_heading: Strong academics with supportive faculty, good infrastructure, and improving placement opportunities
reviews.review_text: In the MITS College there is facility of hostel. We want to take separate hostel outside of college. The college infrastructure is good, having good equipment's in labs and Wi-Fi facility, and having central library and big block for the Computer Science lab. The classrooms are also very neat and having projector in each class with good infrastructure.

reviews.review_heading: It provides good teaching and good facilities.
reviews.review_text: Good Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and libraries are available. All facilities are good. Food is also good in the canteen. Sports and games opportunities are also given to interested students. The college is also very big. Wi-Fi is available anytime and anywhere in the college. Systems in the labs are also good.

reviews.review_heading: The campus is good with good placements.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure of the college are good. Wi-Fi is available in labs, classrooms, and the library. The quality of food in the hostels is good. Facilities like reading rooms and sports rooms are available near the canteen. A big ground and a small clinic are available on the campus.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is very good for placement cracking.
reviews.review_text: Madanapalle Institute of Technology and Science is providing very good and excellent facilities of labs, classrooms, gym, sports, and have seperate sports club in my college. Our college supports students who are interested in sports and I do not belong to the college hostel.

reviews.review_heading: Good campus life with decent placements and supportive faculty.
reviews.review_text: Our course department has good classrooms, Wi-Fi, computer labs with needed software, and a big library with books and digital access. Hostels are clean, food is average but okay. Canteen is decent. Medical help is available. Sports grounds and indoor games are also there.

reviews.review_heading: Good campus life with decent placements and supportive faculty.
reviews.review_text: Our course department has good classrooms, Wi-Fi, computer labs with needed software, and a big library with books and digital access. Hostels are clean, food is average but okay. Canteen is decent. Medical help is available. Sports grounds and indoor games are also there.

reviews.review_heading: I am highly satisfied with the faculty and infrastructure. It provided good placements in 2025.
reviews.review_text: For our department, one special lab is there with i7 processors, and TPU serves with 1 storage. The canteen is good, but there are not that many items. It has only a few items, and the taste is good enough to eat. Sports and medical facilities are available. A doctor is available from 9 AM to 5 PM continuously. A gym is also there for boys.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied, but some pressure due to the many courses offered by the college staff.
reviews.review_text: MITS has a well-established campus with multiple academic blocks. Along with modern labs and workshops, a two-floor library, Wi-Fi, separate hostels, sports grounds, an auditorium, and medical/transport facilities.

reviews.review_heading: Best Engineering College.
reviews.review_text: Good Wi-Fi, classroom,3 labs, both digital and normal libraries, friendly faculty, greenery garden, hygienic washrooms, and separate departments. Good quality of food available in the mess, medical facilities are good, a big playgrounds for sports and games.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good institute to gain knowledge.
reviews.review_text: The college provides Wi-Fi facility for students, which is important while conducting placement drives. There are modern labs with advanced equipment. The library and classrooms are digital and very useful to students and faculty members. The mess food is hygienic. An emergency medical award with a doctor is available. Sports club is there for students to encourage them in sports.

reviews.review_heading: A good college for education and placements.
reviews.review_text: The college has Wi-Fi facility for students, which is important while conducting placement drives, and modern labs with advanced equipment to bring us to an industrial level. The library and classrooms are digital and very useful to students and faculty. The mess food is rich in taste, and it is hygienic. An emergency medical ward with a doctor is available, and a sports club is there for students to participate in sports.

reviews.review_heading: A good college with good faculty and placements.
reviews.review_text: The college has Wi-Fi facility for students, which is important while conducting placement drives, and modern labs with advanced equipment to bring us to an industrial level. The library and classrooms are digital and very useful to students and faculty. The mess food is rich in taste, and it is hygienic. An emergency medical ward with a doctor is available, and a sports club is there for students to participate in sports.

reviews.review_heading: The college has a good environment with good placements and knowledge for students.
reviews.review_text: We have several facilities like 24x7 Wi-Fi, RO water, modern labs with advanced equipment, digital libraries, and classrooms. The hostel management provides hygienic food. The canteen provides different food items that are good in taste. There is a medical emergency ward for any emergency situations in the college. Our college encourages students in sports and makes them more talented by giving training with the PET teacher.

reviews.review_heading: I chose it because my faculty is good.
reviews.review_text: The facilities are very good, and the infrastructure of our college is nice. Our college provides different facilities like Wi-Fi, classrooms, library, and canteen. The food in the canteen is nice, with our reasonable prices, and the quantity of food is also very good. There is a stationery store in our college.

reviews.review_heading: Nice infrastructure and college.
reviews.review_text: The campus has good Wi-Fi, clean classrooms, well-equipped labs, and a resourceful library. Hostel facilities are average, food in the mess is okay while the canteen is better. Basic medical help is available and sports grounds and equipment are decent.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 702 published reviews , 634 reviews are verified.

highlights.summary:
The OJEE 2026 registration process has begun for TAT - Trident Academy of Technology admission to BTech, BPharma, MBA, and MCA programmes. The final date to register is Mar 22, 2026. Additionally, the exam dates are tentatively scheduled for May 4 and May 5, 2026, and from May 7 to May 9, 2026.

A few more updates are given below:

student_insights.feedback: Students can work with faculty on research projects
Offered in the final year only
Many students looking for better jobs
Higher in core jobs
Majority opted in India
Organized & proactive placement process
Strong alumni network that help with placement opportunities
Very Active and resourceful, college is also involved
Loved in first year but not in later years

fees_and_eligibility.overview: TAT - Trident Academy of Technology offers diverse programmes at UG and PG levels in Full Time mode. The offered programmes can be chosen from streams such as Engineering, Business & Management Studies and IT & Software. At the UG level, candidates have the provision to opt from courses such as B.E. / B.Tech. Whereas, at PG level, TAT - Trident Academy of Technology offers courses such as M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and MCA. TAT - Trident Academy of Technology fee structure for all the courses is around INR 1,44,000 to 3,56,000.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2023
reviews_list.review_title: Review of TAT - Trident Academy of Technology.

review_content.Placements: In the college, placements are good as they have mentioned the placement target is 83.1% I think that is also true. The highest package offered is 24 LPA and the lowest package that students got is 2.8 LPA. The average package is 4.2 LPA. Top recruiting companies for our course are Deloitte, Tech Mahindra, Cognizant, Capgemini, Kovair, etc. Students get internships at college if they want. Roles offered by the course are junior software engineer, code reviewer, data analyst, and cloud computing master.
review_content.Infrastructure: All facilities are provided by the college like Wi-Fi, labs, AC classrooms, and a library. The hostel is very good and the environment is very good at the hostel. Students enjoy their freedom but one thing is in the hostel, the food quality is not so good.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Computer Science (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning) - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: About my college, it is very good.

review_content.Placements: I am from the B.Tech Computer Science batch of 2024. Around forty percent of students were placed. The highest package was seven lacs per annum, the lowest was around two point five lacs, and the average was three point five lacs. Top recruiters included TCS, Wipro, and Infosys. Around thirty percent of students got internships in companies like Internshala, startups, and small IT firms. Most roles offered were software developer, support engineer, and testing.
review_content.Infrastructure: Hostel facilities are average with basic amenities. Rooms are often crowded, and maintenance is slow. The faculty at our college is knowledgeable and supportive, always ready to help students understand concepts better. The curriculum is well-structured and regularly updated. Exams are conducted fairly, with a focus on both understanding and application.

individual_reviews.course: M.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2024
individual_reviews.title: Our college hospitality is very good and healthy.

content.Placements: Our college gives good placements to students, with a minimum of 80% and a maximum of 90% of students placed in different companies like Aditya Birla, Mahindra, Tata Group, Infosys, etc., at good packages of 9 to 15 LPA. Our college provides internships to all semester students every year.
content.Infrastructure: Our hostel rooms are very good, and the quality of the food is also very nice. Our classrooms are well-designed and well-furnished, and A/C is included in our classrooms. Our college provides 24/7 high-speed Wi-Fi to all students. Our college has a well-stocked library for students, and various labs are available for students.

placement_report.college_name: TAT - Trident Academy of Technology Placement - Average Package & Highest Salary

placement_data.title: TAT - Trident Academy of Technology Placement overview
paragraphs: Q. How promising are the placements of BTech at Trident Academy of Technology?
A. BTech placements at Trident Academy of Technology are good. 60-70 companies visit the campus every year out of which maximum companies offer a higher-end package.
Q. Which are the top companies that visit the Trident Academy of Technology for campus placement every year?

A. Hirecraft Software Pvt Ltd, Tata Consultancy Services, Trianz Holdings, HCL, Capgemini, Tudip Technologies, SPML Infra, and Global tech promoters are the top companies that visit the campus every year.
Q. What is the 2019 placement statistics of Trident Academy of Technology?

A. About 15% of the students were placed in top-notch companies. The highest salary package of 12 LPA and the lowest salary package of 2 LPA and the average salary package of 4 LPA were offered. TCS was the top recruiter and system analyst was the top role offered.
Q. Does Trident Academy of Technology offer internships to its students?

A. About 80% of the students get on-campus internships in various companies. The most number of internships are offered by Indian Rail. Other internship offering companies are Google, DRDO and Amazon.

faqs.answer: TAT - Trident Academy of Technology offers in-campus placement salaries in the range of INR 5.1 LPA to MCA students.

Recently, the institute ranked #154 in The Week 2025 under the Engg category, and #127 under Engg (Private). The reasons for its high ranks among numerous ranking agencies include its academic reputation, top-notch faculty, and well-laid infrastructure. The following article covers all the information around TAT - Trident Academy of Technology rankings:

rankings.highlight: Best Among The Week Ranked Colleges In Orissa In 2025

hostel_campus.college_name: TAT - Trident Academy of Technology Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Our college hospitality is very good and healthy.
reviews.review_text: Our hostel rooms are very good, and the quality of the food is also very nice. Our classrooms are well-designed and well-furnished, and A/C is included in our classrooms. Our college provides 24/7 high-speed Wi-Fi to all students. Our college has a well-stocked library for students, and various labs are available for students.

reviews.review_heading: Review of TAT - Trident Academy of Technology.
reviews.review_text: To be exact honest infrastructure was top class. Buildings were very good. Every classroom had smart boards and projectors. There were library, computer laboratories, auditorium halls, conference halls, etc. Park and cafeteria were also there. Hostels were also in good condition.

reviews.review_heading: Review of TAT - Trident Academy of Technology.
reviews.review_text: All facilities are provided by the college like Wi-Fi, labs, AC classrooms, and a library. The hostel is very good and the environment is very good at the hostel. Students enjoy their freedom but one thing is in the hostel, the food quality is not so good.

reviews.review_heading: About my college, it is very good.
reviews.review_text: Hostel facilities are average with basic amenities. Rooms are often crowded, and maintenance is slow. The faculty at our college is knowledgeable and supportive, always ready to help students understand concepts better. The curriculum is well-structured and regularly updated. Exams are conducted fairly, with a focus on both understanding and application.

reviews.review_heading: Trident Academy of Technology in Bhubaneswar for M.Tech course admission.
reviews.review_text: This college has the best facilities and uses high-quality products like classrooms, labs, drinking water machines, a library, bathrooms, etc. These facilities are provided. Every year, the college organizes sports and games like kabaddi, cricket, carrom, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements and worthy for price.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides smart classrooms, a big smart auditorium, 3 libraries, and 5G Wi-Fi network access to everyone. Hostel facilities are not bad. We have tasty food at affordable prices in canteen. Students can practice outdoor games on the college ground.

reviews.review_heading: It has value for money. If you budget under 80,000 then you can go for it.
reviews.review_text: It's good though with the fee but rooms are not air-conditioned rather the facilities are okay. Free Wi-Fi for all students and outdoor games facility are also great. The quality of food is average though it's eatable. The library is universal with almost every book needed for the course.

reviews.review_heading: Review of TAT - Trident Academy of Technology.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms are the best. In the library, we will get whatever book we want to read. The hostel is good, and the best thing is the mess food. Sports and games facilities are good. There is a gym in our college. There is a table tennis court and also a yoga room.

reviews.review_heading: This place gives a really good education and a good environment.
reviews.review_text: The hostel facilities are adequate, offering basic amenities. However, room occupancy is frequently high, maintenance response times are slow, and the quality of food requires enhancement. Cleanliness and hygiene standards are consistent. Consequently, extended stays are not recommended.

reviews.review_heading: Life in Trident Academy of Technology.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure of Trident Academy of Technology is not much good and big. Wi-Fi is available on college campus. All labs are AC-fitted, classrooms have no AC, and library also has no AC. I don't live in hostel, but some of my hostel friends are told that the fee of hostel is costly. On campus, there is a cricket field and a badminton court. Medical facilities are not good.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Trident Academy of Technology College.
reviews.review_text: Facilities in this college are limited. You will not find a good Wi-Fi connection. The Wi-Fi is only available for those who live in the hostel, and it has very low bandwidth. Labs are good and have proper seating arrangements. However, you cannot sit comfortably for too long in the lab, as it only has plastic chairs.

reviews.review_heading: At last, Trident Academy of Technology is good for engineering studies.
reviews.review_text:
The infrastructure of the college is very good. The college also provides a fully Wi-Fi campus, library, workshop, lab, etc. There are 2 boys' hostels and 1 girls' hostel in this college, including a mess and canteen. There are 4-seater rooms with separate balconies, and we can choose the option of AC and non-AC rooms.

.

reviews.review_heading: Reality of Trident academy of technology.
reviews.review_text: The course is okay, not that good, as this college is under BPUT, so as per the BPUT syllabus, there isn't any programming language in the 1st sem. But faculty members are very good and student-friendly. Coming to the hostel, it is very unhygienic. Mess food is okay. Labs are good. Classrooms are good with proper ventilation and lighting. The library is very large with 30,000+ books. Also, there is an e-library in this college. Wi-Fi is available all over the campus.

reviews.review_heading: Trident academy of technology (M.Tech, etc.).
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure-wise, our college is one of the best in Bhubaneswar. Coming to lab facilities, we have an advanced lab with PARAM. In the ECE department, we have design tools like Vivado and Synopsys. The campus area has a garden and separate areas for sports like basketball, football, volleyball, and cricket.

reviews.review_heading: Best infrastructure and facilities with affordable fee.
reviews.review_text: The campus and overall infrastructures are pretty good. The classrooms can easily fit up to 65 students comfortably, but there are very few classes with ACs and Smart boards. They have Wi-Fi facilities but it have very low range. Other than this, all other facilities are good and easily available like cafeterias, washrooms, drinking water, laboratories, etc.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 196 published reviews , 160 reviews are verified.

fees_and_eligibility.overview: IBS Pune offers an MBA programme to students across various specialisations. The PG Programme in Management equips students with skills, knowledge, and strategic perspectives essential to the leadership of businesses around the world. The programme includes 29 courses (of which 21 are compulsory courses and 8 are elective courses), and a Summer Internship Program. These courses are spread over four semesters. The students can pursue elective courses in Marketing, Finance, Human Resource Management, Operations, and Information Technology and Systems leading to the respective specialisation. The selection process involves and rounds. Candidates can check the along with the eligibility criteria and the total course fee in the following table:

faqs.answer: A:    IBS Pune accepts multiple entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, IBSAT, and NMAT for admission to its PG-level courses. Hence, it can be considered that IBS Pune admission is entrance-based for most of its courses. Eligibility is completely based on merit in the last qualifying exam. Students are required to go through the national-level entrances and then appear for the university-level selection rounds for final admission. faqs.question: Q: Can I get direct admission to IBS Pune for PGPM?

faqs.answer: A reputable business school in India, ICFAI Business School Pune offers PGPM and MBA programmes across 8 campuses. It belongs to the ICFAI Group. The school accepts applications via IBSAT, CAT, NMAT, and GMAT.The institution develops students into world-minded thought leaders.They offer a setting that encourages experience sharing, problem-solving, decision-making, cooperation, and entrepreneurship to help students develop the knowledge and abilities they need to succeed in the global business world.
faqs.question: Q: What is unique about ICFAI Business School Pune?

faqs.answer: IBSAT, CAT, NMAT, and GMAT are the admission tests used by ICFAI Business School Pune. Admission is based only on merit (previous academic record, performance in Group Discussion, and Personal Interview). Read the eligibility requirements in the IBS Pune booklet by visiting the official website, ibsindia.org, before submitting the online application for the IBS Pune admission process.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2021
individual_reviews.title: ICFAI Business School, Pune.

content.Placements: The placements are very good. Nearly all the students are placed. Established companies come to recruit students, and the college also provides internships. It is a mandatory process; the college makes sure that every person trains under a certain company. Mostly marketing jobs are given on campus, followed by finance. There are a few placements for HR, and some students are placed in IT companies. The minimum package is 4 LPA, the average is 5 LPA, and the highest is 12 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: IBS conducts lots of extracurricular activities on campus, ranging from sports to different managerial events. Sporting events like football, basketball, and volleyball are scheduled during the cultural fest named Zeal. Our library is in good condition; all journals, newspapers, and books are available. The college does not have proper parking facilities. No, the college does not have a hostel, but they help students to get PG accommodations. There is a single canteen where the food is good.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: Grow, enjoy and make memories.

content.Placements: All students were placed in the 2023 batch. The average package is 6 LPA. Bajaj Housing Finance, HDFC Bank, IndusInd Bank, and many other bank and finance companies come to hire us. We find internships from our college; they do not help us. The top roles offered are Manager and Assistant Manager.
content.Infrastructure: One main issue of the college is infrastructure, free internet is available in college, and the library has all the books, so there's no need to bring any extra books. Our college does not have a hostel, but they provide many PGs, separate for girls and boys; they have many brokers. So, no need to worry about it. Mess food is good in quality. In the college fest named "Zeal," all sports competitions are organized.

individual_reviews.title: It is the best place to get placements.

admission_process.title: IBS Pune Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: IBS Pune admissionsare primarily entrance-based. Candidates can register online for admission to their preferred course. The admission process at IBS Pune is as per the steps below:
1- Fill IBS Pune Application Form

To apply for IBS Pune admission, candidates are required to apply online or offline for IBSAT exam. Otherwise, they can also submit their scores for other entrance exams at the time of filling out the application form. Candidates must also pay an application fee of INR 1,800 via Credit/ Debit Card or Net-banking.
2- Selection Rounds

Admission to Management courses at IBS Pune is entirely entrance-based, either on theICFAI Business School Aptitude Test (IBSAT)or the scores achieved in GMAT/CAT/ XAT/ NMAT.  Past academic record is also considered for admission. After clearing the entrance exam, students would have to sit through Micro Presentation and Personal Interview rounds. Upon succesful completion, candidates will then receive admission confirmation and campus allocation.
3- Final Admission
Once the final results are out, the institute will release the admission letter to the selected candidates. Further, candidates are required to pay theIBS Pune feeto lock their seats.

courses_data.name: IBS Pune PGPM Admission 2025
courses_data.description: IBS Pune offers entrance-based admission to PGPM. The college offers a year full-time PGPM course in a full-time mode. To be eligible for admission, candidates must have completed their graduation and passed the IBSAT aptitude test conducted by IBS Pune. However, candidates who have scored well inGMAT/XAT/CAT/NMATare exempted from taking the IBSAT exam and will be offered admission based on their rank/score in the respective national-level entrance exams. Read below to know more aboutIBS Pune admission 2025:

faqs.question: What is the eligibility for PGPM at IBS Pune?
faqs.answer: IBS Pune accepts multiple entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, IBSAT, and NMAT for admission to its PG-level courses. Hence, it can be considered that IBS Pune admission is entrance-based for most of its courses. Eligibility is completely based on merit in the last qualifying exam. Students are required to go through the national-level entrances and then appear for the university-level selection rounds for final admission. The eligibility and selection criteria is given below:CourseEligibilitySelect

faqs.question: Can I get direct admission to IBS Pune for PGPM?
faqs.answer: IBS Pune offers entrance-based admission. To be eligible for admission, candidates are required to fulfil the eligibility criteria i.e. have a graduation degree with 50% aggreagte and appear for the entrance exam accepted by the college for admission.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at IBS Pune? What is the Eligibility criteria?
faqs.answer: IBS Pune accepts multiple entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, IBSAT, and NMAT for admission to its PG-level courses. Hence, it can be considered that IBS Pune admission is entrance-based for most of its courses. Students are required to go through the national-level entrances and then appear for the university-level selection rounds for final admission. IBS Pune offers MBA/PGDM for the duration of two years, the eligibility for the same is graduation with 50% aggregate from a recognised board, with the medium of instruction as English.CourseEligibilitySelectionMBA/PGDMGraduation with 50%XAT,CAT,NMAT,IBSAT

placement_report.college_name: IBS Pune Placements 2025: Highest Package, Average Package, Top Recruiters

placement_data.title: IBS Pune Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: The highest domestic package offered during IBS Pune PGPM placement 2025 was INR 16.42 LPA . PGPM average package in 2025 stood at INR 7.95 LPA . 99% PGPM students were placed in 2025 as well. The top 10% and 25% of the batch received average package of INR 11.31 LPA and INR 10.17 LPA, respectively.
Financial Services emerged as the top recruiting sector with placement distribution of 24%. Companies such as ICICI Bank, Deloitte and HCL Technologies have visited the campus in recent past.

Placement percentage over the past three years have remained consistent. This year as well, the placement rate was 99%. In addition, increase of nearly 37% was witnessed in the PGPM highest package as compared with 2024. PGPM average package increased by nearly 5% as compared with 2024.

description: The IBSAT 2025 result has been declared for admission to the MBA/PGPM course. The selection process (Micro Presentation and Personal Interview) for the same will be held between Feb 14, 2026 and Feb 22, 2026.

ICFAI Business School (IBS), Pune MBA cutoff 2024 has been released for admission to its MBA/PGDM course. The Institute does not release the final CAT cutoff publicly and is only accessible through account login to those candidates who appear in the CAT exam. Hence, the available cutoff table below is based on previous years’ trends and the actual cutoffs might vary.
Candidates applying for admission to the MBA/PGDM course at ICFAI Business School (IBS), Pune may refer to the table below to view or download the consolidated CAT cutoff lists.

reviews.review_heading: ICFAI Business School, Pune.
reviews.review_text: IBS conducts lots of extracurricular activities on campus, ranging from sports to different managerial events. Sporting events like football, basketball, and volleyball are scheduled during the cultural fest named Zeal. Our library is in good condition; all journals, newspapers, and books are available. The college does not have proper parking facilities. No, the college does not have a hostel, but they help students to get PG accommodations. There is a single canteen where the food is good.

reviews.review_heading: Grow, enjoy and make memories.
reviews.review_text: One main issue of the college is infrastructure, free internet is available in college, and the library has all the books, so there's no need to bring any extra books. Our college does not have a hostel, but they provide many PGs, separate for girls and boys; they have many brokers. So, no need to worry about it. Mess food is good in quality. In the college fest named "Zeal," all sports competitions are organized.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with the faculty members and curriculum.
reviews.review_text: Facilities are good. The infrastructure of our college is also good. The quality of the canteen food can be improved. The Wi-Fi rarely works on campus and is very slow. Medical facilities, sports, games, and other facilities are satisfactory.

reviews.review_heading: Overall, our college is good, and placements are good.
reviews.review_text: The computer lab is big. The library is small. Classrooms are very good with digital boards, air-conditioners, comfortable chairs, desks, etc. The canteen food is average, and the college is trying to improve it.

reviews.review_heading: It is the best place to get placements.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms are fully air-conditioned with smart boards. The entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled. The library is big enough. There isn't a hostel on campus. We have to opt for PGs.

reviews.review_heading: IBS Pune is a good choice if you are opting to go for PGPM course.
reviews.review_text: We have many facilities on campus. There are classrooms with air-conditioners, a library consisting of many books and novels of famous authors, an auditorium for different meetings and activities or functions, an IT lab, sports arena, gym, canteen, and parking area.

reviews.review_heading: It is a great college to study that has good prospects for the future.
reviews.review_text: The curriculum is well-structured. It is as per industry. All subjects are related to the industry. There is no hostel in our college. There are some private hostels near our campus. Our college has modern, well-equipped classrooms with audio-visual aids and technology support for effective learning.

reviews.review_heading: Our college provides good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: Our college has a good environment. Free Wi-Fi is available on campus. Classrooms are air-conditioned. We have a good canteen on campus. A free gym facility is available to students. There is no hostel on campus. Our college helps us to find the hostel.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has strong faculty members and excellent infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides very good facilities. We have good classrooms. Our canteen good is good. Our college provides beautiful accommodation at a reasonable rate. It is well-maintained and Wi-Fi enabled. The hostel surroundings are good.

reviews.review_heading: Our college is good for students seeking high return on investment and placements.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides all the facilities for students. Wi-Fi is available 24X7 in our college. Labs and classrooms are clean. The library timings are very beneficial for students. There is no hostel in our college. Our college offers great food at reasonable rates. Our college offers a range of amenities for students, including access to a doctor on call and a sports room for enthusiasts.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with our faculty members, placements, and facilities.
reviews.review_text: The campus is Wi-Fi enabled and air-conditioned. All the classrooms are very good and huge. The quality of the food in the mess and canteen is very good at affordable rates. Our college provides medical facilities, sports, games, etc. Our college is well-managed and very good.

reviews.review_heading: Our college has good academic curriculum.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides decent infrastructure. We have furnished classrooms with air conditioners and smart boards. Our college has well-stocked libraries. It has business books and newspapers. It has an IT lab, auditorium, gym, sports room, unlimited high-speed Wi-Fi, canteen, and parking. The campus does not provide hostel facilities. It helps students to find hostels. Our college is affiliated with some of the best hostels and PGs in Pune, so students can arrange their residence before registrat...

reviews.review_heading: Our college has good and supportive faculty members.
reviews.review_text: All classrooms are well-facilitated with good technology. Wi-Fi is available on campus. The library is up-to-date with the latest books. The food served in the mess is good.

reviews.review_heading: I would recommend joining this college.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides facilities like Wi-Fi, air-conditioners, a canteen, gym, sports room, library, etc. Our classrooms are equipped with digital boards that enhance the learning experience easily and engagingly. Hostels are separate for both boys and girls. They provide very good facilities.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with this college and its faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is very good. Our college has computer labs, Wi-Fi, huge classrooms, good food, well-furnished classrooms, etc. Each classroom can accommodate 60 students. There is no hostel facility in our college. Classrooms are well-equipped with smart boards.

college_info.college_name: IBS Pune Scholarship Details

paragraphs: IBS Pune offers several scholarships to students as financial assistance. ICFAI Business School (IBS) offers IBSAT-2023 scholarships, for top performers in the IBSAT test, which is scheduled to be held in the third week of December 2023. These scholarships are open to candidates applying for the MBA/ PGPM programme. These scholarships aim to offer financial assistance to deserving candidates. review_content.Placements: I am from the batch 2022-25. Internship opportunities are not very satisfactory. Only one of the big 4 companies has done mass hiring from this college till now for our batch. The only good thing about this college is that the tuition fee is really low.
review_content.Infrastructure: There is no proper college canteen. There is only a Nescafe with overpriced food. The sandwich stall and mio more next to the college are good. The campus is not huge, but still, catch ball or cricket can be played.

individual_reviews.title: My college is so good. Facilities, teacher, infrastructure, students, atmosphere, and all are okay.

content.Placements: In our batch 2019-22, which was the Covid period, so not much companies came. I remember in our last semester, one or two companies came for placement which were EY and Deloitte. content.Infrastructure: Facilities were good. Infrastructure was so good. In our college, there was Wi-Fi which was not for students obviously there was some reason behind it. Labs were interesting and good. Classrooms were the most comfortable place along with library, playing room, etc.
