reviews.review_heading: My college is so good. Facilities, teacher, infrastructure, students, atmosphere, and all are okay.
reviews.review_text: Facilities were good. Infrastructure was so good. In our college, there was Wi-Fi which was not for students obviously there was some reason behind it. Labs were interesting and good. Classrooms were the most comfortable place along with library, playing room, etc.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely grateful for having a chance to be a part of Goenka College.
reviews.review_text: There are no hostel facilities right now. But the college infrastructure is so good and clean. All the classes are well-maintained and cleaned. There is a common room where many indoor games are available for every student. There is no canteen facility available.

reviews.review_heading: The college is very pocket-friendly.
reviews.review_text: There is no proper college canteen. There is only a Nescafe with overpriced food. The sandwich stall and mio more next to the college are good. This college does not have a hostel or Wi-Fi facilities. The nearby local street food stalls are enough to get through college life.

reviews.review_heading: It is worth the time, and value for money.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure of our college (GCCBA) are quite good for the total fee we pay (which is really low). There is Wi-Fi in our college, and computers are also quite good. The library is really big, though a library card is required. Most of the classrooms are really big, clean and available with both white and blackboard. Benches are big enough. There is a carrom and table tennis in the common room. The campus is not huge, but still, catch ball or cricket can be played.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure, good teachers, and helpful teachers.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure for our course was good enough. There were Wi-Fi, labs, and AC rooms. Library facilities were also good. You could collect books whenever needed. There was no mess or canteen or hostel. But outside, there were food and beverage shops. Classrooms were well oriented.

reviews.review_heading: Strong academics with affordable fees.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is average. The classrooms and library are good, but the building is old and there is no proper hostel or Wi-Fi. Also, the canteen facility is limited. Overall, the college is a good value for money. If your focus is strong academics and a reputed commerce degree at a very reasonable cost, Goenka College is a great choice. But if you are expecting high placement support or modern infrastructure, you might feel a bit disappointed.

reviews.review_heading: Insights of GCCBA - the second-best college in Kolkata.
reviews.review_text: There are no hostel facilities, but you can take PGs nearby at a reasonable rent. The classrooms are equipped with projectors, though they are rarely used. Recently, a Nescafé canteen opened on the campus. There are more options outside, and the famous sandwich wall is a favorite spot for students

reviews.review_heading: Goenka college of commerce is affordable and excellent.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi-enabled classrooms were not present. Smart classrooms were available, but only a few. The lab was not spacious and couldn't accommodate many students at a time. The library was vast, and a newly opened canteen, along with many food stalls nearby, was available. A good collection of books was present in the library. Indoor sports like carrom and table tennis were available.

reviews.review_heading: College made me prepared to face the competitive world.
reviews.review_text: Our college is situated in a very peaceful environment. We get free Wi-Fi on our campus. We have separate libraries and computer labs. And have 6 sections of each batch. 2 sections for the morning batch. And 4 sections for the day batch. Our college doesn't have any personal hostels. But the university has.

reviews.review_heading: Best college with bad infrastructure.
reviews.review_text:
The infrastructure of Goenka College is very small; it is only a five-story building with very little capacity There are two common rooms where students can chill out and play carrom and table tennis, lift is available in the college for both teachers and students. Wi-Fi is not provided, some classes have good-quality benches; every class has a white board and a greenboard along with a projector, there is no proper canteen; but Nescafe cafe outlet is there within the campus.
Goenka has no hostel...

reviews.review_heading: Value for money and time efficient.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is pretty good for a West Bengal government college. It is the best government college. There is a canteen and common rooms with a games arena. A lift facility is also provided. Digital classrooms, computer labs, and a well-equipped library are available.

reviews.review_heading: I am absolutely satisfied with the tag of being a Goenkan.
reviews.review_text: Our college is the only commerce government specialised college in the whole of Kolkata. It has a large students room along with two rooms having table tennis and carrom boards to play. The library has almost 5000 books for all the disciplines. The classrooms are very big, spacious and airy having blackboards and projectors. They are not air conditioned.

reviews.review_heading: The college is vast for students who want to pursue B.Com.
reviews.review_text: In this college hostel facility is not available. But the canteen is best; it provides various foods and fast food. It also provides free Wi-Fi. Medical facilities are also provided. Gym is also there. The is a common room for boys and girls and also games room.

reviews.review_heading: Goenka college is a reputed college in Kolkata for commerce students.
reviews.review_text: Goenka College is a government institution. But they didn't provide hostel facilities. The college has a lot of classrooms for B.Com. all semesters. Every semester, students are divided into four classes. No Wi-Fi is available but classrooms are well furnished with CCTV cameras and projectors. The library has a lot of books .

reviews.review_heading: Good facilities with nice faculty members and infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is good. There are smart classrooms. Cleanliness and hygiene are also maintained. The library is big and has the latest textbooks. The college also has a separate reading room where students can go and study in a quiet environment.

college_info.intro:

reviews_list.batch_info: MBA in Finance - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Good placement, with Wi-Fi and projectors set up for classrooms.

review_content.Placements: Around 90% of my batch got placed and we're offered jobs even though the covid 19 affected many jobs. The highest package is 10.8 lpa from Spandana Spoorthy. The lowest is 5 lpa from Tech Mahindra. Average is 7.2 lpa from Berkedia for finance. 100% internships offered across all major companies like HDFC. Analyst role by Berkedia is offered.
review_content.Infrastructure: We have a theater look like classroom with Wi-Fi and projectors set up for having video lectures or doing any activity. Library is a 2 floor big vast with many major journals, course books, magazines, newspaper, caselets, case studies, research papers, project work books. We have computer lab with SAS, Studio, SPSS etc. Software and also to one corner in the lab we have bloomberg terminal for finance specialisation students. Hostel were really good, we miss our rooms in fact, 2 sharing rooms with attached bathroom, with daily housekeeping staff. Mess food was best as we had all kind of cuisines included in it as the mess was student driven, we had a separate student mess committee who sit and decide every weeks menu and make it as per the average students choice of interest. There were regular feedback and suggestions taken from students for any improvements. We had canteen + night canteen where students could order their choice of interest. SIU has a separate medical facility hospital at every branch, so we had a dedicated medical officer and nurse who were available 24*7 within the campus. We had 2 ambulance in case of any emergency for reaching the nearest medical hospital. We have a good sporting space, separate football ground, cricket ground, volleyball, basketball, mini football court, kho space within the campus, we used to have regular inter college sports event. We have indoor carrom board, chess, table tennis, badminton courts.

reviews_list.batch_info: MBA in Finance - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: Amazing experience. Loved the infrastructure and the facilities provided.

review_content.Placements: Companies like Invesco, Deloitte, HCL participate in the placement and offer core roles which avail the benefit of practically applying the theoretical knowledge gained. The placement is good enough given the fact that the college is just 5 years old. Big brands collaborate for the placement process.
review_content.Infrastructure: Outstanding facilities. Cultural activities are absolutely amazing. It's an experience of a kind. The music and dance room is very stunning and provides a healthy atmosphere for the artists to let their creative juices flow. Overall, the library, labs, the classroom is student-friendly.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Finance - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: My honest review of my college.

content.Placements: Placements for students in our college are very good, and it is a good part of our college. The average package is 6 LPA, and the highest package offered is 12 LPA by MNCs. Ours is the first batch at the Hyderabad campus, so we hear from our professors that mostly IT companies prefer students for internships.
content.Infrastructure: We have a nice and big hostel, separate for both boys and girls. Rooms are shared on a basis. Three sharing rooms are available. The mess food is good mostly, but on some days, it is bad. However, we have the option of ordering food as per our wish after paying.

individual_reviews.course: MBA in Finance - Batch of 2023

Almost all the qualified students have been placed in organisations for excellent positions with excellent salary packages according to their calibre.

The quality of food served here is decent enough, and the hygiene is very well maintained. There is a hospital also on the campus and general stores, stationery shops, a bakery and a salon.

admission_overview.college_name: SIBM Hyderabad Admission 2026: Eligibility, Process, Fees, Dates

admission_overview.title: SIBM Hyderabad Admission Overview 2026
admission_overview.description: SIBM Hyderabad admission 2026 is based on entrance exam scores of the candidates. Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, also known as SIBM Hyderabad, is a constituent of Symbiosis International Deemed to be University (SIU). The institute offers admission to its flagship MBA programme based on SNAP scores. SNP is conducted online by SIU and holds 50% weightage in the selection process. The institute has more than 50 permanent and visiting faculty members. SIBM Hyderabad offers an MBA programme in Human Resource Management, Finance, General Management, Business, etc.

eligibility_selection.title: SIBM Hyderabad Eligibility & Selection 2026
eligibility_selection.description: The institute offers a two-year full-time MBA programme. The institute shortlists candidates for the MBA programme based on their SNAP score, followed by the GEPI round. Check below the eligibility and selection details for SIBM Hyderabad courses:

courses_table.eligibility: A minimum of 50% aggregate in graduation

faqs.answer: SIBM Hyderabad does not reveal a certain SNAP rank cut off. But a percentile of more than 75 enhances your chances of getting selected. Final admission involves GE-PI scores. SIBM Hyderabad follows a merit list based on all elements.
faqs.question: What rank is required to get admission in SIBM Hyderabad?

faqs.answer: Candidates need to pass graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate to apply for MBA at SIBM Hyderabad. Hence, aspirants cannot join MBA after completing Class 12. Aspirants also need to appear for SNAP followed by GEPI round for admission.
faqs.question: Can I join SIBM Hyderabad after Class 12?

faqs.answer: Candidates who have passed their graduation with a minimum of 50% aggregate can apply for MBA at SIBM Hyderabad. Aspirants also need to pass the SNAP exam for MBA course. Candidates must have documents to prove their eligibility.

admission_process.title: SIBM Hyderabad Admission Process 2026

paragraphs: SIBM Hyderabad admission processis conducted online. The college accepts scores in SNAP for admission to MBA. Check below the steps to get a seat at SIBM Hyderabad:
1: SIBM Hyderabad Application process 2026
Candidates can apply online through the official website. Aspirants have to pay INR 1,000 for MBA and INR 2,250 for SNAP.
2: Selection Process
Admission to the courses isentrance-based. Candidates must score well in SNAP for admission to MBA programme. Seleced candidates have to further pass the group exercise and personal interview round.
3: Merit List
The institute releases a merit list to announce the names of selected candidates. One must score equal or above theSIBM Hyderabad cutofffor admission.
3: Admission Confirmation

The institute sends call letters to candidates as per the merit list. The remaining candidates are given a waitlist number. Candidates receive an offer letter from the institute. Selected aspirants have to pay theSIBM tuition feeand confirm their seat in the institute.

courses_data.name: SIBM Hyderabad MBA Admission 2026
courses_data.description: SIBM Hyderabad provides a two-year full-time MBA programme with specialisations in HR, Finance, Operations, Marketing, and Business Analytics. The curriculum is industry-focused and is centred around leadership, innovation, and global exposure. Candidates are selected for admission to MBA programme based on their SNAP scores and performance in GEPI round.

faqs.question: How do I get admission in SIBM Hyderabad for MBA?
faqs.answer: For gaining admission to SIBM Hyderabad MBA, you require a minimum 50% in graduation and a valid SNAP score. After passing SNAP, the shortlisted applicants are called for Group Exercise and Personal Interview. Final admission depends on cumulative performance at all levels. Admission is entirely entrance-based.

faqs.question: Can I get admission in SIBM Hyderabad without entrance exam for MBA?
faqs.answer: No, you will not be able to get admission in SIBM Hyderabad for MBA without appearing in the SNAP exam. SNAP is mandatory for admissions to all Symbiosis's MBA courses. GE-PI is also included in the selection process after SNAP result. No other admission mode is available without entrance exam.

faqs.question: Can I get SIBM Hyderabad through SNAP?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNAP is the official and the only accepted entrance test for MBA admission at SIBM Hyderabad. After clearing SNAP with the required percentile, you proceed to the subsequent stages. They are Group Exercise and Personal Interview. Final admission is based on overall performance and merit list.

faqs.question: Is entrance exam required for MBA at SIBM Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: SIBM Hyderabad considers SNAP scores for admission to MBA programme. SNAP is conducted in computer-based mode. The test includes three sections-General English-Reading Comprehension, Verbal Reasoning, Verbal Ability, Analytics & Logical Reasoning and Quantitative, Data Interpretation & Data Sufficiency. Selected candidates have to further pass GEPI round for final admission.

faqs.question: How can I get admission at SIBM Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: SIBM Hyderabad offers admission to candidates based on their SNAP scores. Aspirants also need to pass group exercise and personal interview round for final selection. Shortlisted aspirants have to submit documents for verification. Candidates also need to pay the course fees to confirm their seat.

faqs.question: How many marks are required in SNAP to get admission in SIBM Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: SIBM Hyderabad does not officially declare a fixed SNAP cutoff. A score of more than 75–80 percentile enhances the possibilities of getting shortlisted. Selection at SIBM Hyderabad is final with GE-PI rounds. Performance at every step is taken into account to ensure admission.

faqs.question: Does SIBM Hyderabad accept SNAP?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNAP scores are considered by SIBM Hyderabad for MBA and EMBA programme admissions. SNAP is an obligatory entrance examination held by Symbiosis International University. All candidates must hold valid SNAP scores to be qualified for subsequent rounds. GE and PI are done after SNAP announcements.

faqs.question: Is SNAP scores compulsory for admission to MBA course at SIBM Hyderabad?
faqs.answer: Yes, SNAP scores are compulsory for admission to the MBA course at SIBM Hyderabad. The only accepted entrance exam as of now that SIBM Hyderabad accepts for admission to the MBA course is SNAP. Before appearing for the entrance exam, candidates are required to complete the eligibility criteria. The minimum eligibility criteria required by the institute are that applicants must complete their graduation with a minimum aggregate of 50% (45% for SC/ ST).

placement_data.title: SIBM Hyderabad Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: Symbiosis Institute of Business Management Hyderabad has released the final placement report for batch 2023-25. The highest package offered stood at INR 31 LPA and the SIBM Hyderabad placement average package stood at INR 9.1 LPA. Further, the median package offered during 2025 placements stood at INR 8.20 LPA . A total of 82 recruiters participated in the SIBM Hyderabad placement session 2025, out of which 22 are new recruiters.

The Career Assistance team at SIBM Hyderabad actively engages with companies to bring them to campus for recruitment and other corporate engagements, including guest talks and webinars. The team provides training such as resume building sessions to upgrading interview skills, making sure that the batch is ready for placements. It manages the summer internships and final placement drives as well.

cut_off.college_name: SIBM Hyderabad Cutoff 2024/2023/2022

highlights.description: SIBM Hyderabad has been ranked by various renowned ranking bodies such as Business Today, and many others. The ranking bodies as mentioned earlier verified the SIBM Hyderabad on various parameters such as quality of education, research, placement, etc. As per the said parameters, these ranking bodies awarded the institute with high ranks and scores. Candidates can refer to the details tabulated below for more information regarding the SIBM Hyderabad rankings:

reviews.review_heading: My honest review of my college.
reviews.review_text: We have a nice and big hostel, separate for both boys and girls. Rooms are shared on a basis. Three sharing rooms are available. The mess food is good mostly, but on some days, it is bad. However,  we have the option of ordering food as per our wish after paying.

reviews.review_heading: It is one of the finest emerging MBA institutes of India.
reviews.review_text: There are highly equipped classrooms and hostel facilities for students with Wi-Fi, a library, mess room, pantry, TV rooms, playgrounds for football, volleyball and basketball. The quality of food served here is decent enough, and the hygiene is very well maintained. There is a hospital also on the campus and general stores, stationery shops, a bakery and a salon.

reviews.review_heading: Good placement, with Wi-Fi and projectors set up for classrooms.
reviews.review_text: We have a theater look like classroom with Wi-Fi and projectors set up for having video lectures or doing any activity. Library is a 2 floor big vast with many major journals, course books, magazines, newspaper, caselets, case studies, research papers, project work books. We have computer lab with SAS, Studio, SPSS etc. Software and also to one corner in the lab we have bloomberg terminal for finance specialisation students.  Hostel were really good, we miss our rooms in fact,  2  sharing rooms ...

reviews.review_heading: Amazing experience. Loved the infrastructure and the facilities provided.
reviews.review_text: Outstanding facilities. Cultural activities are absolutely amazing. It's an experience of a kind. The music and dance room is very stunning and provides a healthy atmosphere for the artists to let their creative juices flow. Overall, the library, labs, the classroom is student-friendly.

reviews.review_heading: Overall it was a good experience.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is well kept and equipped with all the necessary facilities required which include a library,  24*7 Wi-Fi connection, auditorium. Recreational facilities, healthcare etc. Also, the housekeeping staff maintains the hygiene standards of the campus.

reviews.review_heading: Great faculty members and amazing infrastructure.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is really good. A lush green 40-acre campus, with the world-class infrastructure, gives you an opportunity to stay and learn in such a serene environment. We also have Bloomberg terminals in our college. Even the healthcare centre and a gymnasium facility are also available.

reviews.review_heading: Want to learn, grow and have fun at the same time then SIBM-H is for you!
reviews.review_text: Comfortable hostels and classrooms. Our Library has access to thousands of books, online journals, courses and research papers, including Bloomberg terminals which has helped us to learn and grow and stand out from the crowd. There are hardly any Wi-Fi connectivity issues and even if there are any, are resolved ASAP.

reviews.review_heading: A great learning institute.
reviews.review_text: The college is equipped with all the facilities and is well structured. All the amenities necessary for the student are present in the college and can be availed by the student anytime. The hostels are very spacious and well maintained. Hygiene is maintained properly.

reviews.review_heading: SIBM Hyderabad is one of the youngest yet the leading B-School in Hyderabad.
reviews.review_text: SIBM Hyderabad provides the best in class infrastructure. Infrastructure includes the Library, healthcare, cafeteria, playground, mess, accommodation, classrooms. Whole campus is enabled with Wi-Fi and the lecture theatres, labs are fully air-conditioned.

reviews.review_heading: It is a decent college. Apart from marketing and finance other specialisations do find difficulty.
reviews.review_text: Overall students are very much satisfied with all available infrastructure including labs, classrooms, and a library. We have ample resources available. This is the best college considering resources. Except for medical facilities, everything is very good and hygiene. The quality of the facilities is good.

reviews.review_heading: The college has good infrastructure and faculty members.
reviews.review_text: The campus is of a typical style and located on the outskirts of the city. It has an auditorium, convention hall, sports courts, academic block, canteen, general stores for students and one or two eating stores also. Medical facilities are also provided, but it is not that good and active.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good college, which will provide quality education and a decent salary package.
reviews.review_text: This college has hostels for both boys and girls, mess and gym facility. For studying purpose, it has computer labs and digital classrooms. It also has lecture theatre and auditorium for guest lectures and functions. Medical facilities are also provided. Food quality is above-average, and medical facilities are available for 24x7 with 1 doctor and 1 nurse always available and two ambulance standby.

reviews.review_heading: It is a good place to pursue an MBA.
reviews.review_text: Our college is spread over 2 acres, but it is quite far away from the Hyderabad city, i.e., 52 kilometres to be precise. The campus has a wellness centre, gym, yoga room, a huge mess, plenty of greenery and pretty huge rooms in the hostel. MBA graduates have to stay with a roommate. Classrooms are quite spacious, and the library is one of the best places to be. But we have to share the campus with SLS ( Symbiosis Law School).

reviews.review_heading: There are many restrictions for MBA students, but faculty and environment make it manageable.
reviews.review_text: The campus is fully Wi-Fi enabled and has all the modern amenities and facilities necessary for students. The library is quite big and is divided into 2 floors and offers an ample number of books both on the courses and fiction for students. The mess food is quite okay.

reviews.review_heading: I am proud to be part of this college.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, Hyderabad is very nice, and people like to be here. It's a green campus with all modern facilities and eco-friendly infrastructure. Students enjoy the food served here, which is very healthy.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 34 published reviews , 32 reviews are verified.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about Symbiosis Institute of Business Management, Symbiosis International, Hyderabad

highlights.summary:
The COMEDK UGET 2026 registration process has started for JSS Science and Technology University admission to the BE/BTech programme. The last date to register is Mar 16, 2026. Also, the COMEDK UGET exam 2026 will be held on May 9, 2026.

A few more updates are given below:

college_info.intro:
JSS Science and Technology University is popular for its Engineering and Science courses such as BTech and MBA. BTech students are placed in top companies. Also, the course is approved by the AICTE and the Government of Karnataka. BTech specialisations include Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Biotechnology, Environmental Engineering, etc.
JSS Science and Technology University Mysore MBA is offered for a duration of two years in full-time mode. MBA students can become Management Consultant, Investment Bankers, or can enter fields such as Marketing, Healthcare, Human Resources, and others. JSS Science and Technology University MBA is taught by well-qualified and experienced faculty members.

Love being in college

reviews_list.review_title: Good to go. Need to concentrate more on placements than the attendance and just the book knowledge.

review_content.Placements: I am a student of batch 2024-2025. In my batch, the placement numbers are decent. Out of 120 students, around 35 students got placed, where the average package is 5-6 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, and others.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is above average. Each class had projectors and all labs had fast internet connection. Coming to the hostel, I'll rate it 3.5. The food is sometimes good and sometimes bad. Gymnasium is good. Importance is given to sports and physical education.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: One of the best colleges in Mysore, if you are willing to do MCA.

review_content.Placements: According to my knowledge, in our MCA batch, around 80-85% of students were placed through campus placements. The highest package offered was around 12.4 LPA, while the lowest was 3.5 LPA, and the average package stayed around 5-6 LPA. Top recruiting companies included TCS, Infosys, Wipro, LTIMindtree, Accenture, Capgemini, Cognizant, and Bosch. Nearly 60% of the students also got internships in companies like TCS, Infosys, startups, and analytics-based organizations, mostly in roles like software development, web development, and testing.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.E. in Computer Science and Business System - Batch of 2029
reviews_list.review_title: JSS Science and Technology Mysuru review and 2026 placement.

review_content.Placements: The placements of this college are decent. The average package you can expect in this college is around 10 to 11 LPA, and the median is around 9 to 9.5 LPA. The overall placement percentage is around 80 percent, including all branches. Around 90 percent of students in CSE-related branches are placed.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this college is good. Since this is an old established college, the infrastructure is outdated compared to other colleges through CET or COMEDK. It is an old-styled college. But the hostel facilities are very good, as the hostels are newly built.

college_info.college_name: JSS Science and Technology University Fees 2026

fees_overview.description: There are several courses for candidates to choose from at JSS Science and Technology University. Courses are offered at different levels, including UG and PG levels. Candidates who have been shortlisted for a JSS Science and Technology University course must pay the course fee, which varies from INR 45,000 - 10,45,908. Candidates are shortlisted based on their performance in the entrance tests or last qualifying exam as required for the JSS Science and Technology University admission process. review_summary.college_name: JSS Science and Technology University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Review of Sri Jayachamarajendra College of Engineering, JSS STU.

content.Placements: Good companies do come for placements, and it is the single best pro of this college. This year, the average package offered is around 11 LPA, with CSE leading in terms of employment and the highest package. The number of companies coming for internships is good. An ample chance is given for students to get internships.
content.Infrastructure: The hostel is dirty and neglected. Cleanliness does not exist for the warden. Our college lab facilities are decent and well-equipped. Notably, the golden jubilee block is the best out of all. Sports facilities are good since the college is huge. An in-house gym is available too, which is free for the college students.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: Great placement, average infrastructure, and a peaceful campus.

content.Placements: The placement rates of our college are pretty great, 80 to 90 percent of students got placed last year. This year the highest package offered is 40LPA. Among IT related Branch CSE, AIML, ISE, CSBS, the average package offered is around 13 to 14 LPA, and the median package is above 12LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure and facilities provided by our college are below average. The main CSE building, Golden Jubilee Bhavan, and the admin block are great, but the rest of the buildings are pretty average. For freshers, they conduct classes in the Polymer Science building, whose classrooms are pretty bad. They really need to improve it.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: Good to go. Need to concentrate more on placements than the attendance and just the book knowledge.

content.Placements: I am a student of batch 2024-2025. In my batch, the placement numbers are decent. Out of 120 students, around 35 students got placed, where the average package is 5-6 LPA and the lowest package is 3 LPA. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, and others.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is above average. Each class had projectors and all labs had fast internet connection. Coming to the hostel, I'll rate it 3.5. The food is sometimes good and sometimes bad. Gymnasium is good. Importance is given to sports and physical education.

individual_reviews.course: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: One of the best colleges in Mysore, if you are willing to do MCA.

content.Placements: According to my knowledge, in our MCA batch, around 80-85% of students were placed through campus placements. The highest package offered was around 12.4 LPA, while the lowest was 3.5 LPA, and the average package stayed around 5-6 LPA. Top recruiting companies included TCS, Infosys, Wipro, LTIMindtree, Accenture, Capgemini, Cognizant, and Bosch. Nearly 60% of the students also got internships in companies like TCS, Infosys, startups, and analytics-based organizations, mostly in roles like software development, web development, and testing.

individual_reviews.course: B.E. in Computer Science and Business System - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: JSS Science and Technology Mysuru review and 2026 placement.

content.Placements: The placements of this college are decent. The average package you can expect in this college is around 10 to 11 LPA, and the median is around 9 to 9.5 LPA. The overall placement percentage is around 80 percent, including all branches. Around 90 percent of students in CSE-related branches are placed.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of this college is good. Since this is an old established college, the infrastructure is outdated compared to other colleges through CET or COMEDK. It is an old-styled college. But the hostel facilities are very good, as the hostels are newly built.

admission_process.title: JSS Science and Technology University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: JSS Science and Technology University Admission 2025 is open for the UG and PG courses, BTech, MTech, MSc, and MBA. Admission to the engineering courses is done through CET, COMED-K, JEE. The Unversity accepts Karnatak PGCET for admission to its PG programmes. The admission process is completely online. JSS Science and Technology University offers more than 50 courses across multiplem specialisations. Find below the highlights of the Uiversity:
Particulars
JSS Science and Technology University Highlights 2025
Mode of study
Programmes Offered
Admission status 2025
Ongoing:UG & PG
How to apply?
Level of programmes offered
Popular programmes
NOTE:The information available in the above table is sourced from various sources on the internet. Hence, is indicative.

SS Science and Technology University Admission 2025 for all of its courses is either done through entrance exams or course specific qualifying. Find below the admission process of SS Science and Technology University:
Step 1: SS Science and Technology University Application process
Candidates are required to visit the University's admission portal to fill the application form. Before that candidates have to register themselves to create a profile.
Step 2: Eligibility Check

Once the application form is submitted, it will be scanned for course specific eligibility. Basically candidate's application form will be checked for proff that he/she have the qualification for admission to their desired course.
Step 3: Provisional allotment
After the eligibility check candidates will be provided with allotment list, where the name of candidates who have secured seat for admission at the University will be listed.
Step 4: Fee payment
Now the candidates have to pay the fees for finalising their admission at the University.
For more information about JSS Science and Technology University check out the below video:

description: JSS Science and Technology University cutoff 2025 is available on this page for admission to several UG & PG courses. Candidates can refer to the exam-wise sections below to view the course, exam, round and category-wise cutoff details. Further exam-related updates are below:

JSS Science and Technology University Karnataka PGCET cutoff 2025 was concluded with the release of the final cutoff list. For admission to the MBA/PGDM course, the last round cutoff rank was 2608 in the General AI category. For the HS quota, the last round cutoff for the same course stood at 3769 in the General category. Comparing both the quotas, it is clear that the cutoff rank was more competitive for admission to the General AI category students as compared to the HS quota.

Karnataka PGCET is the accepting exam for MBA/PGDM admission at JSS Science and Technology University. In 2025, the last round cutoff for MBA/PGDM admission was 2608 in the General category under the AI quota. In 2024, the cutoff rank for the same course was 2393, while in 2023, it was 6254.
For more categories, rounds, and quotas, candidates can use the provided filters to view the cutoffs.
Candidates preparing for 2026 admission can refer to the table below to view some of the important dates related to Karnataka PGCET 2026.

JSS Science and Technology University accepts Karnataka PGCET entrance exam scores for admission to the MBA/PGDM courses. Candidates can refer to the table below to check out the consolidated year-wise Karnataka PGCET cutoff lists.

As per the KCET last-round cutoff 2025 for B.E. / B.Tech admission, B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering has the lowest cutoff rank of 6390 for the General AI quota. The lower cutoff rank indicates strong competition for admission.
For other categories, rounds and quotas, use the filter options below:

According to the JSS Science and Technology University B.E. / B.Tech Cutoff 2025, the closing rank for B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering stood at 15742 among the students belonging to the General AI quota.

For the HS quota, the cutoff rank for the same specialisation was 21598. Comparing both the quotas, the last round cutoff rank for General AI category students was more competitive for admission than the HS quota students.

reviews.review_heading: Well-maintained campus and a smart, ready campus for engineers.
reviews.review_text: Good infrastructure, green and clean smart campus, Wi-Fi available. Good and large library with digitalised and modern computers. A large and silent reference hall for studying. Hostel rooms are large and spacious with 24-hour electricity and water supply, and food in the mess is good.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2026Offered by Sri Jayachamarajendra College of Engineering, JSS STUReviewed on 28 Nov 2025)
reviews.review_heading: An excellent college and a good presentation.
reviews.review_text: Buildings are huge and available for almost 500 students. Hostel facilities are kind of good, but the food facilities are at an average level. They have park grounds and fitness and physical facilities. Our hostel is eco-friendly projecting various plants and wildlife.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2026Offered by Sri Jayachamarajendra College of Engineering, JSS STUReviewed on 28 Nov 2025)
reviews.review_heading: I am really satisfied with my college.
reviews.review_text: I also live in a hostel that is inside the college, and the food provided is okay, kind of average and the rooms are pretty clean. The Wi-Fi provided here is pretty fast, and there is also a garden, and playgrounds are provided for students to play. And all the labs are well-equipped with new equipment and study materials.

reviews.review_heading: It's a good college in Mysore for engineering.
reviews.review_text: Our college is spread over in one or two acres, which is a massive area for our infrastructure. The new buildings have amazing throat. This year, it is one of the best campuses in Mysore with all types of facilities, including well-equipped libraries, playground and labs with the latest equipment.

reviews.review_heading: Best college for engineering in Mysuru with modern, huge and green campus.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is good with all basic facilities and services available like Wi-Fi enabled campus, digital library, sport grounds, gym, prayer hall with greenery and cleanliness maintained all around campus. Hostel is good at the price they offer with decent food, as everyone’s taste differs.

reviews.review_heading: Review of JSS Science and Technology University, Mysore.
reviews.review_text: The hostel and college infrastructure are good, but the building is now outdated because it is an old-established college. This college was established around the 1970s. The campus is well-maintained, and it's a lush green campus, and you get full campus Wi-Fi coverage.

reviews.review_heading: If you are on the right path, the college helps you a lot by giving many opportunities.
reviews.review_text: Facilities in our campus are good. The only problem is that there are no charging ports in classroom benches. Labs and libraries are well-equipped. We have three types of libraries in our college. First is the normal library, where we can find many books. Second is the digital library, where we can access soft copies of books. Third is the reference library, where we can also find books.

reviews.review_heading: JSS Science and Technology University, Mysuru 2026 placement. SJCE placements review.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure for this college is good, but this college was established in 1970, so the infrastructure is outdated. The condition of the hostel for both boys and girls is good. The campus is full of lush greenery, and the crowd is also good, and the campus is surrounded by Wi-Fi.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2026Offered by Sri Jayachamarajendra College of Engineering, JSS STUReviewed on 16 Nov 2025)
reviews.review_heading: The best college in our city.
reviews.review_text: The college has facilitated two hostels for students, our hostel has good facilities and Wi-Fi. The course here is academically excellent, providing good technical domain knowledge to students. Our college has the best infrastructure in the city, it has several playgrounds, labs with the latest instruments etc.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 274 published reviews , 233 reviews are verified.

The placements in dream and core companies have tough competition, and students need to be really good and knowledgeable to get placed in such companies.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2025
reviews_list.review_title: I have a good experience at Amrita School of Business, Amritapuri.

review_content.Placements: More than 90% of students get placed during my time at the college. The highest CTC is 12 LPA, and the average CTC is 7.5 LPA. Top recruiters are Deloitte, PWC, EY, MRF, Federal Bank, City Union Bank, and SBI. Internships are primarily set up on their own, with alumni connections. In the new batch, internships are provided by the college at companies like Bajaj, Deloitte, BNY Mellon, etc. Roles offered are Management Trainee, Deputy Manager, Assistant Manager, etc.
review_content.Infrastructure: Classes are well-lit and have sufficient ventilation and size. Free Wi-Fi is provided on the campus as well as in the hostels. Classrooms do not have AC and can get hot during the summer. Classrooms also have SMART boards, speakers, and mics. Hostel rooms are of good quality, and the food is okay. Canteen food is great with a wide variety and taste. The college also offers free gym membership.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2020
reviews_list.review_title: A college of rich experience of faculty and 100% Placement .

review_content.Placements: Till date 97% students have been placed still placements are going and the highest salary offered is 10LPA, the lowest 4.5LPA and avg 5.5LPA. Byjus, future group, away, federal bank are the top recruiting companies and 100% got internship at Amul, cocacola, cavinkare, berger paints for internship and top roles offered are, BDE, Dy. Regional Officer and Mgt. Trainee.
review_content.Infrastructure: Facilities here are average I would say, as the building is 3 floors, 1 floor is for other dept. and top and ground is our dept so facilities are less but teaching and staff are damn good and teaches well and classroom are equipped with smartboard which makes learning interesting. Hostel rooms are good but the mess food is below average and one would not like to have it on a regular basis though we have lots of restaurants nearby so we eat from there mostly. Sometimes we eat from mess and canteens are available with limited menu and no sports and games facilities are there inside hostel.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: The college is overpriced for the coaching.

review_content.Placements: There is poor coordination between placement in-charges. It may hinder the placement process and lead to inefficiencies. To secure placement opportunities, present yourself professionally and highlight your skills and achievements to the placement officer. The pay scale would range between 3.25 to 5.2 lacs per annum.
review_content.Infrastructure: The most flexible environment is located in a vast range of spaces, and students are easily adapted to the college culture. Sometimes there will be an understanding and clashes arise between the students of various years. College administration resolves all the disputes immediately.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: Everything is nice. Good placement offers.

review_content.Placements: Our college is a preferred destination to recruit from, for a large number of companies.Good quality experience is provide to students when a majority of our students are successfully placed on campus. Each of programmes are designed to give our students a balanced education with theory as well as practical knowledge. In addition, they are encouraged to participate in extra curricular activities as it helps them develop soft skills and develop well rounded personalities. It is this that differentiates our students and makes them a valuable part of any company they join.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2015
reviews_list.review_title: A place for your studies with fun.

review_content.Placements: More than 100 companies come for placements every year. We have 4 campuses at Kolam, Cochin, Coimbatore and Bangalore. All campus students will attend placements at the Coimbatore campus, so you have to travel to Coimbatore campus every time a company comes for placement. The intimation will be given 2 days prior. About 95 percent of the students were placed on the campus itself. The average package is around 5 lakhs/annum, the highest is 12 lakhs/annum and the lowest is 3 lakhs/annum. For the internship, not many companies came through the college, but students prefer to do it on their own mostly.

reviews_list.batch_info: Master of Business Administration (MBA) - Batch of 2021
reviews_list.review_title: There are more spoken courses at our campus.

review_content.Placements: The placement commission has good courage and capacity to deal with all kinds of students. They are so calm in handling clients who came for student recruitment. The starting deals for recruitment would be from 2.9 LPA, and such deals end with the greatest package of 11.5 LPA.
review_content.Infrastructure: The complete admission process and seat allotment are fully done based on the entrance exam scores, followed by the counselling process. There is strictly no chance of entering via the direct admission process or recommendations. Hostel zones are comfortable with full-time surveillance provided by wardens.

admission_process.title: Amrita School of Business, Amritapuri Admission Process 2026

paragraphs: Amrita School of Business admission 2026is conducted online. Admission to the MBA course is offered through national-level entrance exams, such as MAT, XAT, CAT, CMAT scores. Check below the completeAmrita School of Business admission process:
Step 1: Amrita School of Business Application Process 2026

Aspirants meeting the eligibility requirements can apply online. Candidates need to fill out the application form, upload documents and pay an application fee to apply for admission. Aspirants need to pay an application fee of INR 1,880 (inclusive of GST) for the MBA programme.Step 2: Selection

Candidates are selected for MBA based on MAT, XAT, CAT, CMAT, GMAT, NMAT or GRE scores. Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham also conducts the Amrita Common Aptitude Test (ACAT) for MBA admission. Besides, the selection for PhD course is based on a written test conducted by the school. Shortlisted candidates are further called for a personal interview round.
Step 3:Admission Confirmation
Once the selection rounds are over, the shortlisted candidates receive an offer letter via email and SMS. Aspirants need to pay theAmrita School of Business Amritapuri feeto confirm their seats.
For more information Amrita School of Business check out the below:

reviews.review_heading: I have a good experience at Amrita School of Business, Amritapuri.
reviews.review_text: Classes are well-lit and have sufficient ventilation and size. Free Wi-Fi is provided on the campus as well as in the hostels. Classrooms do not have AC and can get hot during the summer. Classrooms also have SMART boards, speakers, and mics. Hostel rooms are of good quality, and the food is okay. Canteen food is great with a wide variety and taste. The college also offers free gym membership.

reviews.review_heading: A college of rich experience of faculty and 100% Placement .
reviews.review_text: Facilities here are average I would say, as the building is 3 floors, 1 floor is for other dept. and top and ground is our dept so facilities are less but teaching and staff are damn good and teaches well and classroom are equipped with smartboard which makes learning interesting. Hostel rooms are good but the mess food is below average and one would not like to have it on a regular basis though we have lots of restaurants nearby so we eat from there mostly. Sometimes we eat from mess and cantee...

reviews.review_heading: The college is overpriced for the coaching.
reviews.review_text: The most flexible environment is located in a vast range of spaces, and students are easily adapted to the college culture. Sometimes there will be an understanding and clashes arise between the students of various years. College administration resolves all the disputes immediately.

reviews.review_heading: Everything is nice. Good placement offers.
reviews.review_text: Nice and spacious library : Around 3,000 current journal titles.Over 20,000 electronic resources, including databases, journals and books. A substantial media (CD and DVD) collection. The library is searchable via the library catalogue. But it is not only our library you will have access to u2013 as a BITS Pilani student you can use a network of other libraries via our membership.

reviews.review_heading: A place for your studies with fun.
reviews.review_text: You have good facilities in the college like Wi-Fi and a library. All classes are taken only through projectors and the board where they are essential. Hostel rooms are very good and comfortable (only 2 per room). The food was not bad as it was a simple typical Kerala food in the canteens.

reviews.review_heading: There are more spoken courses at our campus.
reviews.review_text: The complete admission process and seat allotment are fully done based on the entrance exam scores, followed by the counselling process. There is strictly no chance of entering via the direct admission process or recommendations. Hostel zones are comfortable with full-time surveillance provided by wardens.

reviews.review_heading: Good infrastructure and facilities.
reviews.review_text: The Amritapuri Campus is spread over 80 acres of land in one of the most beautiful and picturesque locales of the Kerala coastal line. It is currently home to numerous schools and research centers. ICTS is the primary provider of IT, telecommunication, computing and related facilities. There are 2650 computers and 100 high-end servers deployed at the Amritapuri Campus. The ISP connectivity is fault tolerant and provides a speed of 68 Mbps in high-availability as well as load-sharing modes. The q...

reviews.review_heading: MBA at Amrita School of Business, Kollam.
reviews.review_text: Our college is fully equipped with smart classes, Wi-Fi, library, conference rooms, etc. The quality of food in the canteen is very good. The hostels are pretty neat and tidy and they have all type of equipment. There are basketball, cricket, and football courts in our college. I did not face any sort of issue in our college.

Out of the four campuses of ASB, Amritapuri (Kollam) has the special touch of spirituality and motherly love with a special bliss. It was not just the management lessons that we got, but indeed the lessons on the ways of life itself. Now within the past one year after completing my MBA there has been a lot going on in life and at work place, but the lessons and experiences from this beautiful place has always come handy and they will be a major tool to face and fix all the difficulties at work.
... Out of the four campuses of ASB, Amritapuri (Kollam) has the special touch of spirituality and motherly love with a special bliss. Now within the past one year after completing my MBA there has been a lot going on in life and at work place, but the lessons and experiences from this beautiful place has always come handy and they will be a major tool to face and fix all the difficulties at work.
...

reviews.review_heading: Over all Amrita is good.
reviews.review_text: Amrita university is spread across 500 acres and it houses academic buildings, swimming pool, staff- quarters, labs, classrooms, library, shopping complex. Playground. Etc. We have very good facilities in the hostel and food is also very good complete vegetarian and we will have 3-4 curries and we have hospital in the campus itself for emergency cases and we have good sports and games in the play ground .

college_info.intro:
Ganpat University popular programmes are BTech and MBA. The university offers BTech specialisation in Computer Science & Engineering, Cyber Security, Automobile, Biomedical, Electrical, Mechanical, Marine, Petrochemical, and others. Ganpat University Mehsana BTech students are placed in top companies in various sectors. Btech students can work as Automotive Engineers, Cyber Security Analysts, Forensic Analysts, Chief Research Managers, and others.
Ganpat University Kherva is one of the eminent universities. The university offers an MBA specialisation in Agribusiness, Financial Services, Pharmaceuticals, Business Analytics, Healthcare and Hospital, and others. MBA students can seek higher education and work as Agribusiness Marketing Officers, Financial Advisors, Development Managers, Health Administrators, and others. Candidates can check some of the popular programmes offered at Ganpat University in the following table:

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Biotechnology - Batch of 2028
reviews_list.review_title: It has average placements, good infrastructure, and a strong academic focus.

review_content.Placements: Placements are average, and about 65-70% of students get placed. Packages are often too low. We need to apply for jobs or internships on our own, as the college support is limited and the offered pay is generally low. I suggest students be independent when it comes to placements.
review_content.Infrastructure: The campus offers average labs, classrooms, hostel facilities, and a library. Sports facilities are not up to the mark. The food quality can improve. The hotel's condition is very average. There is only 1 bathroom and 1 washroom for 8 people. Students have no choice.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Automobile Engineering - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: My honest review of life at Ganpat University.

review_content.Placements: When it comes to placements, the placement cell provides proper training through seminars, soft-skill sessions, and industry interactions. Many reputed companies visit the campus, especially for engineering streams, and the opportunities are increasing year by year.
review_content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of Ganpat University is one of its strongest points. The campus is spacious and well-maintained with modern classrooms, advanced laboratories, a central library with digital resources, sports grounds, and Wi-Fi facilities across the campus. The automobile engineering labs are equipped with the latest tools and machinery, which helps a lot in gaining practical knowledge.

The fee structure at Ganpat University is bifurcated into various components, namely tuition, security deposit, and hostel fee. Certain fee elements are one-time payments to be made at the time of Ganpat University admission, whereas others are recurring as per the norms of the institution fee policy. The fees vary anywhere between INR 60,000 - 19,80,000 depending upon the course chosen. Below is a table comprising the fee structure for different programs available at Ganpat University.

review_summary.college_name: Ganpat University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Mechatronics Engineering - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: Nice college, it is value for money.

content.Placements: The placement scene depends a bit on the course, but overall, the university puts in real effort. Big companies do come, and many students get placed or at least get internship opportunities that help them gain exposure.
content.Infrastructure: Hostel and campus life are one of the highlights. The infrastructure is quite solid. Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, library, sports grounds, everything is there and maintained decently. The hostel feels safe, the environment is student-friendly, and the mess food is, well, not perfect, but definitely manageable. The campus feels like a small town of its own, which makes college life more memorable.

individual_reviews.course: B.Sc. (Hons.) in Microbiology - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Review of Ganpat University (GUNI) Microbiology student.

content.Placements: Only a few placements are available in this course, which is why there are no placements after Microbiology. If anyone wants a job, they need to complete PG to get a job easily. There is no information about the highest package and average package. Many hospital and lab companies are interested in this field.
content.Infrastructure: Hostel is not a good option. PG is better. Food in the mess is good, but there is no Wi-Fi in the hostel. There are rules in the hostel, and security guards are strict. The quality of food is bad.
content.Faculty: Our faculty helps us before exams, and exams are very simple. We get 80% as well, and many students get 90 to 98%. We have three exams. The first is the mid-semester exam, which is offline. The second is the online mid exam. The third is the final exam, which is offline. Exams are nicely organized by the university with very good arrangements. Our faculty is very good and supports us everywhere.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Biotechnology - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: It has average placements, good infrastructure, and a strong academic focus.

content.Placements: Placements are average, and about 65-70% of students get placed. Packages are often too low. We need to apply for jobs or internships on our own, as the college support is limited and the offered pay is generally low. I suggest students be independent when it comes to placements.
content.Infrastructure: The campus offers average labs, classrooms, hostel facilities, and a library. Sports facilities are not up to the mark. The food quality can improve. The hotel's condition is very average. There is only 1 bathroom and 1 washroom for 8 people. Students have no choice.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Automobile Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: My honest review of life at Ganpat University.

content.Placements: When it comes to placements, the placement cell provides proper training through seminars, soft-skill sessions, and industry interactions. Many reputed companies visit the campus, especially for engineering streams, and the opportunities are increasing year by year.
content.Infrastructure: Infrastructure of Ganpat University is one of its strongest points. The campus is spacious and well-maintained with modern classrooms, advanced laboratories, a central library with digital resources, sports grounds, and Wi-Fi facilities across the campus. The automobile engineering labs are equipped with the latest tools and machinery, which helps a lot in gaining practical knowledge.

individual_reviews.course: Diploma (IT) - Batch of 2026
individual_reviews.title: The college is very good, it teaches us so many things like studies, people, environment, and all.

content.Placements: 40% of students have been placed in our course. The highest package is 5 LPA, the lowest package is 1 LPA, and the average package is 2 LPA. Top recruiting companies are TCS, Infosys, and Reliance. 40% of students got internships in our course, with companies like TCS, Woot, and Infosys. Software developer, data analyst, and IT support specialist are the roles offered in our course.
content.Infrastructure: Firstly, we have well-maintained classrooms, labs, and a library. We have students' personal Wi-Fi connections to connect it, but we have to enter our enrollment number. Hostels are well-maintained and give very energetic vibes. The quality of food in the canteen and mess is very hygienic. The college provides 24/7 medical support. Every semester, we have tournaments for sports activities and games.

admission_overview.college_name: Ganpat University Admission 2025: Application Process, Eligibility, Courses, Fees

admission_process.title: Ganpat University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: Ganpat University admissionto courses is both merit-based and entrance-based. Candidates seeking admission can either get direct admission to their desired course or through any relevant national/ state-level entrance tests such as GUCET, CUET, CAT, MAT, JEE Main, etc. Apart from the aforementioned entrance exams, the University also accepts Pearson Undergraduate Entrance Exam scores for admission to all UG courses. For an MBA, the University conducts an additional selection round of personal interviews before shortlisting candidates for admission.

Ganpat University (GUNI)offers more than 171 courses at undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma levels. It also offers a range of certificate courses. Ganpat University has seven faculties focused onEngineering,Management,Pharmacy,Computer Applications,Sciences,Social Sciences,Architecture,Design and Planning, Law, and Maritime Studies.

The basic eligibility for admission to most courses at Ganpat University is merit in the last qualifying examination; however, the university accepts the scores of various entrance exams conducted at the national and state levels for admission to several courses.
The table below presents the application status of variousGanpat University coursesalong with the eligibility, and accepted entrance exams:
Eligibility
Class 12 with 45% aggregate in Science stream
Class 10 and Class 12 with Physics and Chemistry
CUET/GUJCET
Class 10 and Class 12 50% marks (45% in case of candidates belonging to reserved category)
NATA/ Direct admission
Class 10 and Class 12 in any stream with 45% marks (40% in case of candidates belonging to reserved category)
NATA,UCEED,GNUDAT
Bachelor's degree
CMAT,MAT,XAT,CAT,ATMA+ Personal Interview
Bachelor’s degree
GATE,GUJCET
Bachelor’s degree with 50% marks (45% marks in case of candidates belonging to reserved category)
Direct Admission
Make your selection here,to check the eligibility and selection criteria for other Ganpat University courses.

The Ganpat University admission process is conducted in multiple steps. The process begins with the release of application forms on the official website of the University, followed by the shortlisting of candidates based on their educational qualifications and scores in the entrance exam. The final step includes acceptance of the admission offer by the candidate. The candidates must check the eligibility criteria before applying to their desired course.
Interested candidates can read the detailed admission process below:
Step 1: Ganpat University Application Process
The Ganpat University application forms are released on the University's official website. Candidates who meet the eligibility criteria must fill out the application form before the deadline.
Step 2: Shortlisting of Candidates

Ganpat University admission criteria are both entrance-based and merit-based for all courses. The University accepts various entrance exams such as CAT, XAT, MAT, JEE, Pearson UG test, etc. to shortlist admission candidates.
Step 3: Final Admission
Shortlisted candidates are required to pay the admission fees and appear for the document verification process to secure their seats.

faqs.question: What should I do to get a direct admission in Ganpat University for B.Tech?
faqs.answer: Ganpat University in the Mehsana district gives admissions for its Bachelor of Technology programs based on the marks obtained by students in JEE Mains or GUJCET examinations. The prospectus of this university also does not talk of any direct admission to Bachelor of engineering courses. One can definitely conclude that there is no way students can get direct admission without appearing for any of the two exams mentioned above.

faqs.question: Can I get into Ganpat University with 70% in class 12th?
faqs.answer: Yes, a 70% grade in class 12 can get you into Ganpat University. Your prospects, however, will be influenced by a number of things, such as the degree you are applying to, how well you do on other admission examinations, and your extracurricular involvement. Ganpat University stipulates that a minimum of 45% of the class 12th aggregate, with 40% going to reserved categories, is needed for undergraduate programs. But certain well-liked programs, like engineering and medical, could have little more higher cutoffs.

placement_report.college_name: Ganpat University Placement & Salary Insights

placement_data.title: Ganpat University Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: The highest and average package offered during Ganpat University placements 2024 stood at INR 19.68 LPA and INR 4.05 LPA , respectively. Further, 864 companies approached for placements and 5,606 jobs were offered during placement drive 2024. Apart from this, the internship rate recorded during GUNI placements 2024 was 100%. Moreover, according to Engineering and Management NIRF report 2024 released by the University, the median package offered during BTech and MBA placements 2023 stood at INR 4 LPA and INR 3.75 LPA , respectively.

faqs.question: What is the fee structure for B.Tech Mechanical Engineering in Ganpat University?
faqs.answer: Ganpat University charges INR 119,000 for the B.Tech. Mechanical Engineering program. Included in the fee structure are the following: tuition ($59,500), enrollment/registration ($1,500), university exam ($2,000), and alumni ($1,000).

faqs.question: What is the fee refund policy at Ganpat University?
faqs.answer: The Ganpat University's fee refund policy states that if students wish to withdraw their admission at the university, they can avail a refund of their submitted fees. Tabulated below is the percentage of the fee refund based on the point in time the withdrawal request is submitted: Particular Refund Amount Up to 30 September The entire fee paid by the candidate will be refunded If the date of submission of the online application for Admission Cancellation is during 1st Oct - 31st Oct Fee paid refund after deduction of INR 1,000 as administrative charges If the date of submission of the online application for Admission Cancellation is after October 31 As per the UGC Notification

faqs.question: How much does MBA at Ganpat University cost?
faqs.answer: Ganpat University Fee Structure 2023: The official website lists the fees for UG, PG, and Ph.D. degree courses such as BBA, BCA, Bcom, Mtech with specialization, and many others. The institution charges moderate tuition for these courses. The fee structure for all of Ganpat University's courses is stated below in the article. Students who want to apply for any UG, PG, Diploma, or Doctoral level study can find the complete list of Ganpat University Courses & Fees as well as the duration of the course here. The address of Ganpat University is Kherva, Mehsana, Gujarat, India. The Mehsana District Education Foundation manages it. Ganpat University is a private university that was founded in 2005 and is recognised by the UGC. The tuition at this university ranges from INR 12,000 to INR 7 lakh, depending on the course. This university selects students based on merit and the results of national level exams such as JEE, CAT, GATE, MAT, XMAT, CMAT, and so on. The tuition for Ganpat University Engineering degrees ranges from INR 2,00,000 to INR 5,24,823. The BA (Economics) Course fee is around INR 1,51,374, the BBA Course fee is approximately Rs. 1,80,000, the BCA Course fee is approximately Rs. 40,572, and the B.Pharma Course charge is approximately Rs. 3,56,000. Fees for UG and PG Business Administration programs will range from INR 97,000 and INR 1,89,110 per year. Ganpat University charges INR 40,040 for the M.Phil Course, and INR 1,90,000 for the MBA Course in various specialties. At Ganpat University, the Ph.D. course costs approximately INR 75,200. Ganpat University charges INR 3,000 for the PhD entrance exam. The application cost for Ganpat University is INR 1,000.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2029Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 9 Dec 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Nice college, it is value for money.
reviews.review_text: Hostel and campus life are one of the highlights. The infrastructure is quite solid. Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, library, sports grounds, everything is there and maintained decently. The hostel feels safe, the environment is student-friendly, and the mess food is, well, not perfect, but definitely manageable. The campus feels like a small town of its own, which makes college life more memorable.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Ganpat University (GUNI) Microbiology student.
reviews.review_text: Hostel is not a good option. PG is better. Food in the mess is good, but there is no Wi-Fi in the hostel. There are rules in the hostel, and security guards are strict. The quality of food is bad.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2028Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 12 May 2025)
reviews.review_heading: It has average placements, good infrastructure, and a strong academic focus.
reviews.review_text: The campus offers average labs, classrooms, hostel facilities, and a library. Sports facilities are not up to the mark. The food quality can improve. The hotel's condition is very average. There is only 1 bathroom and 1 washroom for 8 people. Students have no choice.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 20 Aug 2025)
reviews.review_heading: My honest review of life at Ganpat University.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure of Ganpat University is one of its strongest points. The campus is spacious and well-maintained with modern classrooms, advanced laboratories, a central library with digital resources, sports grounds, and Wi-Fi facilities across the campus. The automobile engineering labs are equipped with the latest tools and machinery, which helps a lot in gaining practical knowledge.

reviews.review_heading: The college is very good, it teaches us so many things like studies, people, environment, and all.
reviews.review_text: Firstly, we have well-maintained classrooms, labs, and a library. We have students' personal Wi-Fi connections to connect it, but we have to enter our enrollment number. Hostels are well-maintained and give very energetic vibes. The quality of food in the canteen and mess is very hygienic. The college provides 24/7 medical support. Every semester, we have tournaments for sports activities and games.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 4 May 2025)
reviews.review_heading: It has good placements, helpful faculty, relevant curriculum, but some facilities need improvement.
reviews.review_text: Ganpat University offers well equipped labs Wi fi enabled classrooms and a modern library for academic needs. Hostel facilities are decent with hygienic food medical care and sports amenities providing a comfortable environment for students. However some facilities should be further improved to enhance students' comfort.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 10 Jun 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with everything except the classrooms.
reviews.review_text: College facilities are quite good, but the infrastructure is not so good. 24-hour high-speed Wi-Fi and high-tech laboratories are available. Classrooms are not so good, they are non-AC and not well managed. But the library is big, so all books are easily available. The hostel facility is the best, and the mess food is of good quality. Also, good quality medical facilities, sports, and games are available.

reviews.review_heading: College batch 2023-25 in finance service.
reviews.review_text: Campus is very big. Sports activities are also included and they have good healthcare sector.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by Shree S.K. Patel College of Pharmaceutical Education and Research, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 30 Apr 2025)
reviews.review_heading: I'm satisfied and there are good placements.
reviews.review_text: Campus is beautiful and green, and the atmosphere is also good. They also have a big library with AC classroom. Wi-Fi is available on all campus. Hostel facilities are good, but food is average in mess. Medical facilities are too good and sports are also too good.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2025Offered by A.M. Patel Institute of Computer Studies, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 21 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: It is great to be student of GUNI, it has good and healthy environment with lots of knowledge banks.
reviews.review_text: All types of facilities are available on campus. Ganpat University offers a well-maintained infrastructure with modern labs and classrooms. The hostel is clean, and the mess food is good. The campus of Ganpat University is equipped with all types of facilities, from food and stationery to other essentials. It also includes a hospital on campus.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2026Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 15 Feb 2025)
reviews.review_heading: My college has a standard infrastructure with all the facilities available in it.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is quite good. We are provided with full-time Wi-Fi service. Libraries are available all day long with many informative books. The hostel rooms are well-ventilated and have adequate furniture. Our mess provides nutritious meals to the students. The food quality is good. We also have a canteen inside our university campus. The medical facility is provided within the campus itself and it is available 24/7. The university campus has its own basketball court and football ground. It al...

reviews.review_heading: Life changing decision.
reviews.review_text: In my course, classrooms have good infrastructure with air-conditioning. There are Wi-Fi, computer labs, etc. In the case of Ahmedabad they don't have a hostel and canteen. For sports, they have indoor games like table tennis, carrom, chess, etc.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2027Offered by U.V. Patel College of Engineering, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 21 Jan 2025)
reviews.review_heading: All about college, infrastructure, placements, and faculty.
reviews.review_text: Yes, we have the best infrastructure with on-campus hostels for boys and girls, including Wi-Fi and hot showers. We have shared rooms with good space, and we like the infrastructure. We get three meals a day and have access to a cricket ground, football ground, swimming pool, boxing ring, gym, and sports complex for extra-curricular activities.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2026Offered by Institute of Computer Technology, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 14 Jan 2025)
reviews.review_heading: Overall I will say Excellent in Faculty, Syllabus, etc. Absolutely satisfied with placement.
reviews.review_text: In our university, the facility is outstanding. There are sports grounds for all sports: tennis, football, cricket, running track, etc., a swimming pool, gym, classrooms with Wi-Fi, labs, and a library for all departments, etc. They have provided different hostels for different branches. The food quality is also very nice and not so costly. Also, for out-of-state students, there is a different canteen.

reviews.batch: Batch of 2028Offered by V.M. Patel College of Management Studies, Ganpat UniversityReviewed on 18 Dec 2024)
reviews.review_heading: I am from Ahmedabad and I don't recommend this college for pursuing BBA here.
reviews.review_text: I personally don't like the hostel facilities of this college, and I don't recommend it as there is only one university in a good spot; otherwise, there are only green fields around it, and I suggest that you should go to Ahmedabad as compared to here, and I personally don't recommend doing a BBA here.
