reviews_list.review_title: A good choice to make your career in sports management and Science .

review_content.Placements: Around 80% students are placed in my course. The highest package is of 7 Lakhs per year and the lowest is 3 Lakhs per year and the average is of 4.5 Lakhs per year. Top recruiting companies are star sports, IPL, BCCI, etc. Around 95% students got internship .
review_content.Infrastructure: There is a canteen, library classrooms available in the campus, coffee machines are installed in the campus. There are no hostels of IISM. The food quality is like there are only packed food like juices, healthy chips, protein bars, etc. Foosball and carrom is available .

reviews_list.batch_info: Master's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: The facilities are good. When we are in campus, the vibes are different from other colleges.

review_content.Placements: 100% students get internship in IPL, AFC, Khelo India, Road safety, Pro Kabbadi, Cricfit, PTKS and Kabbadi Adda. Roles offered to us are operations management, Event Head, Hospitality, Venue coordinator, Operations coordinator and Social Idea Manager.
review_content.Infrastructure: There are total seven class rooms in International Institute of sports management. It is a campus with high-speed Wi-Fi for students. There is a foosball table and carrom board in canteen for students to play during breaks.

reviews_list.batch_info: Bachelor's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2022
reviews_list.review_title: I am satisfied with its facilities, teachers, and the opportunities they create for students.

review_content.Placements: Almost 30% of students are placed in different companies and placements are still going on. The highest salary package offered is 4.5 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 2.7 LPA. The average salary package offered is around 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Gosports Foundation, Omtex, My11circle, Dream Set Go, Dream 11, BCCI, and Procam International. Roles offered are operations manager, analyst, business development, marketing manager, and social media manager.
review_content.Infrastructure: The institute has well-maintained and well-equipped classrooms with projector screens and Wi-Fi. The whole campus is air-conditioned. It has a cafeteria with games like carrom and foodball, and also vending and coffee machines. Faculty members are very good and friendly.

review_summary.college_name: IISM Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Master's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: A review for a sports enthusiast.

content.Placements: Yes, placement opportunities are often great in the college. A lot of students get various opportunities and are placed at different places and positions in sports companies or for a team at various events such as IPL, PKL, National Games, and Khelo India.
content.Infrastructure: Yes, the infrastructure of the college is very nice. It has bigger classrooms, a very spacious area, and canteens that are hygienic and have great-tasting food. The food is very good. The campus gives positive vibes to students, and it is also kept hygienic.

individual_reviews.course: Master's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2025
individual_reviews.title: It's a good opportunity for all sports students and those who are showing interest in sports.

content.Placements: I got an internship at SAI for the Khelo India Youth Games, the University Games, the World Cup 2023, etc. In this internship, I really enjoyed it and also got money, and in Khelo India University games, they provided travel, good accommodations, etc. And I learned so many new things from the Khelo India Youth Games and the Khelo India University Games.
content.Infrastructure: There is nothing for accommodation; you have to manage your own way. But the main thing is that you can get your accommodation with the help of your administration departments. They also offer you and suggest some good places near the college. The International Institute of Sports and Management is a good choice for a Master's in Sports Management.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: A good choice to make your career in sports management and Science .

content.Placements: Around 80% students are placed in my course. The highest package is of 7 Lakhs per year and the lowest is 3 Lakhs per year and the average is of 4.5 Lakhs per year. Top recruiting companies are star sports, IPL, BCCI, etc. Around 95% students got internship .
content.Infrastructure: There is a canteen, library classrooms available in the campus, coffee machines are installed in the campus. There are no hostels of IISM. The food quality is like there are only packed food like juices, healthy chips, protein bars, etc. Foosball and carrom is available .

individual_reviews.course: Master's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: The facilities are good. When we are in campus, the vibes are different from other colleges.

content.Placements: 100% students get internship in IPL, AFC, Khelo India, Road safety, Pro Kabbadi, Cricfit, PTKS and Kabbadi Adda. Roles offered to us are operations management, Event Head, Hospitality, Venue coordinator, Operations coordinator and Social Idea Manager.
content.Infrastructure: There are total seven class rooms in International Institute of sports management. It is a campus with high-speed Wi-Fi for students. There is a foosball table and carrom board in canteen for students to play during breaks.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor's Degree in Sports Management - Batch of 2022
individual_reviews.title: I am satisfied with its facilities, teachers, and the opportunities they create for students.

content.Placements: Almost 30% of students are placed in different companies and placements are still going on. The highest salary package offered is 4.5 LPA, and the lowest salary package offered is 2.7 LPA. The average salary package offered is around 3.5 LPA. The top recruiting companies are Gosports Foundation, Omtex, My11circle, Dream Set Go, Dream 11, BCCI, and Procam International. Roles offered are operations manager, analyst, business development, marketing manager, and social media manager.
content.Infrastructure: The institute has well-maintained and well-equipped classrooms with projector screens and Wi-Fi. The whole campus is air-conditioned. It has a cafeteria with games like carrom and foodball, and also vending and coffee machines. Faculty members are very good and friendly.

admission_process.title: International Institute of Sports & Management Admission process 2025

paragraphs: International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai offers UG and PG-level courses. All courses at International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai are admission-based. The selection is based on the valid score of SMAT entrance exam, followed by the Personal Interview (PI) round. Aspirants, willing to apply for any courses are required to register for entrance exams and appear for the same atInternational Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai. To know the latest information related to International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai admission 2025 go through the below sections:

International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai courses admission is open. The institute offers BSM, MSM, BSS, MSS and others at the UG and PG levels. Admission to all the courses is entrance-based. Check below the eligibility, fee and selection criteria for various International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai UG and PG courses:
Class 12 and UG degree with 50% aggregate
Graduation degree from a recognised university
SMAT/MAH CET+ PI
Class 12 with PCB from State Board/ CBSE/ ISC
UG degree with 50% aggregate in the respective subject (45% aggregate for Maharashtra domicile candidates)

Note:Master of Sports Management, PGP in Sports and Wellness Management & PGP in Sports Event Management aspirants can apply with their MAH-CET scores and will get a waiver from appearing for SMAT Entrance exam.

International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai admission process go ahead with filling out the International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai registration form. Applicants interested in admission to any courses must appear for the entrance exam and interview round conducted by the college. Look through the following section to learn more about the International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai admission process 2025:
Step 1: Go through the International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai Website

Candidates looking forward to admission to various programme at International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai must fill out the admission form online by going through the official website of the college
Step 2: International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai Selection Round

According to the selection criteria, the candidates must pass Class 12 for admission to UG and a graduation degree for admission to PG. Additionally, applicants must appear for an entrance exam and personal interview conducted by the college. The college releases the shortlisted candidates’ list for all the courses based on their performance in entrance exams and interviews.
Step 3: International Institute of Sports & Management Mumbai Final Seat Allotment
The selected candidates are required to make a fee payment within the given deadline to lock in their final seats.
Check out more on International Institute of Sports & Management Admission in the below videos:

placement_data.title: IISM Placement Overview 2024
paragraphs: The overall highest package offered to the 2024 passing-out batch was INR 7.50 LPA and was made to MSM students. In addition to this, the highest package offered to BSM and PGP batches 2024 was the same, i.e. INR 4.50 LPA. The average package offered to the MSM students was INR 4.11 LPA. Furthermore, the average package for BSM and PGP stood at INR 3.18 LPA and INR 3.50 LPA, respectively.

Talking about the IISM placement percentage 2024, it stood at 80%. This year, 218 organisations recruited the eligible students. The majority of MSM students were placed in Operations sector companies . Likewise, Operations was the top recruiting sector during BSM and PGP placements 2024.

reviews.review_heading: A review for a sports enthusiast.
reviews.review_text: Yes, the infrastructure of the college is very nice. It has bigger classrooms, a very spacious area, and canteens that are hygienic and have great-tasting food. The food is very good. The campus gives positive vibes to students, and it is also kept hygienic.

reviews.review_heading: It's a good opportunity for all sports students and those who are showing interest in sports.
reviews.review_text: There is nothing for accommodation; you have to manage your own way. But the main thing is that you can get your accommodation with the help of your administration departments. They also offer you and suggest some good places near the college. The International Institute of Sports and Management is a good choice for a Master's in Sports Management.

reviews.review_heading: A good choice to make your career in sports management and Science .
reviews.review_text:
There is a canteen, library classrooms available in the campus, coffee machines are installed in the campus.
There are no hostels of IISM.
The food quality is like there are only packed food like juices, healthy chips, protein bars, etc.
Foosball and carrom is available .

reviews.review_heading: The facilities are good. When we are in campus, the vibes are different from other colleges.
reviews.review_text: There are total seven class rooms in International Institute of sports management. It is a campus with high-speed Wi-Fi for students. There is a foosball table and carrom board in canteen for students to play during breaks.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with its facilities, teachers, and the opportunities they create for students.
reviews.review_text: The institute has well-maintained and well-equipped classrooms with projector screens and Wi-Fi. The whole campus is air-conditioned. It has a cafeteria with games like carrom and foodball, and also vending and coffee machines. Faculty members are very good and friendly.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely thrilled because faculty is great and atmosphere in college is amazing too.
reviews.review_text: Classrooms are good and spacious. Atmosphere in the college is great. Wi-Fi is unstable though. Facilities in college are good too, we have a common room to spend during breaks where we can play games like carrom and foosball. We have a vending machine if we want any food or drink. We don't have a proper canteen as such though inside the campus .

reviews.review_heading: This college has good connections in the industry.
reviews.review_text: This college is trying to provide a fun campus. They have classrooms with different names related to our industry and they are trying to make it sport-oriented. The campus is small as the industry is new and trying to evolve. The space is less, but they are trying to manage.

reviews.review_heading: It is a sports related degree, has hardworking experienced and friendly staff.
reviews.review_text: IISM classrooms are equipped with modern facilities such as projector, while the board of air conditioner. IISM required infrastructure that suit the need of both undergraduate and postgraduate course. With well maintained classrooms.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely satisfied with faculties and placements. Best college for sports management in India.
reviews.review_text: College infrastructure is too good. Wi-Fi, air conditioned classrooms, canteen, game area, etc. facilities are available. Canteen is very clean and food quality is excellent and support staff is also very supportive. Administration department staff are also cooperative.

reviews.review_heading: Satisfied with the faculty and definitely is worth the money and experience .
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure for development of education is of utmost necessity and IISM proves that in an excellent way as the campus not only provides the students a viable environment to study but also makes sure that the students are able to enjoy their college lifestyle to the fullest.

reviews.review_heading: Overall I'd recommend if someone wants to do sports management from India, this is a better place.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is calm and composed. The facilities are pleasing to the eye with upmost cleanliness. Earlier we had an access to various games like billiards, table tennis.

reviews.review_heading: Absolutely worthy go for it.
reviews.review_text:
I have never seen a college offering quality infrastructure and facilities for the students. Some of the facilities are:-
Centralised AC in whole campus and classrooms. Wi-Fi connection is available. Library is available and during lockdown they have also provided books to us. Projectors and screens are also available. Various games are there. Cafeterias is also there, and many more things.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied because of faculty members and management staff members.
reviews.review_text: The library is well-equipped, and the classrooms are well-built and spacious. Infrastructure is not that big, but it is well-built. For sports, there is an artificial turf in the waiting area.

reviews.review_heading: Review of IISM - International Institute of Sports Management.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure has a feel for a sports management aspirant with spacious and recreational activities and a library. There is a coffee vending machine which is free of cost, and the Wi-Fi facility is also available. Students get their dedicate PCs to work.

reviews.review_heading: Such a nice and friendly faculty.
reviews.review_text: IISM has a quite good infrastructure which includes AC classrooms, wi-fi, library, a nice faculty and IISM support all the sports equally and give importance to every sports. Unfortunately, IISM doesn't have a hostel for now but other than that the infrastructure is quite good.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 26 published reviews , 21 reviews are verified.

college_info.intro:
Uka Tarsadia University offers UG, PG, diploma, and PhD programmes across several streams such as Pharmacy, Computer Application, Psychology, Management, Engineering, Science, etc. BTech, MBA, and BSc are the popular programmes offered at Uka Tarsadia. The institute offers a full-time, four-year BTech programme under the guidance of experts. The institute offers BTech specialisation in Civil, Chemical, Mechanical, Automobile, Mechatronics, Information Technology, and others.
Uka Tarsadia University offers a full-time, three-year BSc programme at the UG level. The BSc programmes offered at the university cover core courses in Physics, Mathematics, Microbiology, Chemistry, Nursing, and others. Below mentioned are Uka Tarsadia University's popular programmes:

placements.overview: Admission to Uka Tarsadia University is both entrance and merit-based. The university accepts national/state-level entrance exams like JEE Main, CAT, MAT, XAT, and others. Candidates must appear for at least one of the entrance exams accepted by the college for the course they wish to pursue. Uka Tarsadia determines the cut-off depending on the number of candidates and seats available. Check the Uka Tarsadia University cut-off details in this space:

student_insights.feedback: Students can work with faculty on research projects
Offered in the final year only
Many students started their own start-ups
Higher in core jobs
Both inside India & outside India
Students are expected to reach out to companies themselves
Organized & proactive placement process
Strong alumni network that help with placement opportunities
Very Active and resourceful, college is also involved
Love being in college

faqs.answer: A:    Average salary offer for BTech is mostly around 3 to 4 LPA, same like other courses. Some IT students may get higher package depends on skills and company. So learning extra tech and projects really help boost pay.
faqs.question: What’s the average salary in UKA TARSADIA BTECH PLACEMENTS 2025?

faqs.answer: A:    Placement can’t be 100% guarantee but yes, university do their best for connecting students with industries. Final selection depends on student skills, interviews and what company wants. Training and internships also helps lot.
faqs.question: Is placement guaranteed for BTech students at Uka Tarsadia?

faqs.answer: A:    Hello.As per what I've heard, from 7th sem students are eligible for placement and internship. A number of companies visits, around 30+ companies. Many good companies visits for placement cell like Adani, Reliance etc.the highest package till journeys is 10.6 lakh/annum.Almost 80% of students get places each year.Sometimes, they provide campus interviews from the 5th and 6th semesters depending upon the results of the last 2 years.The ratio of employment via campus placement is very high.H
faqs.question: Is Uka Tarsadia University good for placements?

fees_and_eligibility.overview: Uka Tarsadia University provides the students with undergraduate, postgraduate, integrated programmes, diploma, and PhD courses. The university provides courses in different streams like Science, Commerce, Arts, Management, Engineering, etc. Undergraduate level, the university provides BTech, BSc, BBA, BA, BCom, BCA, BPharm, etc. Postgraduate level, the university provides MSc, MTech, MPT, MBA, MCA, MCom, MSN, MPharm, etc. The following are the Uka Tarsadia University courses and Uka Tarsadia University fees:

faqs.answer: A:    Total tuition fees for Uka Tarsadia BCom is around INR 75,000 for whole 3 years. Students are required to pay about INR 25,000 per year. Additionally, semester exam fee of INR 1,500 every 6 months. One time enrollment fee is INR 10,000, plus alumni fee INR 2,000 and ID card fee INR 200 when you join first time.
faqs.question: What is the fees for BCom at Uka Tarsadia University in 2025?

faqs.answer: A:    Uka Tarsadia follows ACPC cut off for GUJCET marks and also keeps seats for JEE Main marks. Both marks are considered when they publish final seat allotment list. So students can check both lists to know which score help them more.
faqs.question: Does Uka Tarsadia release separate cut off marks for JEE and GUJCET?

faqs.answer: A:    GUJCET cut off marks depends on how many students appear, paper difficulty, board marks weightage and branch demand. More popular the branch, the higher the cut off goes. Seats reserved for category or EWS also affects final cut off.
faqs.question: What factors decide GUJCET cut off marks for engineering?

faqs.answer: A:    The BSc tuition fee at Uka Tarsadia University is INR 1.3 Lacs – INR 4.8 lakh depending on the specialisation chosen. The range consists of 16 courses offered by the university which are offered with varying tuition fees. Candidates taking admission into the BSc programme at the university should check the specialisation they are choosing so as to make an informed decision about the fees to be paid at the university.

reviews_list.batch_info: B.Tech. in Information Technology - Batch of 2027
reviews_list.review_title: Needs major improvement in faculty and practical learning. Provides average placements.

review_content.Placements: I am a B.Tech Information Technology student from the 2027 batch at Uka Tarsadia University. Placements are average, with around 60% of students placed. Highest salary package offered is 8 LPA, lowest salary package offered is around 2.5 LPA, and average salary offered is around 3.5 LPA. Top recruiters included TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, and Tatvasoft. About 50% of students received internships, mostly in small IT firms or startups. Roles offered were mainly software developer, QA tester, and support engineer. Placement support is decent but could improve. Many students rely on off-campus drives for better opportunities, especially in specialized domains like cybersecurity or data Science.

reviews_list.batch_info: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B. Pharma) - Batch of 2023
reviews_list.review_title: I am satisfied with the great faculty members, good placements, infrastructure, and facilities.

review_content.Placements: 50% of students get placements. The highest starting package is Rs. 25,000 per month and the minimum salary is Rs. 15,000 per month. 90% of students got internship opportunities in leading pharmaceutical companies like Cipla, Sun Pharma, Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, and Torrent Pharmaceuticals. Overall, it is good.
review_content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good. The quality of the food is great. The hostel has a separate canteen and living rooms for both girls and boys. It provides food three times. Morning and breakfast are sufficient and tasty for living a healthy lifestyle. We have a laundry facility five times a week for use.

course_faqs.question: Who can apply Uka Tarsadia BBA scholarships?
course_faqs.answer: Only students who are already studying at Uka Tarsadia University can apply for these scholarships. Students should check official website or talk to college office to know how to apply and what docs are needed. Beside B.U. Patel Scholarship, Uka Tarsadia provides Shri B.U. Patel Research Fellowship, Research Promotion Scheme, UTU Alumni Association Scholarship (UTU AA) and Diwaliba Scholarship for meritious students who want do research or need help.

course_faqs.question: How student keep getting Uka Tarsadia BBA scholarship every year?
course_faqs.answer: If student wants keep getting scholarship for next year they need pass all the exams in first division. Also they are not supposed to take any study gap. If they fail to adhere to rules, they will not get any scholarship. Make sure that you maintain a good score throughout the programme.

course_faqs.question: What is the total duration of the BBA programme at Uka Tarsadia?
course_faqs.answer: Uka Tarsadia BBA programme is three years long. There are some common papers offered across specialisations. Then, there are papers that focuses on the specialistaion opted. It is better to talk to the faculty for any doubts in curriculum. Try to attend the classes from the beginning of the session without fail.

course_faqs.question: Does Uka Tarsadia BBA students get scholarship?
course_faqs.answer: Yes, Uka Tarsadia gives many scholarships which also includes BBA students. Main one is Shri B.U. Patel Scholarship for UG and PG students who are from weak background. Family income must be less than INR 2 Lacs per year and students must pass in first division to get it.

review_summary.college_name: UKA Tarsadia University Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science Engineering (Software Engineering) - Batch of 2029
individual_reviews.title: You will feel like school.

content.Placements: In AMTICS, there is only 30 percent of placement in our college. The college was started in 2021. The first placement will start in 2025. No high company is coming here, and there is no more package providing more than 4,00,000 LPA - 5,00,000 LPA. Average package is 2 LPA.
content.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are the best. If you want to enjoy, you are welcome. But the facilities are less for studying. Don't trust anyone in UTU as no one is deserving of it except some people as they always facts to be nice with you in front of you.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Business Administration (B.B.A.) - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: It is excellent. I personally feel good in my college.

content.Placements: The highest package is 12 LPA in my college. The lowest package is 2 LPA. Tata Motors, Infosys, and other companies visit the college for placements. The top course offered is B.Tech. In the last semester, after exams, companies visit the college to hire students. Students get a great experience in internships.
content.Infrastructure: Wi-Fi is available all over campus. It has all facilities with a big playground and a big canteen. The hostel has the best food with full facilities and a security guard. Students get vegetarian food. We can see the attractive look of the college. All classrooms are fully furnished.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Information Technology - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: Needs major improvement in faculty and practical learning. Provides average placements.

content.Placements: I am a B.Tech Information Technology student from the 2027 batch at Uka Tarsadia University. Placements are average, with around 60% of students placed. Highest salary package offered is 8 LPA, lowest salary package offered is around 2.5 LPA, and average salary offered is around 3.5 LPA. Top recruiters included TCS, Wipro, Capgemini, and Tatvasoft. About 50% of students received internships, mostly in small IT firms or startups. Roles offered were mainly software developer, QA tester, and support engineer. Placement support is decent but could improve. Many students rely on off-campus drives for better opportunities, especially in specialized domains like cybersecurity or data Science.

individual_reviews.course: Bachelor of Pharmacy (B. Pharma) - Batch of 2023
individual_reviews.title: I am satisfied with the great faculty members, good placements, infrastructure, and facilities.

content.Placements: 50% of students get placements. The highest starting package is Rs. 25,000 per month and the minimum salary is Rs. 15,000 per month. 90% of students got internship opportunities in leading pharmaceutical companies like Cipla, Sun Pharma, Dr. Reddy's Laboratories, and Torrent Pharmaceuticals. Overall, it is good.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure is very good. The quality of the food is great. The hostel has a separate canteen and living rooms for both girls and boys. It provides food three times. Morning and breakfast are sufficient and tasty for living a healthy lifestyle. We have a laundry facility five times a week for use.

individual_reviews.course: Diploma in Computer Engineering - Batch of 2027
individual_reviews.title: One of the best university in Gujarat.

content.Placements: Almost all types of students from my course secure placements. While I don't have detailed information about the placement process. Overall placement rate is high, with many students getting placed in reputed companies. For my course, top recruiters include Amazon, TCS, Apple, Google, and others. Overall, my college has a strong reputation in our region.
content.Infrastructure: In our classroom and throughout the whole campus, every student has a high-speed internet connection. Computers in labs also have high-speed internet. Lab infrastructure is great. We have many labs, and medical and other facilities are great too.

admission_overview.college_name: UKA Tarsadia University Course Admissions 2025: Eligibility, Fees, Selection & Last Dates

admission_process.title: UKA Tarsadia University Admission Process 2025

paragraphs: UKA Tarsadia University admissionsare both merit and entrance-based. The university considers national or state-level entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, GUJCET, etc. for admission to specific courses.UKA Tarsadia Universityoffers courses at UG, PG, diploma and doctoral levels in multiple streams such as Engineering, Management, Arts, Science, etc. The university offers courses at the campus and through affiliated colleges. Interested candidates can apply online for the preferred programme.

The university offers admission to UG and PG courses based on merit or national or state-level entrance exam scores. Candidates can fill out the application form online for the preferred programme. Find below the key highlights forUTU admissions:
Particulars
UTU Admission Highlights 2025
Mode of study
Programmes Offered
Admission status 2025
Ongoing:UG, PG & Doctoral
How to apply?
https://utu.ac.in/
Level of programmes offered
Popular programmes

UTU admissionsare conducted once a year for all courses. Aspirants seeking admission in the university have to fulfil both eligibility and selection requirements to apply for admission. The basic eligibility is Class 12 for UG and graduation for PG programmes. Below are popularUKA Tarsadia University coursesalong with their eligibility and selection criteria:
MAT/CAT/CMAT/ any other relevant entrance test + ACPC
GUJCET/JEE Main* + ACPC (As per the policy decided by ACPC)
Graduation with at least 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for SC/ ST/ OBC)
Candidates should have passed HSc and bachelor's degree with Mathematics or Business Mathematics or Statistics as one of the subjects
*In the absence of information, selection criteria is taken from an unofficial source. Hence, data might vary.

UTU admissionsare currently open. The university opens admission online with the registration process. Candidates must check the course-specific selection requirements before applying for a programme. Aspirants can check below the steps to get a seat in the university:
Step 1: UTU Application Process 2025

Candidates fulfilling the eligibility requirements can apply online for UTU admission. Candidates need to pay an application fee to register for a course. Aspirants need to fill out the form and upload the specified documents to complete the application process.
Step 2: Selection

The university considers entrance exams such as CAT, CMAT, MAT, GUJCET, JEE Main, etc. for admission to specific courses. The selection to most of the programmes is based on the merit of the aspirants in the last qualifying exam.
Step 3: Admission Confirmation

The university informs the candidates about their admission after completion of the selection process. Candidates seeking admission in MBA, or MCA have to participate in ACPC Counselling. Selected candidates need to come for document verification and pay theUTU feeto confirm their seat in the university.
For more information about Uka Tarsadia University Admission Process check out the below video:

faqs.question: What all B.Tech specialisations are offered at UTU?
faqs.answer: Uka Tarsadia University offers a four-year full-time BTech programme spread across eight semesters. Candidates after completing Class 12 can apply for the BTech course. Below are some of the BTech specialisations offered at UTU:Automobile EngineeringChemical EngineeringCivilComputerElectrical, Electronics & Communication, etc.

faqs.question: What is the eligibility criteria for admission to B.Tech at Uka Tarsadia University?
faqs.answer: Candidates who have passed Class 12 in Maths group are eligible to apply for Uka Tarsadia University BTech programme. Aspirants must also pass GUJCET or JEE Main for admission to BTech programme. Besides, aspirants must hold the documents proving their eligibility for verification at the time of admission.

courses_data.name: Uka Tarsadia University MBA Admission 2025
courses_data.description: Uka Tarsadia University offers a two-year full-time MBA programme spread across four semesters. The selection to the MBA course is based on CAT, MAT or CMAT scores followed by ACPC Counselling. Aspirants who have passed graduation with at least 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for reserved category) are eligible to apply for an MBA. There are a total of 180 seats in the MBA programme.

faqs.question: How much does MBA at UKA Tarsadia University cost?
faqs.answer: The total tuition fee for UKA Tarsadia University MBA course isINR 1.4 lakh.This information is sourced from official website/ sanctioning body and is subject to change. On paying the tuition fee of INR 1.4 lakh, students can expect an average package of INR 2.4 lakh. Aspirants need to pay the course fee at the time of admission to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: Can I get admission to UKA Tarsadia University for MBA with 60% in Class 12?
faqs.answer: Candidates need to complete graduation with at least 50% aggregate to apply for UKA Tarsadia MBA programme. Hence, aspirants must complete their graduation after Class 12 for admission to MBA. Graduation is compulsory to apply for the MBA course. Besides, aspirants must also pass CAT, CMAT or MAT for admission. There is a 5% relaxation in the aggregate for reserved category candidates making it easier for them.

faqs.question: How can I get admission to MBA at Uka Tarsadia University?
faqs.answer: UKA Tarsadia University admission to MBA course is based on entrance exam scores. The university considers CAT, MAT or CMAT scores for admission to MBA. Selected candidates have to further participate in ACPC Counselling. Selected candidates are offered seat in MBA programme based on their rank in the entrance exam.

faqs.question: Is MAT required for MBA at UKA Tarsadia University?
faqs.answer: Yes, MAT is required for MBA at UKA Tarsadia University for some specializations. The university accepts CMAT, CAT, and MAT scores for admission to its MBA program. While the eligibility criteria mention a minimum of 50% marks (45% for reserved categories), the specific score requirement for each entrance exam may vary depending on the specialisation you choose. It's best to check the university's website or contact the admissions office for the latest information on specific score requirements.

faqs.answer: Aspirants need to pass graduation with at least 50% aggregate (45% aggregate for SC/ ST/ OBC) to apply for UKA Tarsadia University MCA programme. Aspirants must also pass Class 12 or HSC examination nad bachelor's degree with Mathematics or Business Mathematics or Statistics as one of the subjects to apply for MCA.

faqs.question: Is MCA offered at Uka Tarsadia University?
faqs.answer: Yes, UKA Tarsadia University a two-year full-time MCA programme divided into four semesters. Aspirants must complete graduation with at least 50% aggregate to apply for MCA. There is a relaxation of 5% in the aggregate for SC/ ST/ OBC category candidates. The selection for MCA is based on CMAT score.

faqs.question: Are admissions at UKA Tarsadia University entrance-based or merit-based?
faqs.answer: UKA Tarsadia University admissions are both merit and entrance-based. Admission to majority of the programmes such as BBA, BCA, BCom, etc. is based on merit of the aspirants in the last qualifying exam. The selection for MBA is based on CAT, MAT or CMAT scores. The university considers CMAT and GUJCET/ JEE Main for MCA and BTech programmes, respectively.

faqs.question: Can students join UKA Tarsadia University directly without any entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Yes, UKA Tarsadia University offers admission to most of the programmes based on merit of the candidates in the last qualifying exam. The university considers entrance exam for admission to courses such as BTech, MBA, MCA, etc. For other courses, candidates have to register with their qualifying exam score. Once selection process is over, selected aspirants need to pay the course fee to confirm their seat in the university.

faqs.question: Does UKA Tarsadia University accept MAT score?
faqs.answer: Yes, UKA Tarsadia University accepts MAT score for admission to MBA programme. MAT is a national-level entrance conducted byAllIndia.Management Association (AIMA). Besides, candidates can also apply for MBA with CAT or MAT scores. Selected candidates have to participate in ACPC Counselling.

faqs.question: Is it difficult to get admission to MSc at Uka Tarsadia University?
faqs.answer: No, it is not as difficult to get admission into Uka Tarsadia MSc compared to other universities, as the university conducts its MSc admissions through merit secured in graduation which is not as tough compared to other universities which take entrance exams like CUET-PG for their MSc admission.In addition to that Uka Tarsadia is one of the most affordable colleges of Gujarat to pursue MSc. Therefore, it is easier to get admission into the university and continue one's MSc degree once admitted.

The University also organises summer internships, industrial visits, expert lectures and industrial training programs for students to make them industry-ready.

Earlier, the overall highest and average package offered during UKA Tarsadia University placements 2022 stood at INR 9.5 LPA and INR 2.75 LPA , respectively.

hostel_campus.college_name: UKA Tarsadia University Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: You will feel like school.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are the best. If you want to enjoy, you are welcome. But the facilities are less for studying. Don't trust anyone in UTU as no one is deserving of it except some people as they always facts to be nice with you in front of you.

reviews.review_heading: It is excellent. I personally feel good in my college.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi is available all over campus. It has all facilities with a big playground and a big canteen. The hostel has the best food with full facilities and a security guard. Students get vegetarian food. We can see the attractive look of the college. All classrooms are fully furnished.

reviews.review_heading: Needs major improvement in faculty and practical learning. Provides average placements.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure at Uka Tarsadia University for B.Tech IT is below average. Classrooms are basic with limited SMART features. Labs are often overcrowded, and many computers are outdated. Wi-Fi is available but frequently unreliable. Library has a decent collection, but many books are outdated. Hostel rooms are small and lack proper ventilation and cleanliness. Mess food is repetitive, often tasteless, and not very hygienic. Canteen offers limited options at high prices. Medical facilities are mini...

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with the great faculty members, good placements, infrastructure, and facilities.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure is very good. The quality of the food is great. The hostel has a separate canteen and living rooms for both girls and boys. It provides food three times. Morning and breakfast are sufficient and tasty for living a healthy lifestyle. We have a laundry facility five times a week for use.

reviews.review_heading: One of the best university in Gujarat.
reviews.review_text: In our classroom and throughout the whole campus, every student has a high-speed internet connection. Computers in labs also have high-speed internet. Lab infrastructure is great. We have many labs, and medical and other facilities are great too.

reviews.review_heading: One of the best colleges in the Surat area.
reviews.review_text: In our classroom and throughout the whole campus, we have a high-speed internet connection. Computers in labs also have high-speed internet, and the lab infrastructure is great. We have around 40 to 50 labs in total, and medical and other facilities are great too.

reviews.review_heading: I recommend students to take admission if they are searching for a good & affordable college.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is excellent. Classrooms with projectors, AC, etc. The best thing about the college is the library. Our department has a separate library and a central library for every department. Our library has approximately 2 lakh books. The central library is fully air-conditioned and has monitors to issue books. Book entry and exit are managed by ID cards, and without an ID card, no entry is allowed. I am not from the hostel, so I don't have information about it.

reviews.review_heading: I am well-satisfied with the faculty members, education, and good placements in 2025.
reviews.review_text: Our college provides free Wi-Fi all over campus. Labs are well-maintained with high-speed PCs. There are also other labs like 3D printing lab, BEE lab, DLD lab, hardware lab, etc. Classrooms are good and we got the biggest library in Surat. I don't know about the hostel. The mess and canteen serve the best quality of food.

reviews.review_heading: Good placements in 2024, nice labs, and awesome college life.
reviews.review_text: Our college has some of the best labs, Wi-Fi, a library, and sports facilities. Wi-Fi is available throughout the college, and hostels also have Wi-Fi. They give personal as well as shared rooms. We also have nice sports facilities, like table tennis, a football ground, a cricket ground, and many more. The computer labs are just awesome. The best, according to me is the iOS lab, where every student gets their own PC. There are many canteens and shops available throughout the college, offering a ...

reviews.review_heading: The best college gives the best memories, so choose your college wisely.
reviews.review_text: The facilities are good enough, we have full campus Wi-Fi, a campus bus, fully air-conditioned labs, and the best faculty. The library is very good and big enough. I don’t live in the hostel, but heard from my friends that the food is of good quality. Also, the food is available in the mess and canteen.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Uka Tarsadia University in the Bachelor of Science in Information Technology.
reviews.review_text: Wi-Fi does not work at all on our devices. Classrooms are big and large with projectors. There are 2 libraries with many books. The quality is nice, but it is also expensive. It is free for the students to the canteen. Some of the shops don't allow students to eat their home lunchbox inside it.

reviews.review_heading: The best college gives students with the best memories.
reviews.review_text: Facilities we get in the college are Wi-Fi in every class, good labs, and the best library. The food is of the best quality. There are a lot of sports and games. I have taken a computer engineering diploma after which I am doing a degree in computer engineering from the same college.

reviews.review_heading: Everything is fine and well-maintained except for the issue of less faculty.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure is very well and well-maintained by the authorities. Everything is well-maintained, including Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, library, and even the campus is also well-maintained. The main thing I found attractive is the central library of the college.

reviews.review_heading: Best private university in Bardoli.
reviews.review_text: There are a lot of Wi-Fi hotspots with the best internet speed. There are a lot of labs, and the libraries are huge. The campus has a lot of grounds, and the canteen is good. There are also a lot of good study tables.

reviews.review_heading: THE LIFE AT UKA TARSADIA UNIVERSITY
reviews.review_text:
The hostel is good and students are also very cooperative and friendly. 
The cleanliness of the hostel is very good and the rooms are also clean. 
The food quality is decent and the rent is also very good in UkaTtarsadia university. 
Overall accommodation of the college is good.

highlights.summary:
The CSAB Special Counselling 2025 Round 3 has concluded with the announcement of the seat allotment results for GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya admission to BE/BTech courses.

Here are some additional updates regarding the GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya:

student_insights.feedback: Students can work with faculty on research projects
Offered in the final year only
Higher in core jobs
Majority opted in India
Students are expected to reach out to companies themselves
Organized & proactive placement process
Strong alumni network that help with placement opportunities
Very Active and resourceful, college is also involved
Loved in first year but not in later years

fees_and_eligibility.overview: offers a wide range of programmes at both UG and PG levels. With option for offline learning, students can choose from several streams such as Engineering and Business & Management Studies. At the UG stage, courses available include B.E. / B.Tech, B.Sc. and B.A. For the PG level, there is a wide range of courses like M.E./M.Tech, MBA/PGDM and M.Sc. GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya fee structure ranges between INR 18,500 to 3,62,000.

faqs.answer: A:    The application fee for the B.Tech. program at Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya (GKV) is Rs. 1000. This fee is to be paid online and it is non-refundable in any case. There are in total of 300 seats available for the BTech program at the college divided among various specialisations offered by the college.
faqs.question: What is the application fee for the B.Tech. program at GKV Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya?

faqs.answer: A:    The fees range for courses offerred by the GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya is around INR 18500 - INR 362000.
faqs.question: What is the fees range for courses offerred by the GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya?

faqs.answer: A:    For admission to the MCA (Master of Computer Applications) program at Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya (GKV), Haridwar, the following entrance exams are accepted: 1. CUET PG (Common University Entrance Test - Postgraduate): GKV accepts CUET PG scores for MCA admissions, which is a national-level exam conducted for postgraduate programs at central universities like GKV.   2. NIMCET (NIT MCA Common Entrance Test): In some cases, GKV may also consider NIMCET scores, which is a national-level entrance exam for MCA programs conducted by NITs, although CUET PG has become the primary exam. Candidates must meet the minimum eligibility requirements and score the required cutoff in the respective entrance exams to qualify for admission.
faqs.question: What entrance exams are accepted by GKV Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya for admission to MCA?

faqs.answer: A:    For admission to the MBA course organized by Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya (GKV), the following documents are generally necessary:-MBA Admission Required Documents:Application Form: Duly filled out the application form for seeking admission.Entrance Exam Scorecard: Valid scorecard of CAT, MAT, CMAT, GRE, or CUET-PGMark Sheets: Marks sheets of all qualifications held previous to it viz. 10th, 12th, and graduation.Degree Certificate: Provisional or original degree certificate of graduation.Id Proof: Govt. issued ID- Aadhar card/passport/voter ID etc.).Passport-size Photographs: Recent photographs as required in the application form.Caste Certificate: If applicable, a valid caste certificate for SC/ST/OBC candidates.Migration Certificate: Mandatory for candidates from other universities.Character Certificate: Issued by the institution last attended.

review_content.Placements: About 60% of students get selected or placed in the CSE course because most of the students prepare for the GATE exam. The highest packages offered by companies are 15 LPA. The lowest is 8 LPA, and the average is 12 LPA per annum. Top recruiters include Microsoft, Google, Colors Code, IBM, Infosys, and TCS. About 50 to 60 students out of 250 get selected for this course. Roles like software developer and intern are offered.
review_content.Infrastructure: Facilities and infrastructure are above average. It is good to live in. All necessary equipment is available, including tables, beds, chairs, personal almirahs, etc. Classrooms have all the facilities like Wi-Fi and smart boards. Hostel facilities are good, and the food quality is okay. However, they don't serve good food in the end. In the beginning, the food quality is good, but after a few months, it becomes the worst. The mess and canteen are also on the college campus, and medical facilities are provided. There is a sports room where all the needed equipment is available.

review_summary.college_name: Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Not great academically, average placements, but suitable for a low-cost B.Tech degree.

content.Placements: Placements are average, around 4–5 LPA, not very high. The highest package reported in recent years (especially for CSE) is around 12 LPA from a marketing company in Bangalore. 70–80% of students get placed on campus, with many finding jobs off-campus.
content.Infrastructure: Hostel infrastructure is nice, but the food is worse. Approximate hostel fees vary from Rs. 40,000 to Rs. 62,000 per year, which includes a mess charge of around Rs. 25,000 and Rs. 3,000 as security money. Bus fees are around Rs. 7,000. GKV offers B.Tech in four streams CSE, ESE, EE, and ME.

individual_reviews.course: B.Tech. in Computer Science and Engineering - Batch of 2028
individual_reviews.title: Gurukul Kangri Vishwavidyalaya - College Review

content.Placements: As this college is one of the popular GFTIs, most of the students get enough time to prepare for other exams too. Instead of this, about 80% of students sit for the placement round, and 60% succeed. The lowest package is 8 LPA, the highest package is 15 LPA, and the average package is 12 LPA. Top recruiting companies are Infosys, Google, Colors Code, IBM, etc. Roles offered include software intern and cybersecurity intern. About 50% in CSE and 100% in Electrical get internships and PPO from the company.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure and buildings are too old because they are not being taken care of. The college is also spread over a very small area. However, classrooms have all the facilities, and the hostel is good to live in. Labs, library, and Wi-Fi are available in the college and hostel campus. The mess quality is good and hygienic, but sometimes they serve very bad food, mostly at night. Sports and games facilities are available because the college owns its own stadium called Dayanand Stadium.

faqs.question: What to do after JEE Main session 2 result?
faqs.answer: After JEE session 2 is completed, only those candidates who are aiming for IITs need to start preparing for JEE Advanced after clearing JEE Main. Those who are above the 98th percentile should start preparing for JEE Advanced as soon as possible. Those below this, between the 95th and 98th percentile, should focus on attempting more mock tests and previous year question papers so that they have a better chance of clearing JEE Advanced

faqs.question: What entrance exams are accepted by GKV Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya for admission to MCA?
faqs.answer: For admission to the MCA (Master of Computer Applications) program at Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya (GKV), Haridwar, the following entrance exams are accepted:1. CUET PG (Common University Entrance Test - Postgraduate): GKV accepts CUET PG scores for MCA admissions, which is a national-level exam conducted for postgraduate programs at central universities like GKV.2. NIMCET (NIT MCA Common Entrance Test): In some cases, GKV may also consider NIMCET scores, which is a national-level entrance exam for MCA programs conducted by NITs, although CUET PG has become the primary exam.Candidates must meet the minimum eligibility requirements and score the required cutoff in the respective entrance exams to qualify for admission.

hostel_campus.college_name: Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya Infrastructure Details & Reviews

reviews.review_heading: Not great academically, average placements, but suitable for a low-cost B.Tech degree.
reviews.review_text: Hostel infrastructure is nice, but the food is worse. Approximate hostel fees vary from Rs. 40,000 to Rs. 62,000 per year, which includes a mess charge of around Rs. 25,000 and Rs. 3,000 as security money. Bus fees are around Rs. 7,000. GKV offers B.Tech in four streams CSE, ESE, EE, and ME.

reviews.review_heading: Gurukul Kangri Vishwavidyalaya - College Review
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure and buildings are too old because they are not being taken care of. The college is also spread over a very small area. However, classrooms have all the facilities, and the hostel is good to live in. Labs, library, and Wi-Fi are available in the college and hostel campus. The mess quality is good and hygienic, but sometimes they serve very bad food, mostly at night. Sports and games facilities are available because the college owns its own stadium called Dayanand Stadium.

reviews.review_heading: Review of GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are above average. It is good to live in. All necessary equipment is available, including tables, beds, chairs, personal almirahs, etc. Classrooms have all the facilities like Wi-Fi and smart boards. Hostel facilities are good, and the food quality is okay. However, they don't serve good food in the end. In the beginning, the food quality is good, but after a few months, it becomes the worst. The mess and canteen are also on the college campus, and medical facilitie...

reviews.review_heading: Review of GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya.
reviews.review_text: Hostel facilities are good, and they provide all the basic requirements. A very bad quality of food is served to students, and it is not hygienic. It provides medical facilities and sports facilities. The college has its own stadium named Dayanand Stadium. Classrooms have all the facilities.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Gurukul Kangri University.
reviews.review_text: The facilities and infrastructure available here are extraordinary and well-furnished. All facilities related to the curriculum are there, but they should focus on the lab area because they don't change equipment every year. Hostel facilities are well and good. All required items are there, but the food quality is not so good and is not acceptable.

reviews.review_heading: Gurukul Kangri Vishwavidyalaya - College review.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are well furnished, and the availability of all the essential items is there in the college, but the lab equipment is old, and they don't buy new gadgets every year, which is one of the drawbacks of the college. Hostel facilities are good enough, but the mess facilities are not so good, as they give unhygienic food, because of which we left the hostel after the end of our first year. A canteen is available on the campus.

reviews.review_heading: Review of Gurukul Kangri Vishwavidyalaya.
reviews.review_text: Hostel facilities are good, also Wi-Fi and labs are too good, but food quality is very poor, nowadays they are taking the initiative to make better food. Overall, for the first time, I suggest you take a hostel in your first year. Make beautiful memories with your friends. Sports and games facilities are also there as we play GPL every year with our team, and cash prizes are there for the winning team.

reviews.review_heading: GKV - Haridwar College Review.
reviews.review_text: Department infrastructure is overwhelming, but it could be even better if they renovated it every year, at least by colors. All facilities are there like Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and library. Hostel facilities are not so good, but we can live there as they fulfill basic facilities, though the mess is the worst; food quality is very bad. Medical facilities are there. Sports and games are also played once during the sports fest.

reviews.review_heading: Gurukul Kangri University – Review
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure of the hostel is good but not very good, as it is very old, but they provide all the facilities. Labs and classrooms are well-furnished, and a playground and stadium with gym facilities are there. Hostel facilities are good, but mess food is not so good , it is the worst, I can say. Medical and sports facilities are also there.

reviews.review_heading: Its a good college, I know it does not have a good placement rate, but it gives knowledge.
reviews.review_text: Wi-fi is good, but classes are not as good as they used to be, the college is much bigger. There is a Hostel with simple but not very heavy facilities, but its good for those who come from a middle class family and who want to only study and not participate in other activities like hanging out with girls and vice versa.

reviews.review_heading: Gurukul kangri vishwavidyalaya - review.
reviews.review_text: Facilities and infrastructure are good and well-equipped with Wi-Fi, labs, and classrooms are also there with all the facilities. The quality of the hostel are good but quality of the mess is not so good but food quality of the canteen is awesome and good but they take charges. Sports facilities are also there.

reviews.review_heading: Gurukul Kangri Vishwavidyalaya Review.
reviews.review_text: Infrastructure of the college and hostel was very primitive and old, and they did not take any action to improve it. The bathroom quality was also very bad. Classrooms were good, but hostel facilities were not good. Food quality was also the worst. College canteen was good, but they charge extra charges compared to others.

reviews.review_heading: Review of GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya.
reviews.review_text: Facilities are good, but the infrastructure is not so good here. However, facilities like the library and Wi-Fi are accessible to all students. Classrooms are loaded with all the facilities, like projectors and digital boards. Hostel facilities are good, but the mess facilities are very bad here. Sports facilities are good, and medical facilities are available for all students.

reviews.review_heading: Review of GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya.
reviews.review_text: Old infrastructure is there but all facilities are there including Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms, and library. Hostel facilities are good. But mess is not so good. Food quality is very bad. Sports facilities are there for every sport. They also provide medical facilities.

reviews.review_heading: Teachers are good and very supportive.
reviews.review_text: As we know, the institute is spread over 100 acres, so the infrastructure is good. It has a good hostel life with good wardens, as they keep the discipline. It is really worth it. The hostel is provided at a low cost along with the mess. Grounds are also there.

faculty_reviews.verified_reviews_info: The Verified badge indicates that the reviewer's details have been verified by Shiksha, and reviewers are bona fide students of this college. These reviews and ratings have been given by students. Shiksha does not endorse the same. Out of 291 published reviews , 239 reviews are verified.

review_summarisation.heading: What students say about GKV - Gurukula Kangri Vishwavidyalaya

likes.text: Top recruiting companies for our college are TCS, Wipro, IBM, Daffodil, Samsung, Byju’s, Cognizant, HCL, Infosys and many other companies.
Almost all the students get placements, and in the case of internship, the college provides leads to the students.

faqs.answer: A:    The NTPC School of Business offers a Postgraduate Diploma in Management (PGDM) in Energy Management which is a two-year residential programme with three months of internship facilities.The fee for the course is approximately 16 Lacs which includes boarding and lodging.The college is ranked 1st among the best colleges in Energy Management in Uttar Pradesh.The institution also offers an Executive PGDM course which is of 18 months duration and costs around 15 lakhs.The college is known for its expert faculty members with high experience of domain knowledge.
faqs.question: What is the fee for various courses at NTPC School of Business?

faqs.answer: A:    ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad accepts a common entrance exam for admission to its MBA/PGPM programs at IBS Ahmedabad, IBS Gurgaon, IBS Dehradun, IBS Kolkata, IBS Pune campuses. The entrance exam accepted by ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad is IBSAT (ICFAI Business school Aptitude Test). They also accept CAT, NMAT, or GMAT. The application form for admission to the PGPM course offered by ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad is common for all the IBS campuses.
faqs.question: What is the entrance exam for ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad 2026?

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, you can get admitted to ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad directly but for this eligibility, The application form is common for admission to MBA/PGPM programs at IBS Ahmedabad, IBS Gurgaon, IBS Dehradun, IBS Kolkata, and IBS Pune campuses.  You must have a Bachelor degree from a recognised university with a minimum of 60 percent marks. You also must have a decent score in the exams like CAT, GMAT, NMAT, and XAT
faqs.question: Can I join ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad directly?

faqs.answer: A:    Yes, ICFAI Business School (IBS), Ahmedabad accepts admission through many national-level exams other than IBSAT exam such as GMAT/ CAT/ NMAT. Candidates based on score in any of the said exams will be shortlisted for the Group Discussion (GD) and Personal Interview (PI) rounds.Those who qualify the GD & PI rounds will be required to the admission cell at IBS Ahmedabad to complete the remaining admission formalities such as relevant document verification and fee payment leading to final seat allotment.

faqs.answer: IBS Ahmedabad offers a two-year full-time Postgraduate Programme in Management (PGPM) which is equivalent to MBA. Candidates seeking admission in the PGPM at IBS Ahmedabad must fulfil the following requirements:The candidate must possess a bachelor’s degree in any discipline with a minimum of 50% aggregate.The candidate must appear for the IBS Aptitude Test (IBSAT) by applying for it through ICFAI Business School (IBS) official website. Besides IBSAT, IBS Ahmedabad also accepts CAT/ GMAT/ NMAT score.Candidates based on their score in any one of the aforementioned exams will be shortlisted for the Group Discussion (GD) and Personal Interview (PI) round.Candidates who qualify the GD & PI round will be required to report to the admission cell at IBS Ahmedabad for document verification and fee payment leading to final seat allotment.
faqs.question: Q: Does IBS Ahmedabad offer MBA or PGP?

faqs.answer: IBS Ahmedabad accepts admission for the Postgraduate Programme in Management (PGPM) equivalent to MBA through IBS Aptitude Test (IBSAT). Candidates willing to take admission to the PGPM course at IBS Ahmedabad must appear for the IBSAT 2023. Apart from IBSAT exam, IBS Ahmedabad also accepts score of GMAT/ CAT/ NMAT.Candidates based on their score in any one of the aforesaid exam will be shortlisted for the Group Discussion (GD) and Personal Interview (PI) rounds and those who qualify both rounds will be selected for final seat allotment after document verification and fee payment.
faqs.question: Q: How can I get MBA seat in IBS Ahmedabad?

faqs.answer: Yes, IBS Ahmedabad accepts CAT score. review_summary.college_name: IBS Ahmedabad Reviews on Placements, Faculty & Facilities

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: This college makes ordinary students to extraordinary corporates.

content.Placements: The institute provides very good placements. All average and below average students at least get placed. All students get salary packages according to their capacity and intelligence. The college has great market value in some good Indian companies. The college also provides international placements. Mainly bank firms like HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, IndusInd Bank, etc., are mass recruiters.
content.Infrastructure: The college has an old campus which was at Science city, between the city facing the main road. Hence it was congested, small, little noisy, and without ground. Now the campus is at Adalaj as college reputation and the number of students increased. Hence the current campus is very good. It's very spacious. There is a good parking space. It includes all basic facilities like Wi-Fi, washrooms, classrooms, auditorium, etc.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: It is a place to learn, enjoy, explore, and develop.

content.Placements: Placements in our college are really fantastic. Some good bank firms and financial institutions visit the campus for recruitment. FMCG companies are very low. Some companies of FMCG visited the campus and hired students of our senior batch. Every student gets a salary package according to their capabilities and knowledge.
content.Infrastructure: Initially, the campus was at Science city, which was a small campus with little space. That campus didn't have a playground, etc. Now, the campus is at Adalaj, which is very good and spacious. The new campus has amphitheatre for various cultural events. The new campus has proper parking facility. There is a playground for conducting sports events.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2020
individual_reviews.title: Our college provides full growth for students.

content.Placements: Currently, I am doing an internship, but according to our seniors, there are more than 98% placements. For internships, many good companies like HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Big Basket and Amul visit our college. Mainly financial firms and banks visit here for recruitment.
content.Infrastructure: The infrastructure of our college is specious, and our college utilised space very well. There are all facilities like parking, Wi-Fi, a playground so that students can show their talent for sports. There are an auditorium for intellectual events and an amphitheatre for cultural events.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: A place which makes ordinary students to extraordinary corporates.

content.Placements: Institute tries to give 100% placement. Institute provides choice to each student for their choice and in which field they want to work including banking, finance, FMCG. College is visited by many good companies like HDFC bank, Amul, ICICI bank etc. All over placement is good.
content.Infrastructure: College has good infrastructure including library, auditorium, classrooms, proper hygienic washrooms. College is in good location far from crowd and noise. College has very good facility of parking for two wheelers and four wheelers. College has enough big sports ground for sports activity.

individual_reviews.course: Post Graduate Program in Management (PGPM) - Batch of 2019
individual_reviews.title: College doesn't give admission to brilliant people but definitely makes average people brilliant.

content.Placements: All other colleges provide placements to some extraordinary students while IBS provide placements to all students at least. The college has its own placement department. The average salary package can be scaled to 5 LPA, which is a good package. Mainly banks and financial institutions visit here for placements. Some very good companies like HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank, Bandhan Bank, Zydus, visit here for placement purpose.
content.Infrastructure: The campus was old. It is a little congested and with no space for parking and playground which was at Science city. The new campus is at Adalaj, and it is very spacious. It has a huge infrastructure. It has all the facilities like parking, playground, Wi-Fi, and a huge library. It also has an amphitheatre to conduct various cultural events.

faqs.question: What is the procedure to take MBA admission at ICFAI Business School Ahmedabad?

admission_process.title: ICFAI Business School (IBS), Ahmedabad Admissions Process 2026

paragraphs: ICFAI Business School (IBS), Ahmedabad admission process consists of applying for IBSAT exam followed by shortlisting for Group Discussion (GD) and Personal Interview (PI) based on their IBSAT score.
STEP 1: IBS Ahmedabad Application Process

Candidates aspiring to take admission in courses offered at IBS Ahmedabad must complete the application process for IBSAT 2023 through IBS official website by paying the registration fee of INR 1,800.
STEP 2: Group Discussion (GD) & Personal Interview (PI)

Candidates based on their score in IBSAT/ CAT/ GMAT/ NMAT will be further shortlisted for Group Discussion (GD) and Personal Interview (PI) rounds. Qualified candidates will have to report to the admission cell at IBS Ahmedabad.
STEP 3: Final Seat Allotment

Candidates who qualify the GD & PI rounds will have to report to the admission cell at IBS Ahmedabad for document verification and fee payment leading to final seat allotment in the required programme opted by the candidate.

faqs.question: What is the selection process for MBA at NTPC School of Business?
faqs.answer: The selection process for the MBA programme at NTPC School of Business (NSB) involves the following steps:Admission Score: Candidates are evaluated based on their performance in national-level tests such as CAT, XAT, CMAT, MAT and GMAT.Specific percentage requirements are set for each test to ensure a comprehensive evaluation of candidate's aptitude and potential for the program.Work Experience: Candidates are evaluated based on their work experience which carries a weightage of 60 in the shortlisting criteria.Personal Assessment: Shortlisted candidates are called for a Personal Assessment which might be conducted online due to the COVID pandemic.Final Composite Scores: The final selection is based on the merit of Final Composite Scores which are calculated by using Admission Score, Work Experience and Personal Assessment scores.The cut-off for shortlisting candidates for Personal Assessment is decided by NSB.Candidates are advised to check their registered emails regularly and visit t

faqs.question: How can I get admission in PGPM at IBS Ahmedabad?
faqs.answer: Students seeking admission to the Postgraduate Programme in Management (PGPM) at IBS Ahmedabad must fulfil the following requirements:The candidate must possess a bachelor’s degree in any discipline with a minimum of 50% aggregate.The candidate must appear for the IBS Aptitude Test (IBSAT) by applying for it through ICFAI Business School (IBS) official website. Besides IBSAT, IBS Ahmedabad also accepts CAT/ GMAT/ NMAT score.Candidates based on their score in any one of the aforementioned exams will be shortlisted for the Group Discussion (GD) and Personal Interview (PI) round.Candidates who qualify the GD & PI round will be required to report to the admission cell at IBS Ahmedabad for document verification and fee payment leading to final seat allotment.

placement_report.college_name: IBS Ahmedabad Placements 2025: Highest Package, Average Package, Top Recruiters

placement_data.title: IBS Ahmedabad Placement Overview 2025
paragraphs: The highest and average package recorded during IBS Ahmedabad placement 2025 was INR 10.34 LPA and INR 7.81 LPA. The placement percentage was 95%. Companies such as ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank and Asian Paints have visited the campus in recent past. Financial Services emerged as the top recruiting sector with 24% placement distribution. It was followed by Banking and ITES sectors with placement distribution of 15% and 12%, respectively.

The average package received over the past two placement drives was almost the same. Further, this year, the placement percentage was 95%, 3% lower than placement 2024 and 2024. In addition, decrease of nearly 14% in the highest domestic package offered as comparted with 2024.

reviews.review_heading: A place which must be visited and enjoyed.
reviews.review_text: Currently Campus has been shifted to Adalaj, which campus is quite good. This campus gives facilities of playground, one centralized library, conference room, specious auditorium. College is fully Air Conditioned. One amphitheatre is also there so many events can be conducted over there. Many cultural events are done there.

reviews.review_heading: This college is good at all the aspects except for the way of teaching.
reviews.review_text: The college provides Wi-Fi facility, labs, reading rooms, sports, and cultural clubs. This college is good in all aspects. The quality of the labs is very good. Every week they get new books for students, and they also provide a daily newspaper. Infrastructural facilities are not that bad, but the classroom structure makes the students feel sleepy. Our college provides new opportunities for students who want to play different sports.

reviews.review_heading: This college lays a great foundation for your career.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is excellent. It was located at science city earlier, and the previous campus was small. But now, it has been shifted to Adalaj, Korba highway, and the infrastructure is the best when compared to all the other colleges. Facilities like an amphitheatre, centrally air-conditioned classrooms, boardroom, and library, etc., are the best.

reviews.review_heading: The college offers worthful results.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is very good. It provides all the basic facilities like library, classroom, and auditorium etc. Wi-Fi facilities and other facilities are very good. Parking facilities are very good. Hence all vehicles can be parked easily. The playground is very clean so we can conduct different activities and some big events.

reviews.review_heading: The college provides a satisfactory result.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is very nice, and it is well maintained. It provides all the basic and necessary facilities like a library, classrooms, projectors, etc., for students. Many facilities like Wi-Fi and others are very good. They provide a huge auditorium for various events and college functions.

reviews.review_heading: ICFAI Business School has good infrastructure, excellent faculty and good placements.
reviews.review_text: The college infrastructure is excellent. There are necessary facilities like cafeteria and library. There are well air-conditioned classrooms, and there is a play area. There are a spacious auditorium and amphitheatre. There is also good and enough parking facility. The college also has the Wi-Fi facility for students useful purpose.

reviews.review_heading: This institute gives satisfactory results.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of the college is very good. The college provides all the basic facilities like library, classrooms, and auditorium etc. Many facilities like Wi-Fi and other facilities are very good. There is a big auditorium to conduct various events. Parking facilities are very good. Hence, all vehicles can be parked easily.

reviews.review_heading: I am satisfied with the college. One can have 2 years of studies and enjoyment.
reviews.review_text: The infrastructure of our college is really good. It has recently changed the campus which is really huge. The college ensures that all the facilities are provided to students. Facilities like huge classrooms, IT labs, library, canteen, sports room, all are provided to ensure that the students can study and have fun at the same time.

reviews.review_heading: A college which justifies learning in all aspects.
reviews.review_text: We had dedicated Wi-Fi-equipped labs, classrooms and the library. The quality food was available in the canteen, sports and activities were encouraged in our college. Students who were interested in academics can access to online journals in databases. For the students who wish to learn, there were adequate facilities.

reviews.review_heading: Placements and all thing depend on us. Some faculty members are very good.
reviews.review_text: There are good facilities like Wi-Fi, labs, classrooms. Our library is very good, and there are lots of good books in our library. In our old campus, there was no sports ground. Our old campus was very small. But now we are shifted to the new campus, and our new campus is very spacious.

college_info.college_name: IBS Ahmedabad Scholarship Details

paragraphs: IBS Ahmedabad offers several scholarships to students as financial assistance. ICFAI Business School (IBS) offers IBSAT-2023 scholarships, for top performers in the IBSAT test, which is scheduled to be held in the third week of December 2023. These scholarships are open to candidates applying for the MBA/ PGPM programme. These scholarships aim to offer financial assistance to deserving candidates. Check the IBS Ahmedabad scholarship criteria in the following table:
Scholarships from IBSAT 2023 Test
Eligibility Criteria
For Toppers in IBSAT
Candidates who secure top ranks in IBSAT
For Wards of IBS Alumni
Children of IBS alumni applying for the MBA/PGPM programme
For Physically Challenged Candidates
Candidates with physical disabilities applying for MBA/PGPM programme
Wards of Defence Personnel (In-service/retired) from Army, Airforce, Navy, and Paramilitary Forces
Children of in-service or retired defence personnel from these forces applying for MBA/ PGPM program
